AndaSharkToo_murky.name: ... And a Shark Too!
AndaSharkToo_murky.description: Increase the damage of Octo-Grab by 13700% (+4% per level).

64KBMarathon_thelostvikings.name: 64 KB Marathon
64KBMarathon_thelostvikings.description: Gain an additional 40% Movement Speed when activating Go Go Go! that decays over 4 seconds.  Additionally, the Vikings will break out of Roots and Slows.

AFishyDeal_murky.name: A Fishy Deal
AFishyDeal_murky.description: Killing a Minion with Pufferfish grants a stack of Bribe. Use 8 stacks to bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Bosses.  Maximum of 32 stacks of Bribe.

ATouchofHoney_chen.name: A Touch of Honey
ATouchofHoney_chen.description: Increase the slow from Keg Smash to 40%.

AbhorredSkull_mephisto.name: Abhorred Skull
AbhorredSkull_mephisto.description: Hitting a Hero with Skull Missile grants 20% Spell Power for 6 seconds.

AblativeArmor_dva.name: Ablative Armor
AblativeArmor_dva.description: Damage against D.Va's Mech that would deal 4% or less of its maximum Health are reduced by 50%.  This does not decrease the amount of Self-Destruct Charge gained.

AbolishMagic_lunara.name: Abolish Magic
AbolishMagic_lunara.description: Target an Ally to remove all damage over time and disabling effects from them and Lunara. For 2 seconds after, the duration of disabling effects is reduced by 50%.

AbsoluteZero_arthas.name: Absolute Zero
AbsoluteZero_arthas.description: Sindragosa flies twice as far.  Enemy Heroes are rooted for 2 seconds, and then slowed by 60% for 3.5 seconds.

AbyssalSymbiosis_orphea.name: Abyssal Symbiosis
AbyssalSymbiosis_orphea.description: Hitting a Hero with Chomp instantly grants Orphea maximum Chaos.

Accelerando_lucio.name: Accelerando
Accelerando_lucio.description: Wall Ride's Movement Speed bonus gradually increases to 40% over 4 seconds while LÃºcio maintains its effect.

AcceleratedContamination_lunara.name: Accelerated Contamination
AcceleratedContamination_lunara.description: While at least 2 enemy Heroes are afflicted with Nature's Toxin, Noxious Blossom's cooldown recharges 100% faster.

AcceleratedDecay_kelthuzad.name: Accelerated Decay
AcceleratedDecay_kelthuzad.description: Each time a Hero is hit by Death and Decay's pool, they take 20% more periodic damage from Death and Decay for the next 4 seconds, stacking up to 6 times.

AccumulatingFlame_chen.name: Accumulating Flame
AccumulatingFlame_chen.description: Quest: Every time a Hero is Ignited with Breath of Fire, increase its damage over time by 2%, up to 60%. Reward: After Igniting 30 Heroes, each enemy Hero Ignited grants you 20 Armor for 3 seconds.

AceintheHole_raynor.name: Ace in the Hole
AceintheHole_raynor.description: Deal 15% more damage to Stunned or Slowed Heroes.

AcidDrenchedMandibles_anubarak.name: Acid Drenched Mandibles
AcidDrenchedMandibles_anubarak.description: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases Anub'arak's Basic Attack damage by 70% for 3 seconds.

AdaniumShell_fenix.name: Adanium Shell
AdaniumShell_fenix.description: After arriving with Warp, gain 50 Armor for 4 seconds.

Adaptation_dehaka.name: Adaptation
Adaptation_dehaka.description: After 4 seconds, heal for 100% of the damage Dehaka took over this period.

AdhesivePetroleum_blaze.name: Adhesive Petroleum
AdhesivePetroleum_blaze.description: Enemies standing in Oil Spill when it is Ignited are Slowed by 30% for 2.5 seconds.

AdrenalOverload_abathur.name: Adrenal Overload
AdrenalOverload_abathur.description: Symbiote host gains 25% increased Attack Speed.

AdrenalineBoost_abathur.name: Adrenaline Boost
AdrenalineBoost_abathur.description: Symbiote's Carapace increases the Movement Speed of the target by 40% for 3.5 seconds.

AdrenalineRush_valeera.name: Adrenaline Rush
AdrenalineRush_valeera.description: While in the Smoke Bomb, Valeera regenerates an additional 40 Energy per second.

AdrenalineStimpack_blaze.name: Adrenaline Stimpack
AdrenalineStimpack_blaze.description: Activate to gain 100% Attack Speed and 25% Movement Speed for 5 seconds.

AdunsWisdom_tassadar.name: Adun's Wisdom
AdunsWisdom_tassadar.description: While Oracle is active, Basic Abilities cooldown 50% faster.

AdvancedArtillery_sgthammer.name: Advanced Artillery
AdvancedArtillery_sgthammer.description: Increase Siege Mode's splash damage to 25.25% of Basic Attack damage, and increase its splash radius by 25%.

AdvancedCloaking_nova.name: Advanced Cloaking
AdvancedCloaking_nova.description: After being Stealthed for 2 seconds, gain an additional 10% Movement Speed. While Stealthed, regenerate 2 Mana per second.

AdvancedLavaStrike_sgthammer.name: Advanced Lava Strike
AdvancedLavaStrike_sgthammer.description: Napalm Strike's range is increased by 75% and its impact does 50% more damage.

AdvancedTargeting_fenix.name: Advanced Targeting
AdvancedTargeting_fenix.description: Quest: Hitting enemy Heroes with Plasma Cutter permanently increases Fenix's Basic Attack damage by 0.5, up to 60. Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, Plasma Cutter circles an additional time.

AegisofLight_yrel.name: Aegis of Light
AegisofLight_yrel.description: Upon landing, Avenging Wrath grants other nearby allied Heroes 35 Armor for 5 seconds.

AerieGusts_falstad.name: Aerie Gusts
AerieGusts_falstad.description: Reduces the activation time for Tailwind from 6 to 3 seconds, and increases the Movement Speed bonus from 15% to 25%.

AetherWalker_liming.name: Aether Walker
AetherWalker_liming.description: If Li-Ming hasn't taken damage in the last 3 seconds, Teleport costs no mana and its cooldown is decreased by 2 seconds.

Afterburner_falstad.name: Afterburner
Afterburner_falstad.description: Barrel Roll increases Movement Speed by 60%, decaying over 3 seconds.

AggressionMatrix_dva.name: Aggression Matrix
AggressionMatrix_dva.description: Basic Attacks in Mech Mode against Heroes lower the cooldown of Defense Matrix by 0.25 seconds.

AggressiveMatrix_probius.name: Aggressive Matrix
AggressiveMatrix_probius.description: Pylon's Power Field grants allied Heroes 35% increased Attack Damage.

AggressiveShredding_etc.name: Aggressive Shredding
AggressiveShredding_etc.description: E.T.C.'s Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Guitar Solo by 0.75 second.

AgileDismount_genji.name: Agile Dismount
AgileDismount_genji.description: While mounted, the range of Cyber Agility is increased by 70% and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.

AimDownSights_ana.name: Aim Down Sights
AimDownSights_ana.description: Shrike can be activated to increase vision radius by 100% and Basic Attack range by 2 but reduce Movement Speed by 20%. Lasts until canceled.

AirAlly_kharazim.name: Air Ally
AirAlly_kharazim.description: Place an Air Ally that grants vision and reveals a large area around it. Has 75 (+4% per level) Health and lasts 40 seconds. Kharazim can Radiant Dash to Air Allies.  Stores up to 2 charges.

AirStrike_ana.name: Air Strike
AirStrike_ana.description: Activate to use Biotic Grenade with a 200% increased range, but Grenades thrown this way take 3 seconds to land.  Passive: Reduce Biotic Grenade cooldown by 4 seconds.

AldorPeacekeeper_yrel.name: Aldor Peacekeeper
AldorPeacekeeper_yrel.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Vindication at maximum charge deal 30% less damage for 3 seconds.

Allegrissimo_orphea.name: Allegrissimo
Allegrissimo_orphea.description: Hitting Heroes with the end of Shadow Waltz sets its cooldown to 1 second.

AloneintheDark_malganis.name: Alone in the Dark
AloneintheDark_malganis.description: Enemy Heroes put to Sleep by Night Rush have their vision greatly reduced during the Sleep and for 2 seconds after.

AlphaKiller_greymane.name: Alpha Killer
AlphaKiller_greymane.description: Worgen Basic Attacks against Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 3% of the Hero's maximum Health.

AlphaWolf_thrall.name: Alpha Wolf
AlphaWolf_thrall.description: For 3 seconds after a Hero is hit by Feral Spirit, Thrall's Basic Attacks against them deal an additional 3% of the target's maximum Health as damage.  Passive: Increase the duration of Feral Spirit's Root to 1.5 seconds.

AmaniHide_zuljin.name: Amani Hide
AmaniHide_zuljin.description: Lower the cooldown of Amani Rage by 10 seconds and gain 15 Armor while you are regenerating Health from it.

AmaniRage_zuljin.name: Amani Rage
AmaniRage_zuljin.description: Activate to cause Zul'jin to instantly lose 50% of his current Health and heal for that amount over 10 seconds. Zul'jin gains 5 Armor while regenerating health from Amani Rage.

AmaniResilience_zuljin.name: Amani Resilience
AmaniResilience_zuljin.description: Increase Taz'dingo's duration by 1 second. Upon expiring, Zul'jin heals for 50% of the damage he dealt during Taz'dingo.

AmateurOpponent_artanis.name: Amateur Opponent
AmateurOpponent_artanis.description: Twin Blades attacks deal 150% bonus damage to non-Heroes.

Ambush_sgthammer.name: Ambush
Ambush_sgthammer.description: Gain Stealth when entering Siege Mode or after not taking or dealing damage for 3 seconds while in Siege Mode. Basic Attacks while Stealthed deal 100% more damage.

AmplifyDamage_xul.name: Amplify Damage
AmplifyDamage_xul.description: Enemies Rooted by Bone Prison lose 25 Armor for 1.75 seconds.

AncestralHealing_rehgar.name: Ancestral Healing
AncestralHealing_rehgar.description: After 1 second, heal an allied Hero for 1180 (+4% per level) Health.  Cannot be used on Rehgar.

AncestralStrength_orphea.name: Ancestral Strength
AncestralStrength_orphea.description: Non-Heroic Abilities deal 20% more damage to Stunned, Rooted, Silenced or Slowed enemies and grant 1 additional Chaos when hitting Heroes.

AncestralWrath_thrall.name: Ancestral Wrath
AncestralWrath_thrall.description: Activate to consume 8 stacks of Ancestral Wrath, damaging a target enemy Hero for 15% of their maximum Health over 3 seconds, and healing Thrall for 150% of the damage dealt.  Gain 1 stack of Ancestral Wrath every time Frostwolf Resilience activates.

AncientBlessings_deckard.name: Ancient Blessings
AncientBlessings_deckard.description: Activate Fortitude of the Faithful to empower nearby allied Hero Basic Attacks for 8 seconds, causing them to deal an additional 62 damage in an area and heal for 90 for each Hero hit.

AncientFlame_alexstrasza.name: Ancient Flame
AncientFlame_alexstrasza.description: While Dragonqueen is active, Alexstrasza's Basic Attacks apply Flame Buffet, but her Attack Speed is reduced by 24.699%.

AndarielsVisage_xul.name: Andariel's Visage
AndarielsVisage_xul.description: Poison Nova heals for 50% of the damage dealt.  Passive: Skeletal Warriors deal 50% increased damage.

AndorhalAnomaly_chromie.name: Andorhal Anomaly
AndorhalAnomaly_chromie.description: Time Trap gains 2 charges, and when the cooldown finishes, Chromie gains all charges at once. Maximum 3 active Time Traps.

AngelofDeath_malthael.name: Angel of Death
AngelofDeath_malthael.description: Last Rites heals for 100% of the damage dealt, and its current and future cooldown reduction bonuses are doubled.

AngelofJustice_tyrael.name: Angel of Justice
AngelofJustice_tyrael.description: Increases the cast range of Judgment by 50%, and reduces the cooldown by 40 seconds.

AngelicArmaments_imperius.name: Angelic Armaments
AngelicArmaments_imperius.description: Summon a ring of blazing swords that grants 1000 Shield for 3 seconds.  If the Shield lasts the full duration, this ability can be reactivated within 5 seconds to launch 6 swords toward an area, each dealing 140 damage to the first enemy hit.

AngelicFlight_auriel.name: Angelic Flight
AngelicFlight_auriel.description: After 2 seconds, fly to a target location.

Anger_mephisto.name: Anger
Anger_mephisto.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes activate Lord of Hatred, reducing Basic Ability cooldowns by 1 second.

AnimalHusbandry_rexxar.name: Animal Husbandry
AnimalHusbandry_rexxar.description: Rexxar and Misha gain 2 Maximum Health every second Rexxar remains alive. These bonuses are lost on Rexxar's death.

Animosity_mephisto.name: Animosity
Animosity_mephisto.description: Activate to extend the duration of Lightning Nova by 2.5 seconds.  Passive: Basic Attacks while Lightning Nova is active cause an immediate pulse of Lightning Nova damage.

AnnihilatingSpirit_nazeebo.name: Annihilating Spirit
AnnihilatingSpirit_nazeebo.description: Increases the range of Ravenous Spirit by 50% and Movement Speed by 30%.

AnotherRound_chen.name: Another Round
AnotherRound_chen.description: Increases the radius of Keg Smash by 50%. After hitting an enemy Hero with Keg Smash, the cooldown of the next Basic Ability used will be reduced by 3 seconds.

AntiArmorShells_nova.name: Anti-Armor Shells
AntiArmorShells_nova.description: Nova's Basic Attacks deal 250% damage and decrease the Physical Armor of Heroic targets by 10 for 3 seconds, but her Attack Speed is proportionally slower.

AntiMagicShell_arthas.name: Anti-Magic Shell
AntiMagicShell_arthas.description: Activate to make Arthas immune to Spell Damage for 3 seconds and heal Arthas for 25% of the damage prevented.

ApexPredator_dehaka.name: Apex Predator
ApexPredator_dehaka.description: Reduces Brushstalker's cooldown by 25 seconds and the cast time by 0.5 seconds.

Apocalypse_diablo.name: Apocalypse
Apocalypse_diablo.description: Create a demonic rune under each enemy Hero on the battleground. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 137 (+4% per level) damage and stunning them for 1.75 seconds.

ApolloSuit_nova.name: Apollo Suit
ApolloSuit_nova.description: Reduce the cooldown of Permanent Cloak from by 2 seconds.

AppliedForce_alarak.name: Applied Force
AppliedForce_alarak.description: Reduce Sadism by 10%, but Telekinesis pushes 20% further and has 20% increased range.

ArcaneBrilliance_medivh.name: Arcane Brilliance
ArcaneBrilliance_medivh.description: Activate to instantly restore 200 mana to all nearby allied Heroes and grant them 10% Spell Power for 10 seconds.

ArcaneCharge_medivh.name: Arcane Charge
ArcaneCharge_medivh.description: When Arcane Rift damages an enemy Hero, the next Arcane Rift deals 15% more damage.

ArcaneEchoes_kelthuzad.name: Arcane Echoes
ArcaneEchoes_kelthuzad.description: Whenever Kel'Thuzad hits an enemy Hero with Death and Decay's explosion, its cooldown is reduced by 1.5 seconds.

ArcaneExplosion_medivh.name: Arcane Explosion
ArcaneExplosion_medivh.description: When Force of Will expires, it deals 80 damage to nearby enemies, plus 50% of the damage it prevented, up to 315 additional damage.

ArcaneIntellect_jaina.name: Arcane Intellect
ArcaneIntellect_jaina.description: Dealing damage to a Chilled target returns Mana to Jaina. Basic Attacks return 5 Mana and Abilities return 20.

ArcaneOrbit_liming.name: Arcane Orbit
ArcaneOrbit_liming.description: Arcane Orb travels 25% farther, doing up to 25% more damage.

ArcaniteAxes_zuljin.name: Arcanite Axes
ArcaniteAxes_zuljin.description: Quest: Twin Cleave's damage is permanently increased by 0.75 every time it hits a Hero.

Archon_tassadar.name: Archon
Archon_tassadar.description: Tassadar transforms into an Archon and gains a Plasma Shield. His Basic Attacks deal 158 (+4% per level) damage, slow the target by 30% for 1 second and splash for 79 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within 2.5 range. Lasts for 10 seconds.  Passive: Archon refreshes the cooldown of Dimensional Shift.

ArchonPurePower_liming.name: Archon: Pure Power
ArchonPurePower_liming.description: Activate to enter Archon form, allowing Li-Ming to repeatedly use Disintegrate, but be unable to cast other Abilities.

ArdentDefender_yrel.name: Ardent Defender
ArdentDefender_yrel.description: Surround Yrel in a barrier for 3 seconds, absorbing all damage taken and healing her for 50% of the damage received.

ArdentRestoration_tyrael.name: Ardent Restoration
ArdentRestoration_tyrael.description: Dealing damage to a Hero heals Tyrael for 15 Health over 5 seconds. Dealing damage resets this timer, and the heal amount stacks up to 10 times.

ARKReaktor_gazlowe.name: ARK Reaktor
ARKReaktor_gazlowe.description: Reduces Xplodium Charge's cooldown by 2 seconds.  If Xplodium Charge hits an enemy Hero, gain 2 charges of Rock-It! Turret.

ArmorofFaith_uther.name: Armor of Faith
ArmorofFaith_uther.description: Being Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced grants Uther 90 Mana and causes Holy Light's cooldown to recharge 200% faster for 6 seconds. This effect has a 20 second cooldown.

ArmoroftheArchlich_kelthuzad.name: Armor of the Archlich
ArmoroftheArchlich_kelthuzad.description: Activate to gain 50 Physical Armor for 4 seconds. Upon activation, nearby enemies take 45 (+4% per level) damage and are Slowed by 35% for 4 seconds.

ArmorPiercingRounds_tychus.name: Armor Piercing Rounds
ArmorPiercingRounds_tychus.description: Increases Overkill's damage to the primary target by 50%.

ArmoredAssault_maiev.name: Armored Assault
ArmoredAssault_maiev.description: While Maiev has positive Armor of any kind, all Physical Damage dealt is increased by 20%.

ArmyofHell_azmodan.name: Army of Hell
ArmyofHell_azmodan.description: Summon Demon Warrior spawns an additional Demon, but its cooldown is increased by 10 seconds.

ArmyoftheDead_arthas.name: Army of the Dead
ArmyoftheDead_arthas.description: Summons Ghouls that last 15 seconds. Sacrifice Ghouls to heal for 267 (+4% per level) Health.

ArreatCrater_sonya.name: Arreat Crater
ArreatCrater_sonya.description: Leap leaves behind an impassable crater for 5 seconds.  Reduces Leap's cooldown by 20 seconds.

Arsenal_valla.name: Arsenal
Arsenal_valla.description: Multishot also fires 3 grenades which deal 120 (+4% per level) damage. Each enemy Hero hit by a grenade reduces the cooldown of Multishot by 2 seconds.

ArsenalOvercharge_fenix.name: Arsenal Overcharge
ArsenalOvercharge_fenix.description: Fenix's Basic Attacks reduce his Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.

ArsenalSynergy_fenix.name: Arsenal Synergy
ArsenalSynergy_fenix.description: After hitting enemy Heroes with Basic Attacks 3 times while Repeater Cannon is active, the next Basic Attack with Phase Bomb deals 150% more damage and splashes in a 50% larger area.

ArtofChaos_azmodan.name: Art of Chaos
ArtofChaos_azmodan.description: If Globe of Annihilation hits 2 or more Heroes, restore 30 Mana and gain an extra 4 Annihilation.

AspectoftheBeast_rexxar.name: Aspect of the Beast
AspectoftheBeast_rexxar.description: Misha's Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of Misha, Charge! by 1.25 seconds.

AspectoftheHawk_rexxar.name: Aspect of the Hawk
AspectoftheHawk_rexxar.description: When Spirit Swoop hits an enemy Hero, Rexxar gains 125% Attack Speed for 4 seconds. Misha's Basic Attacks increase the duration of this buff by 0.75 seconds.

Assassinate_valeera.name: Assassinate
Assassinate_valeera.description: Ambush deals 50% additional damage and reduces the target's Armor by an additional 10 if no other enemy Heroes are within 4 range of the victim.

AssaultStrain_abathur.name: Assault Strain
AssaultStrain_abathur.description: Locust Basic Attacks cleave for 50% damage, and explode on death for 102 (+4% per level) damage.

AssimilationBlades_kerrigan.name: Assimilation Blades
AssimilationBlades_kerrigan.description: Damaging an enemy increase Basic Attack damage by 2% for 5 seconds, up to 40%.

AssimilationMastery_kerrigan.name: Assimilation Mastery
AssimilationMastery_kerrigan.description: Regeneration Globe healing grants 45 points of Assimilation Shields per second while active. While Assimilation is active, Kerrigan's Health and Mana regeneration is increased by 150%.

AstralCommunion_malfurion.name: Astral Communion
AstralCommunion_malfurion.description: Activate to Channel for 1 second, and then instantly teleport and cast Twilight Dream at the targeted location.  Cooldown is shared with Twilight Dream.  Passive: Increase Twilight Dream's Silence duration to 4 seconds.

AstralPresence_liming.name: Astral Presence
AstralPresence_liming.description: Li-Ming's Mana regeneration is increased by 100% while below 25% Mana.

AugmentedGuard_genji.name: Augmented Guard
AugmentedGuard_genji.description: When Deflect ends, Genji gains a Shield equal to 50% of the damage blocked for 4 seconds.

AuxiliaryShields_fenix.name: Auxiliary Shields
AuxiliaryShields_fenix.description: Permanently reduce Fenix's maximum Health by 30% but increase Shield Capacitor's Shield by 40%. Basic Attacks regenerate Shields equal to 10% of the damage dealt.

Avatar_muradin.name: Avatar
Avatar_muradin.description: Transform for 20 seconds, gaining 1053 (+4% per level) Health.

BackintheMix_lucio.name: Back in the Mix
BackintheMix_lucio.description: Heal for 245 (+4% per level) upon entering a Stun, Silence, or Time Stop effect. This cannot happen more than once every 10 seconds.

Backbiter_orphea.name: Backbiter
Backbiter_orphea.description: If Chomp hits a Hero, Orphea immediately dashes a short distance backwards.  Passive: Gain 10%  maximum Health.

Backdraft_kaelthas.name: Backdraft
Backdraft_kaelthas.description: Living Bomb's explosion slows enemy Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds.

Backlash_xul.name: Backlash
Backlash_xul.description: When Bone Armor expires, nearby enemy Heroes take damage equal to 12% of their maximum Health.

BaleogtheFierce_thelostvikings.name: Baleog the Fierce
BaleogtheFierce_thelostvikings.description: Baleog's Basic Attacks increase his Attack Speed by 8%, stacking up to 5 times. After 3 seconds of not attacking, these stacks will rapidly decay.

BallLightning_cassia.name: Ball Lightning
BallLightning_cassia.description: Throw a ball of lightning at an enemy Hero that bounces up to 6 times between nearby enemy Heroes and Cassia, dealing 180 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit.

BallisticAdvantage_ana.name: Ballistic Advantage
BallisticAdvantage_ana.description: Eye of Horus rounds explodes upon impacting a Hero, healing nearby allies for 300 (+4% per level) and dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemy Heroes.

Ballistospores_abathur.name: Ballistospores
Ballistospores_abathur.description: Increases Toxic Nest's range to global and increases duration by 25%.

BannerofDalaran_varian.name: Banner of Dalaran
BannerofDalaran_varian.description: Activate to place a Banner that grants 20% increased Spell Power to nearby allied Heroes. Lasts 12 seconds.

BannerofIronforge_varian.name: Banner of Ironforge
BannerofIronforge_varian.description: Activate to place a Banner that grants 20 Armor to nearby allied Heroes, reducing damage taken by 20%. Lasts 12 seconds.

BannerofStormwind_varian.name: Banner of Stormwind
BannerofStormwind_varian.description: Activate to place a Banner that grants 25% increased Movement Speed to nearby allied Heroes. Lasts 12 seconds.

BarbedChains_kelthuzad.name: Barbed Chains
BarbedChains_kelthuzad.description: Increase Chains of Kel'Thuzad damage by 125%. After gaining 30 Blight, Chains of Kel'Thuzad reduces the Armor of pulled Heroes by 10 for 4 seconds.

BarbedShot_sylvanas.name: Barbed Shot
BarbedShot_sylvanas.description: Hitting the same enemy with 5 shots of Withering Fire causes the 5th shot to deal 350% bonus damage.

Barricade_sgthammer.name: Barricade
Barricade_sgthammer.description: Concussive Blast creates an impassable wall in front of Sgt. Hammer for 4 seconds.

BatteredAssault_illidan.name: Battered Assault
BatteredAssault_illidan.description: Increase Sweeping Strike's Basic Attack damage bonus duration from 3 to 5 seconds. If Sweeping Strike hits 2 Heroes its damage bonus is increased from 35% to 125%.

BattleHunger_imperius.name: Battle Hunger
BattleHunger_imperius.description: Heal for 82 Health for every Valorous Brand mark consumed.

BattleRage_sonya.name: Battle Rage
BattleRage_sonya.description: Activate to instantly restore 10% of Sonya's maximum Health. Stores up to 3 charges.  Passive: Sonya deals 25% more damage to Mercenaries.

Battleborn_azmodan.name: Battleborn
Battleborn_azmodan.description: Azmodan's Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Summon Demon Warrior by 0.75 seconds and Demon Lieutenant by 1.5 second.

BeaconofLight_uther.name: Beacon of Light
BeaconofLight_uther.description: While below 50% Health, Uther receives 200% more self-healing when healing others with Holy Light.

BeatMixing_lucio.name: Beat Mixing
BeatMixing_lucio.description: After switching Crossfade tracks, if the next song plays for at least 1.5 seconds, LÃºcio gains a 100 (+4% per level) point Shield that lasts indefinitely.  Switching tracks again removes the Shield.

BedofBarbs_anubarak.name: Bed of Barbs
BedofBarbs_anubarak.description: Create a bed of spikes along Impale's path that slows enemies by 25% and deals 21 (+4% per level) damage per second.  Spikes persist for 3.5 seconds.

BeetleJuiced_anubarak.name: Beetle, Juiced
BeetleJuiced_anubarak.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack against enemy Heroes spawns a Beetle.

BehemothArmor_raynor.name: Behemoth Armor
BehemothArmor_raynor.description: Gain 200 bonus maximum Health. Quest: Every time Give 'Em Some Pepper's primary target is a Hero, gain an additional 5 maximum Health.

Benediction_uther.name: Benediction
Benediction_uther.description: Activate to reduce the Mana cost of Uther's next Basic Ability by 50 and its cooldown by 10 seconds.

BestialWrath_rexxar.name: Bestial Wrath
BestialWrath_rexxar.description: Increases Misha's Basic Attack damage by 150% for 12 seconds.

BigAs_junkrat.name: Big As
BigAs_junkrat.description: Increase Steel Trap's radius and damage by 50%.

BigRedButton_tychus.name: Big Red Button
BigRedButton_tychus.description: Odin lasts 50% longer and Ragnarok Missiles also launches a Nuclear Missile which lands 2.5 seconds later.

BigShot_dva.name: Big Shot
BigShot_dva.description: Deal 250 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in a line. The cooldown of Call Mech is reduced by 8 seconds for each enemy Hero hit.  Requires Pilot Mode.

BigTunaKahuna_murky.name: Big Tuna Kahuna
BigTunaKahuna_murky.description: Murky's maximum Health and Egg respawn time are doubled.

BigVoodoo_nazeebo.name: Big Voodoo
BigVoodoo_nazeebo.description: Increases the Health and Mana bonuses from Voodoo Ritual by 100%.

BileDrop_zagara.name: Bile Drop
BileDrop_zagara.description: Quest: Passively increase the impact radius of Infested Drop by 20%. Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes with Infested Drop, it spawns an additional Roachling.

BioExplosionSwitch_stukov.name: Bio-Explosion Switch
BioExplosionSwitch_stukov.description: Bio-Kill Switch now also detonates Lurking Arm, applying a Weighted Pustule to enemy Heroes inside and Silencing them for 2 seconds.

BioticArmor_stukov.name: Biotic Armor
BioticArmor_stukov.description: Healing Pathogen grants 15 Physical Armor to its targets while active on them. Detonating Bio-Kill Switch increases this bonus by 35 for 2.5 seconds.

BirdofPrey_rexxar.name: Bird of Prey
BirdofPrey_rexxar.description: Increases Spirit Swoop's damage by 150% to Minions.

BirdsEyeView_medivh.name: Bird's Eye View
BirdsEyeView_medivh.description: Permanently increase Raven Form's vision range by 25%. Activate to increase this bonus to 200% for 5 seconds.

BitingCold_arthas.name: Biting Cold
BitingCold_arthas.description: Each second an enemy is damaged by Frozen Tempest, it deals 12.5% bonus damage, up to a 50% bonus.

BlackClaws_malganis.name: Black Claws
BlackClaws_malganis.description: After Mal'Ganis hits an enemy Hero with Fel Claws, his next Basic Attack deals 45% more damage.

BlackHarvest_malthael.name: Black Harvest
BlackHarvest_malthael.description: Quest: Apply Reaper's Mark to Heroes for a total of 180 seconds. Reward: Permanently increase Reaper's Mark's duration by 2 seconds.

BlackPool_azmodan.name: Black Pool
BlackPool_azmodan.description: Globes of Annihilation empowered by Tide of Sin also leave a Black Pool at their impact location for 5 seconds. Enemies within the pool lose 8 per second, up to 56 damage per second.

BladeDance_maiev.name: Blade Dance
BladeDance_maiev.description: Using Fan of Knives deals 50 Physical Damage to enemies around Maiev.

BladeoftheHighlord_alarak.name: Blade of the Highlord
BladeoftheHighlord_alarak.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes increase Sadism by 7% for 4 seconds, stacking up to 35%. Basic Attacks against Heroes refresh this duration.

BladedArmor_maiev.name: Bladed Armor
BladedArmor_maiev.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Fan of Knives grants 5 Armor for 5 seconds, up to 20 Armor.

BladedMomentum_kerrigan.name: Bladed Momentum
BladedMomentum_kerrigan.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes reduce the cooldown of Kerrigan's Basic Abilities by 0.6 seconds.

BlademastersPursuit_samuro.name: Blademaster's Pursuit
BlademastersPursuit_samuro.description: Advancing Strikes grants an additional 15% bonus Movement Speed, and its duration is increased by 2 seconds.

BladesofaTemplar_artanis.name: Blades of a Templar
BladesofaTemplar_artanis.description: Increase Attack Speed by 30%. Basic Attacks Slow by 20% for 1.25 seconds.

BladesofAzzinoth_illidan.name: Blades of Azzinoth
BladesofAzzinoth_illidan.description: Hitting 5 Heroes with Sweeping Strike allows Blades of Azzinoth to be activated, increasing Basic Attack damage by 75% for 8 seconds.

Bladestorm_samuro.name: Bladestorm
Bladestorm_samuro.description: Become an Unstoppable whirlwind of death, dealing 235 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

BlastEcho_ragnaros.name: Blast Echo
BlastEcho_ragnaros.description: After Blast Wave explodes, another Blast Wave is created on Ragnaros.

BlastShield_ltmorales.name: Blast Shield
BlastShield_ltmorales.description: Heroes hit by Displacement Grenade generate 2 Energy and grant Lt. Morales a Shield equal to 6% of her maximum Health, stacking up to 5 times.

BlazeofGlory_imperius.name: Blaze of Glory
BlazeofGlory_imperius.description: Solarion's Fire leaves a line of scorched earth along its center, exploding after 2 seconds and dealing 125 damage.

BlazingFists_kharazim.name: Blazing Fists
BlazingFists_kharazim.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack reduces the cooldown of Deadly Reach by 0.75 seconds.

BlessedChampion_uther.name: Blessed Champion
BlessedChampion_uther.description: For the next 5 seconds after using Holy Light, Uther's Basic Attacks heal him and nearby allies for 15% of the total amount healed by Holy Light.

BlessedHammer_johanna.name: Blessed Hammer
BlessedHammer_johanna.description: Activate to create 2 hammers that spiral outward from Johanna, dealing 84 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit.  Hitting Heroes with Shield Glare reduces the cooldown of this Ability by 8 seconds.

BlessedMomentum_johanna.name: Blessed Momentum
BlessedMomentum_johanna.description: Basic Attacks reduce Johanna's Basic Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.

BlessedShield_johanna.name: Blessed Shield
BlessedShield_johanna.description: Deal 114 (+4% per level) damage and Stun the first enemy hit for 1.5 seconds. Blessed Shield then bounces to 2 nearby enemies, dealing 57 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.75 seconds.

BlessingoftheRed_alexstrasza.name: Blessing of the Red
BlessingoftheRed_alexstrasza.description: Activate to grant an allied Hero 500 bonus maximum Health until they die.  Cannot be used on Alexstrasza, or on a Hero who already has Blessing of the Red.

BlessingsOfYulon_lili.name: Blessings Of Yu'lon
BlessingsOfYulon_lili.description: Cloud Serpent heals its bearer for 1.25% of their maximum Health each time it attacks.

Blight_stitches.name: Blight
Blight_stitches.description: Activate to apply Vile Gas to all nearby enemies. Enemy heroes hit receive 20% less healing for 5 seconds.  Passive: Vile Gas heals Stitches for 33% of the damage dealt.

BlightedFrost_kelthuzad.name: Blighted Frost
BlightedFrost_kelthuzad.description: Frost Nova deals 75% more damage to enemies in the center. After gaining 30 Blight, increase Frost Nova's Root duration by 0.5 seconds.

Blind_valeera.name: Blind
Blind_valeera.description: Increase the duration of Cheap Shot's Blind by 2.5 seconds.

BlindasaBat_malganis.name: Blind as a Bat
BlindasaBat_malganis.description: Activate to erupt with blind rage, removing the cooldown and Mana cost of Fel Claws, but losing all vision. Lasts 6 seconds.

BlindedByTheLight_johanna.name: Blinded By The Light
BlindedByTheLight_johanna.description: Activate to grant nearby allied Heroes a Shield equal to 25% of their maximum Health for 3 seconds.  Hitting Heroes with Shield Glare reduces the cooldown of this Ability by 5 seconds.

BlindingFlash_auriel.name: Blinding Flash
BlindingFlash_auriel.description: Enemies hit by the center area of Sacred Sweep are blinded for 2 seconds.

BlindingSpeed_kharazim.name: Blinding Speed
BlindingSpeed_kharazim.description: Decreases Radiant Dash's cooldown by 2 seconds and increases the maximum number of charges by 1.

BlinkHeal_brightwing.name: Blink Heal
BlinkHeal_brightwing.description: Teleport to a nearby ally. When teleporting to a Hero, heal them for 200.  Stores up to 2 charges.

BlisteringAttacks_ragnaros.name: Blistering Attacks
BlisteringAttacks_ragnaros.description: Every 10 seconds, Ragnaros's next Basic Attack against a Hero deals 60% bonus damage. Hitting enemies with Basic Abilities reduces this cooldown by 1 second.

Block_muradin.name: Block
Block_muradin.description: Every 5 seconds, gain 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

BlockParty_etc.name: Block Party
BlockParty_etc.description: Using a Basic or Heroic ability also gives nearby allied Heroes a stack of Block, granting 50 Physical Armor against the next Hero Basic Attack for 8 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%. Maximum 2 stacks of Block.

BloodandThunder_rehgar.name: Blood and Thunder
BloodandThunder_rehgar.description: Ghost Wolf attacks reduce Basic Ability cooldowns by 2 seconds.

BloodFrenzy_thebutcher.name: Blood Frenzy
BloodFrenzy_thebutcher.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant 5% increased Attack and Movement Speed for 3 seconds, up to 25%.

BloodRitual_nazeebo.name: Blood Ritual
BloodRitual_nazeebo.description: If an enemy dies while poisoned by Voodoo Ritual, restore 2% of Nazeebo's maximum Health and Mana.

BloodRush_malganis.name: Blood Rush
BloodRush_malganis.description: When Mal'Ganis is healed by a Hero, he gains 1% Movement Speed for 8 seconds, up to 15%.

Bloodcraze_garrosh.name: Bloodcraze
Bloodcraze_garrosh.description: When hitting a Hero, Bloodthirst heals for an additional 15% of Garrosh's maximum Health over 3 seconds.

Bloodlust_rehgar.name: Bloodlust
Bloodlust_rehgar.description: Grant nearby allied Heroes 40% Attack Speed and 25% Movement Speed and causes them to heal for 30% of the Basic Attack damage to their primary target. Lasts for 8 seconds.

BlossomSwell_lunara.name: Blossom Swell
BlossomSwell_lunara.description: Increases Noxious Blossom's range by 25% and its radius by 20%.

BluntForceGun_sgthammer.name: Blunt Force Gun
BluntForceGun_sgthammer.description: Fire a missile across the battlefield, dealing 500 (+3% per level) damage to non-Structure enemies in its path.

BobandWeave_tychus.name: Bob and Weave
BobandWeave_tychus.description: Run and Gun and Odin's Thrusters gain 2 additional charges and reduces Run and Gun's Mana cost from 50 to 25.

BodyCheck_garrosh.name: Body Check
BodyCheck_garrosh.description: Activate to deal 111 (+4% per level) damage to a target enemy and Slow them by 30% for 2 seconds.  Damage is increased by 200% of Armor Up's current bonus, and the Slow amount is increased by 30% if Armor Up's bonus is above 25.

BoggedDown_junkrat.name: Bogged Down
BoggedDown_junkrat.description: Enemies launched by Concussion Mine are Slowed by 60% for 2 seconds upon landing.

BolderFlavor_chen.name: Bolder Flavor
BolderFlavor_chen.description: Fortifying Brew instantly Shields Chen for 318 (+4% per level). Additionally, Shields persist for 1 extra second after he stops drinking.

BoltoftheStorm_etc.name: Bolt of the Storm
BoltoftheStorm_etc.description: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

BombsAway_gall.name: Bomb's Away
BombsAway_gall.description: Quest: Damaging a Hero with Runic Blast increases its damage by 5, up to 200. Reward: After damaging 20 Heroes, the range and speed of Cho's Rune Bomb is increased by 20%.

BombardStrain_abathur.name: Bombard Strain
BombardStrain_abathur.description: Locust's Basic Attacks become a long-range siege attack that deal 70% more damage.

Bombardment_azmodan.name: Bombardment
Bombardment_azmodan.description: After casting Globe of Annihilation, Azmodan's Basic Attacks within the next 3 seconds have an additional 1.5 range and can hit 2 additional targets. Hitting Heroes with Basic Attacks empowered by Bombardment grant 1 Annihilation.

BondofAnguish_orphea.name: Bond of Anguish
BondofAnguish_orphea.description: Shadow Waltz deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 3% of their maximum Health, healing Orphea for 50% of damage dealt.

BondsofCorruption_maiev.name: Bonds of Corruption
BondsofCorruption_maiev.description: Enemy Heroes pulled by Umbral Bind have their Physical Armor reduced by 25 for 4 seconds.

BondsofJustice_maiev.name: Bonds of Justice
BondsofJustice_maiev.description: Quest: Each tether applied to a secondary target of Umbral Bind permanently increases Umbral Bind's pull damage by 15. Reward: After applying 5 tethers to secondary targets, increase Umbral Bind's pull damage by 75. Reward: After applying 10 tethers to secondary targets, increase Umbral Bind's cleave damage by 30%.

BoneSpear_xul.name: Bone Spear
BoneSpear_xul.description: Deal 230 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a line.

Boneslicer_zuljin.name: Boneslicer
Boneslicer_zuljin.description: Grievous Throw now pierces through all enemies hit and restores 15 Mana per Hero hit. Additionally, Grievous Throw's mark is no longer removed by Basic Attacks.

BonusTrack_lucio.name: Bonus Track
BonusTrack_lucio.description: Swapping Crossfade tracks while Amp It Up is active will set Amp It Up back to its max duration.  Can only happen once per cast.

BonzerHits_junkrat.name: Bonzer Hits
BonzerHits_junkrat.description: Quest: Hit enemy Heroes 12 times with Concussion Mine. Reward: Concussion Mine deals 40% more damage and knocks enemies back 30% farther.

BOOMPOW_junkrat.name: BOOM POW
BOOMPOW_junkrat.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Concussion Mine reduces its cooldown by 12 seconds.

Boombox_lucio.name: Boombox
Boombox_lucio.description: Place a boombox that plays LÃºcio's active Crossfade track for 30 seconds. Its volume adjusts with Amp It up.  Crossfade tracks do not stack.

BOOMerang_falstad.name: BOOMerang
BOOMerang_falstad.description: Reactivate Hammerang mid-flight to deal 165 (+4% per level) damage around the hammer.

BorninBattle_zarya.name: Born in Battle
BorninBattle_zarya.description: While at or above 75 Energy, Zarya's cooldowns regenerate 25% faster.

BossaNova_lucio.name: Bossa Nova
BossaNova_lucio.description: Reduce the cooldown of Sound Barrier to 30 seconds, but the shield now decays over 4 seconds.

BottomlessFlask_deckard.name: Bottomless Flask
BottomlessFlask_deckard.description: After use, Healing Potions recharge after 8 seconds.

BouncyBouncy_junkrat.name: Bouncy Bouncy
BouncyBouncy_junkrat.description: Upon colliding with terrain for the first time, Frag Launcher grenades deal 20% more damage.

BoundbyLaw_tyrael.name: Bound by Law
BoundbyLaw_tyrael.description: Increase El'druin's Might's Slow by 10%. Tyrael's Basic Attacks against enemies Slowed by El'druin's Might increase the Slow duration by 1 second, up to 4 seconds.

BoundbyShadow_guldan.name: Bound by Shadow
BoundbyShadow_guldan.description: Each enemy Hero hit with Fel Flame reduces the cooldown of Corruption by 1 second.

BoundlessFury_kerrigan.name: Boundless Fury
BoundlessFury_kerrigan.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Ravage grants a charge of Ravage. Can only occur once every 10 seconds per Hero.

BoundlessStride_lunara.name: Boundless Stride
BoundlessStride_lunara.description: All Leaping Strike charges are returned every 15 seconds. Leaping Strike can be used on allies.

BountyHunter_raynor.name: Bounty Hunter
BountyHunter_raynor.description: If Give 'Em Some Pepper's target is a Hero, it deals an additional 3% of their maximum Health as damage and grants Raynor 10 Armor for 3 seconds.  Active Give 'Em Some Pepper to apply it to Raynor's next Basic Attack.

BreakitDown_gazlowe.name: Break it Down!
BreakitDown_gazlowe.description: Scrap causes Abilities to cooldown four times as fast for 3 seconds.

BrewmastersBalance_chen.name: Brewmaster's Balance
BrewmastersBalance_chen.description: While at or below 50 Brew, gain 20% Movement Speed. While at or above 50 Brew, regenerate an additional 18 (+4% per level) Health per second.

BringItOn_dva.name: Bring It On
BringItOn_dva.description: Self-Destruct's Charge amount gained from losing Mech Health is increased by 30%.

BringitTogether_lucio.name: Bring it Together
BringitTogether_lucio.description: If at least 2 Allied Heroes are nearby when Amp It Up is cast, Crossfade's Healing Boost is increased by 45% for the duration.

BronzebeardRage_muradin.name: Bronzebeard Rage
BronzebeardRage_muradin.description: Deal 19 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Basic Attacks against a Hero that is Rooted, Stunned or Slowed increase this damage by 100% for 3 seconds.

BroodExpansion_zagara.name: Brood Expansion
BroodExpansion_zagara.description: Reduces the cooldown of Hunter Killer by 7 seconds and its Mana cost by 30.

BrutalStrike_thebutcher.name: Brutal Strike
BrutalStrike_thebutcher.description: After using Hamstring, The Butcher's next 3 Basic Attacks within 5 seconds deal an additional 15% damage.

BruteForce_garrosh.name: Brute Force
BruteForce_garrosh.description: Enemies hit by Body Check receive 50% reduced healing for 4 seconds.

BrutishVanguard_azmodan.name: Brutish Vanguard
BrutishVanguard_azmodan.description: Demon Warriors and Lieutenants gain 25% increased Health. Demon Warriors Slow nearby enemies by 20%.

BubbleHearth_yrel.name: Bubble Hearth
BubbleHearth_yrel.description: After 1 second, Yrel becomes Invulnerable and casts Hearthstone. Cannot be canceled.

BulletSpray_tracer.name: Bullet Spray
BulletSpray_tracer.description: Increases Melee's radius by 40%, and causes it to damage all enemies in range.

BulletTime_tracer.name: Bullet Time
BulletTime_tracer.description: Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of Blink by 0.15 seconds.

BullheadMines_sgthammer.name: Bullhead Mines
BullheadMines_sgthammer.description: Middle Spider Mine knocks target back a short distance.

Bullseye_hanzo.name: Bullseye
Bullseye_hanzo.description: Increase Sonic Arrow's speed and center radius by 100%. Additionally, Heroes hit by Sonic Arrow's center are Stunned for 1 second.

BulwarkofFlame_imperius.name: Bulwark of Flame
BulwarkofFlame_imperius.description: Hitting a Hero with Solarion's Fire grants 70 Physical Armor against the next 2 enemy Hero Basic Attacks. Stores up to 4 Charges.

BulwarkofLight_uther.name: Bulwark of Light
BulwarkofLight_uther.description: Divine Shield lasts 2 seconds longer and its cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds.

BunkerDrop_blaze.name: Bunker Drop
BunkerDrop_blaze.description: After 0.5 seconds, deploy and enter a Bunker with 1300 Health. Blaze and his allies can enter and exit the Bunker at will. While in the Bunker, occupants gain access to Flamethrower, dealing 179 damage to enemies in a line.  Exiting the Bunker 25 Armor for 2 seconds. Bunkers last 10 seconds, or until destroyed.

BunnyHop_dva.name: Bunny Hop
BunnyHop_dva.description: D.Va's Mech becomes Unstoppable and stomps every 0.5 seconds, dealing 60 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing enemies by 40%. Lasts 4 seconds.  Requires Mech Mode.

BuriedAlive_leoric.name: Buried Alive
BuriedAlive_leoric.description: The duration of Entomb is lowered by 1 second, but enemies trapped inside are Silenced and take 50 (+4% per level) damage every 1 second.

BurnNotice_blaze.name: Burn Notice
BurnNotice_blaze.description: Basic Attacks Slow enemies by 5% and deal an additional 18 damage over 2.5 seconds. Stacks up to 5 times.

BurnTheImpure_imperius.name: Burn The Impure
BurnTheImpure_imperius.description: Consuming a Valorous Brand mark deals bonus damage equal to 2.5% of the Hero's maximum Health.

BurnedFlesh_kaelthas.name: Burned Flesh
BurnedFlesh_kaelthas.description: When Flamestrike damages 2 or more Heroes, they take additional damage equal to 8% of their maximum Health.

BurningBlade_samuro.name: Burning Blade
BurningBlade_samuro.description: Critical Strikes unleash a burst of flame, dealing an additional 50% of Samuro's Basic Attack damage to the target and nearby enemies.

BurningDespair_leoric.name: Burning Despair
BurningDespair_leoric.description: Deal 40 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. The damage and area is increased by 100% while Drain Hope is active.

BurningHalo_tyrael.name: Burning Halo
BurningHalo_tyrael.description: While El'Druin's Might is active, both Tyrael and El'druin deal 18 damage per second to nearby enemies. For 2 seconds after teleporting, Tyrael continues to deal this damage and the damage amount is increased by 150%.

BurningRage_anubarak.name: Burning Rage
BurningRage_anubarak.description: Deal 23 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.

BurstFire_junkrat.name: Burst Fire
BurstFire_junkrat.description: Frag Launcher fires all of its charges in a continuous burst, its cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds, but it loses 1 maximum charge.

Buzzsaw_zuljin.name: Buzzsaw
Buzzsaw_zuljin.description: After impact, Guillotine continues forward, dealing 75% damage to enemies hit. If a Hero is killed by Guillotine, Zul'jin is instantly healed to full.

ByeBye_chromie.name: Bye Bye!
ByeBye_chromie.description: Reduce the cast time of Hearthstone by 75%, and it is not interrupted by taking damage.

CThunsGift_cho.name: C'Thun's Gift
CThunsGift_cho.description: Cho's Basic Attack becomes ranged and slows targets by 20% for 2 seconds.

CaduceusFeedback_ltmorales.name: Caduceus Feedback
CaduceusFeedback_ltmorales.description: Increases Attack Range by 1.1 and Basic Attacks against Heroes generate 4 Energy.

CaduceusReactor20_ltmorales.name: Caduceus Reactor 2.0
CaduceusReactor20_ltmorales.description: Increase the healing provided by Caduceus Reactor from 2% to 6% of Lt. Morales's maximum Health per second.

Calamity_liming.name: Calamity
Calamity_liming.description: Teleport does 300 (+3% per level) damage to enemy Heroes near the destination.

CalloftheWildhammer_falstad.name: Call of the Wildhammer
CalloftheWildhammer_falstad.description: Hinterland Blast has double the range and deals 25% more damage.

CalldownMULE_abathur.name: Calldown: MULE
CalldownMULE_abathur.description: Activate to calldown a Mule that repairs Structures, one at a time, near target point for 40 seconds, healing for 100 Health every 1 second.

CallousedHide_cho.name: Calloused Hide
CallousedHide_cho.description: Ogre Hide also increases healing received by 15%.

Caltrops_valla.name: Caltrops
Caltrops_valla.description: Drop 3 Caltrops while Vaulting. Caltrops do 60 (+4% per level) damage and slow enemies by 25% for 1 second. Quest: Spend 160 seconds at 10 stacks of Hatred. Reward: Vault cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.

CantStopWontStop_lucio.name: Can't Stop, Won't Stop
CantStopWontStop_lucio.description: While Wall Ride's Movement Speed bonus is active, LÃºcio is immune to all enemy Slow and Root effects.

Cannibalize_stitches.name: Cannibalize
Cannibalize_stitches.description: Hitting Heroes with Basic Attacks or the inner impact area of Slam heals Stitches for 2% of his maximum Health.

Cannonball_junkrat.name: Cannonball!
Cannonball_junkrat.description: Increase the radius and explosion radius of grenades from Basic Attacks and Frag Launcher by -98.5%.

Cannoneer_liming.name: Cannoneer
Cannoneer_liming.description: When Li-Ming uses an Ability, her next Basic Attack's damage is increased by 75% and deals Spell damage instead of Physical.  Stacks up to 3 times.

CarrionSwarm_malganis.name: Carrion Swarm
CarrionSwarm_malganis.description: After 1 second, disperse into an Invulnerable swarm of bats for 3 seconds, dealing 126 damage per second to enemies. Vampiric Touch heals for 100% of Carrion Swarm's damage to Heroes.

CatchingFire_ragnaros.name: Catching Fire
CatchingFire_ragnaros.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Ragnaros' Health Regeneration by 1.25 per second, up to 18.75. Reward: After gathering 15 Regeneration Globes, activate Catching Fire to gain 25 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

CauterizeWounds_ragnaros.name: Cauterize Wounds
CauterizeWounds_ragnaros.description: Empower Sulfuras heals for an additional 40% of damage dealt to Heroes over 2 seconds.

CelestialAlignment_malfurion.name: Celestial Alignment
CelestialAlignment_malfurion.description: Increases Moonfire's reveal duration by 1 second. Malfurion's basic attacks against Heroes revealed by Moonfire deal 75% more damage.

CelestialAttunement_tyrande.name: Celestial Attunement
CelestialAttunement_tyrande.description: Light of Elune removes Stuns, Silences, and Slows from its target.

CelestialSwiftness_imperius.name: Celestial Swiftness
CelestialSwiftness_imperius.description: Stunning an enemy Hero with Celestial Charge grants 50% Attack Speed and 20% Movement Speed for 5 seconds.

CelestialWrath_tyrande.name: Celestial Wrath
CelestialWrath_tyrande.description: Starfall applies Hunter's Mark to enemy Heroes while inside of its area of effect.

CellularReactor_ltmorales.name: Cellular Reactor
CellularReactor_ltmorales.description: Consume 30 Energy to heal Lt. Morales for 40% of her maximum Health over 4 seconds. Caduceus Reactor is disabled while this is active.

ChainGang_maiev.name: Chain Gang
ChainGang_maiev.description: Tethering at least 2 enemy Heroes with Umbral Bind grants 35 Armor for 4 seconds.

ChainofCommand_azmodan.name: Chain of Command
ChainofCommand_azmodan.description: The cooldown of Demon Lieutenants' Demonic Smite is reduced by 2 seconds and they grant 25% increased damage to nearby friendly Minions, Mercenaries, and Azmodan's summoned Demons.

ChainLink_kelthuzad.name: Chain-Link
ChainLink_kelthuzad.description: Pulling a Hero with Chains of Kel'Thuzad reduces its cooldown by 5 seconds and refunds its Mana cost.

ChainsofIce_kelthuzad.name: Chains of Ice
ChainsofIce_kelthuzad.description: After Chains of Kel'Thuzad's Stun expires, the enemy is also Slowed by 60% for 1 second.

ChangeIsSurvival_dehaka.name: Change Is Survival
ChangeIsSurvival_dehaka.description: Increases Adaptation healing to 200% of the damage received and reduces the cooldown by 30 seconds.

ChaosReigns_alarak.name: Chaos Reigns
ChaosReigns_alarak.description: Quest: Hit Heroes with Discord Strike. Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, increase Discord Strike's damage by 50. Reward: After hitting 2 Heroes with a single Discord Strike, increase its damage by 50. Reward: After hitting 3 Heroes with a single Discord Strike, increase its damage by 80 and instantly gain all other Rewards.

ChaoticEnergy_guldan.name: Chaotic Energy
ChaoticEnergy_guldan.description: Increases the cast range of Drain Life by 25%. Quest: The healing provided by Regen Globes is increased by 50%. Reward: After Gathering 20 Regen Globes Gul'dan's Basic Ability Mana costs are permanently reduced by 20.

ChargedBlast_liming.name: Charged Blast
ChargedBlast_liming.description: Basic Attacking a target recently hit by a Magic Missile does an extra 87 (+4% per level) damage.

ChargedStrikes_cassia.name: Charged Strikes
ChargedStrikes_cassia.description: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage by 20% and cause Basic Attacks against non-Structures to bounce to nearby enemy Heroes for 8 seconds.

ChargedUp_falstad.name: Charged Up
ChargedUp_falstad.description: Increases the number of Lightning Rod strikes by 2 and its range by 25%.

ChasetheBass_lucio.name: Chase the Bass
ChasetheBass_lucio.description: Quest: Hit 20 enemy Heroes with Soundwave. Reward: Increase Soundwave's arc by 50% and its range by 20%.

ChatteringTeeth_junkrat.name: Chattering Teeth
ChatteringTeeth_junkrat.description: Steel Traps will slowly chase nearby enemy Heroes.

CheapShot_thebutcher.name: Cheap Shot
CheapShot_thebutcher.description: Hamstring does 100% more damage to targets affected by a Slow, Root, or Stun.

CheckpointReached_thelostvikings.name: Checkpoint Reached
CheckpointReached_thelostvikings.description: 10 seconds after using Play Again!, any dead Vikings are revived and summoned again, and all are healed to full.

ChillingTouch_kelthuzad.name: Chilling Touch
ChillingTouch_kelthuzad.description: Every 8 seconds, Kel'Thuzad's next Basic Attack hits nearby enemies, deals Spell damage instead of Physical, and Slows by 30% for 2 seconds.

ChitinousPlating_anubarak.name: Chitinous Plating
ChitinousPlating_anubarak.description: While Harden Carapace is active, taking damage from enemy Abilities reduces its cooldown by 1 second, up to 3 seconds.

ChokingPollen_lunara.name: Choking Pollen
ChokingPollen_lunara.description: Noxious Blossom deals 85% more damage to Heroes afflicted by Nature's Toxin, increased to 135% against enemies with 3 stacks.

ChopChop_stitches.name: Chop Chop
ChopChop_stitches.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with the inner impact area of Slam grants 50% increased Attack Speed for 5 seconds.

ChopMeat_thebutcher.name: Chop Meat
ChopMeat_thebutcher.description: Increases Hamstring damage by 100% to Minions and Mercenaries.

ChronoSickness_chromie.name: Chrono Sickness
ChronoSickness_chromie.description: Reduce Time Trap's cooldown and Mana cost by 50%. After the Time Stop ends, the enemy is also Slowed by 35% for 4 seconds.

ChronoSurge_artanis.name: Chrono Surge
ChronoSurge_artanis.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Phase Prism grants 75% bonus Attack Speed for 5 seconds.

Chrysalis_kerrigan.name: Chrysalis
Chrysalis_kerrigan.description: Activate to place Kerrigan in a Chrysalis with 750 Health for 4 seconds. While inside, Kerrigan regenerates 5% of her maximum Health per second.  Enemies can destroy the Chrysalis to end its effects early.

CircleofLife_alexstrasza.name: Circle of Life
CircleofLife_alexstrasza.description: Quest: Collect Regeneration Globes. Reward: After collecting 15 Regeneration Globes, Abundance heals for an additional 5% maximum Health. Reward: After collecting 25 Regeneration Globes, Abundance's healing burst creates a Regeneration Globe.

CircleofProtection_medivh.name: Circle of Protection
CircleofProtection_medivh.description: Force of Will also applies to allies near the target, but its cooldown is increased by 2 seconds.

Cleanse_rehgar.name: Cleanse
Cleanse_rehgar.description: Activate to make target ally Unstoppable for 1 second. Cannot be cast on yourself.

CleansingFlame_alexstrasza.name: Cleansing Flame
CleansingFlame_alexstrasza.description: After 1.25 seconds, take to the sky and drop 5 fireballs over 5.938 seconds at the position of the mouse cursor. Fireballs deal 150 (+4% per level) damage to enemies and heal allied Heroes for 300 (+4% per level) Health.  2 seconds after dropping all fireballs, Alexstrasza lands at the position of the mouse cursor.

CleansingShield_zarya.name: Cleansing Shield
CleansingShield_zarya.description: Causes Shield Ally to remove all disabling effects and reduces its cooldown by 3 seconds.

CleansingTouch_kharazim.name: Cleansing Touch
CleansingTouch_kharazim.description: Radiant Dashing to an ally makes them Unstoppable for 1 second.

ClearOut_zarya.name: Clear Out
ClearOut_zarya.description: Increases Expulsion Zone's radius by 15% and Zarya's maximum Energy temporarily increases by 15 per enemy Hero hit for 10 seconds.

Clear_ltmorales.name: Clear!
Clear_ltmorales.description: Quest: Hit Heroes with Displacement Grenade. Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, reduce the cooldown of Displacement Grenade from 12 seconds to 3 seconds. Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, increase the detonation area of Displacement Grenade by 25%.

Cleaver_thebutcher.name: Cleaver
Cleaver_thebutcher.description: Basic Attacks deal 35% of The Butcher's Basic Attack Damage in an area around the target.

Clemency_whitemane.name: Clemency
Clemency_whitemane.description: Activate to cast Inquisition on an allied Hero, healing them for up to 371 over 3 seconds while Channeling.  Passive: Reduce Inquisition's cooldown by 3 seconds.

CloakofShadows_valeera.name: Cloak of Shadows
CloakofShadows_valeera.description: Valeera is enveloped in a Cloak of Shadows, which immediately removes all damage over time effects from her. For 1.5 seconds, she becomes Unstoppable and gains 75 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 75%.  Using this Ability does not break Vanish.

ClockwerkSteamFists_gazlowe.name: Clockwerk Steam Fists
ClockwerkSteamFists_gazlowe.description: Quest: Basic Attacks increase the duration of active Rock-It! Turrets by 1.5 seconds. Reward: After increasing turret duration by 600 total seconds, reduce the charge cooldown of Rock-It! Turret by 3 seconds.

Cocoon_anubarak.name: Cocoon
Cocoon_anubarak.description: Wraps target enemy Hero in a cocoon, rendering them unable to act or be targeted for 8 seconds. Allies of the Hero can attack the cocoon to break it and free them early.

ColdEmbrace_sylvanas.name: Cold Embrace
ColdEmbrace_sylvanas.description: Shadow Dagger reduces the Armor of the initial target by 25 and any enemy it spreads to by 10 for 2.5 seconds.

ColdHand_malthael.name: Cold Hand
ColdHand_malthael.description: Soul Rip Slows enemies by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

ColdHandofDeath_xul.name: Cold Hand of Death
ColdHandofDeath_xul.description: Increase the Slow of Frost Mages by 20%.  Passive: Skeletal Warrior attacks Slow enemies by 30% for 2 seconds.

ColdSnap_jaina.name: Cold Snap
ColdSnap_jaina.description: The center area of Ring of Frost deals 310 (+4% per level) damage and Roots enemies after the outer ring expires. Each enemy Hero hit reduces its cooldown by 10 seconds.

ColossalTotem_rehgar.name: Colossal Totem
ColossalTotem_rehgar.description: Increases the area and range of Earthbind Totem by 50%.

ColossusSmash_varian.name: Colossus Smash
ColossusSmash_varian.description: Smash a target enemy, dealing 160 (+4% per level) damage and lowering their Armor by 20 for 3 seconds, causing them to take 20% increased damage.  Passive: Base Attack Damage increased by 100%. Passive: Maximum Health reduced by 10%.

CombatAdvantage_fenix.name: Combat Advantage
CombatAdvantage_fenix.description: Plasma Cutter deals 35% more damage to Slowed targets.

CombatReadiness_valeera.name: Combat Readiness
CombatReadiness_valeera.description: Each Combo Point spent grants 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing its damage by 75%. Stores up to 3 charges.

CombatTactician_tychus.name: Combat Tactician
CombatTactician_tychus.description: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Run and Gun by 0.8 seconds.

Combustion_blaze.name: Combustion
Combustion_blaze.description: Channel for up to 2.6 seconds. Upon ending, Slow nearby enemies by 60% and deal 52 damage to them every 0.5 seconds. Combustion's Slow and damage over time duration is extended the longer Blaze Channels, from 1 second up to 5 seconds.  Blaze's Movement Speed is reduced by 50% while Channeling.

ComingThrough_dva.name: Coming Through
ComingThrough_dva.description: Knockback distance of Boosters is increased by 100%.

CommandeerOdin_tychus.name: Commandeer Odin
CommandeerOdin_tychus.description: Call down an Odin to pilot. The Odin deals increased Damage, has 100% increased Basic Attack range, and uses different Abilities. The Odin has 25 Armor and lasts 23 seconds.

CompositeSpear_sonya.name: Composite Spear
CompositeSpear_sonya.description: Increases Ancient Spear's range by 50%. Hitting an enemy Hero with Ancient Spear grants 25 Armor for 4 seconds.

CompositionB_tracer.name: Composition B
CompositionB_tracer.description: Successfully sticking a Pulse Bomb to an enemy Hero also drops another one at their feet that deals 50% damage and explodes slightly earlier.

ConcentratedDoses_ana.name: Concentrated Doses
ConcentratedDoses_ana.description: Increase Healing Dart's healing by 10% for each Dose active on enemy Heroes.

ConcussionGrenade_tychus.name: Concussion Grenade
ConcussionGrenade_tychus.description: Increases Frag Grenade's radius by 25% and the knockback distance by 100%.

ConcussivePulse_dva.name: Concussive Pulse
ConcussivePulse_dva.description: D.Va gains the Concussive Pulse ability, allowing her to deal 141 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a cone and knock them back.  Requires Pilot Mode.

ConstructAdditionalPylons_probius.name: Construct Additional Pylons
ConstructAdditionalPylons_probius.description: Probius can now have up to 3 active Pylons, and increase the damage of Pylon Overcharge by 25%.

ConsumeSoul_guldan.name: Consume Soul
ConsumeSoul_guldan.description: Instantly kill an enemy Minion and heal for 365 (+4% per level) Health.  Stores up to 2 charges.

ConsumeSouls_mephisto.name: Consume Souls
ConsumeSouls_mephisto.description: Channel for 2.5 seconds, revealing all enemy Heroes. After the Channel completes, all enemy Heroes take 357 damage and are Slowed by 40% for 2.5 seconds.

ConsumeVitality_leoric.name: Consume Vitality
ConsumeVitality_leoric.description: Skeletal Swing's cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds. Enemy Heroes hit heal Leoric for 4% of his maximum Health.

ConsumedbyHatred_mephisto.name: Consumed by Hatred
ConsumedbyHatred_mephisto.description: Consume Souls deals bonus damage equal to 10% of the target's missing Health. If Consume Souls initial cast kills a Hero it will cast 1 additional time.

ConsumingFire_cho.name: Consuming Fire
ConsumingFire_cho.description: Consuming Blaze heals for 150% more when a Hero is Ignited.

ConsumingFlame_imperius.name: Consuming Flame
ConsumingFlame_imperius.description: Quest: Hitting Heroes with the center of Solarion's Fire increases its center damage by 10, up to 150. Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, increase Solarion's Fire Slow by 15%.

ContactHealing_ana.name: Contact Healing
ContactHealing_ana.description: Biotic Grenade heals for 30% more per allied and enemy Hero hit.

Contagion_dehaka.name: Contagion
Contagion_dehaka.description: Isolation hits all Heroes near the first target.

ContainmentDisc_maiev.name: Containment Disc
ContainmentDisc_maiev.description: Throw a glaive in the target direction. If an enemy Hero is hit, Containment Disc can be reactivated to remove their vision and Time Stop them for 4 seconds.  Containment Disc automatically activates 6 seconds after hitting a Hero.

ControlledChaos_stukov.name: Controlled Chaos
ControlledChaos_stukov.description: Flailing Swipe gains 2 additional charges, but each use only swings 1 time, at maximum range. Additionally, its cooldown is decreased to 30 seconds, and its Mana cost is reduced from 100 to 50.

Convection_kaelthas.name: Convection
Convection_kaelthas.description: Quest: Damaging an enemy Hero with Flamestrike increase its damage by 5, up to 100. This bonus is lost on death. Reward: After hitting 20 enemy Heroes, increase Flamestrike damage by an additional 100 and no longer lose any bonuses on death.

ConvergingForce_auriel.name: Converging Force
ConvergingForce_auriel.description: Enemies hit by the outer area are pushed slightly toward the center.

Conviction_johanna.name: Conviction
Conviction_johanna.description: Movement Speed is increased by 25% while Condemn is charging up.

CorpseExplosion_xul.name: Corpse Explosion
CorpseExplosion_xul.description: When Skeletal Warriors die they explode for 55 (+4% per level) damage in a small area. Deals 100% increased damage to non-Heroic enemies.

CorpseFeeders_zagara.name: Corpse Feeders
CorpseFeeders_zagara.description: Reduces the cooldown of Infested Drop by 3 seconds and Roachlings take 50% less damage from non-Heroic sources.

CorrosiveSaliva_zagara.name: Corrosive Saliva
CorrosiveSaliva_zagara.description: When used against Heroes, Hunter Killers deal additional damage equal to 2.5% of their maximum Health.

CounterStrike_alarak.name: Counter-Strike
CounterStrike_alarak.description: Alarak targets an area and channels for 1 second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals 275 (+4% per level) damage.  This ability will take over your Trait button.

CovertMission_nova.name: Covert Mission
CovertMission_nova.description: Enemy Minions killed near Nova grant a stack of Bribe. Hero Takedowns grant 10 stacks of Bribe. Use 25 stacks to bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them.  Does not work on Bosses.  Maximum of 100 stacks. If a camp is defeated entirely with Bribe, the camp respawns 50% faster.

CovertOps_nova.name: Covert Ops
CovertOps_nova.description: After being Stealthed for 4 seconds, Pinning Shot's slow is increased to 55% and costs no Mana. Bonus is lost after losing Stealth for 1 second.

CrashCourse_dva.name: Crash Course
CrashCourse_dva.description: Quest:Damage enemy Heroes with Boosters. Reward: After damaging 20 Heroes, each use of Boosters lowers its cooldown by 1 second per Hero hit.

CrashLightning_thrall.name: Crash Lightning
CrashLightning_thrall.description: Repeatable Quest: Hitting at least 2 Heroes with a single use of Chain Lightning increases the damage of its bounces by 12, up to 360. Reward: After hitting multiple Heroes 30 times, Chain Lightning prioritizes bouncing to Heroes.

CreedoftheHunter_valla.name: Creed of the Hunter
CreedoftheHunter_valla.description: Increases Attack Speed by 10%. Quest: Use 100 Basic Attacks against Heroes. Reward: Hatred grants an additional 2% Basic Attack Damage per stack.

CripplingPoison_valeera.name: Crippling Poison
CripplingPoison_valeera.description: Activate to cause Valeera's next damaging Ability and subsequent Abilities within 4 seconds Slow targets by 20% for 4 seconds.  Activating Crippling Poison does not break Stealth.

CripplingShot_nova.name: Crippling Shot
CripplingShot_nova.description: Pinning Shot lowers a Hero's Armor by 20 for the duration of the slow, causing them to take 20% increased damage.

CripplingSlam_thebutcher.name: Crippling Slam
CripplingSlam_thebutcher.description: Hamstring's slow no longer fades out, and the duration is increased by 30%.

CripplingTalons_rexxar.name: Crippling Talons
CripplingTalons_rexxar.description: Increases Spirit Swoop's slow amount to 50% and its duration to 3 seconds.

CriticalMist_brightwing.name: Critical Mist
CriticalMist_brightwing.description: If Soothing Mist removes a disabling effect from an ally, heal them for 250.

Critterize_brightwing.name: Critterize
Critterize_brightwing.description: While Polymorphed, the target's Armor is reduced by 25, increasing the damage they take by 25%.

Crossfire_blaze.name: Crossfire
Crossfire_blaze.description: Hitting an enemy with both streams of Flame Stream deals 139 bonus damage.

CrowdControl_muradin.name: Crowd Control
CrowdControl_muradin.description: Each enemy hit by Thunder Clap reduces its cooldown by 0.75 seconds and restores 5 Mana, to a maximum of 9 targets.

CrowdPleaser_etc.name: Crowd Pleaser
CrowdPleaser_etc.description: Stage Dive's impact area is 50% bigger, and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds for every enemy Hero hit.

CrowdSurfer_etc.name: Crowd Surfer
CrowdSurfer_etc.description: Allows Powerslide to travel over walls and terrain.

CruelChain_maiev.name: Cruel Chain
CruelChain_maiev.description: Umbral Bind grants 25% Movement Speed for 2.5 seconds. In addition, each time Maiev deals damage to tethered targets, Umbral Bind's pull damage to all targets is increased by 30%, up to 150%.

Cruelty_diablo.name: Cruelty
Cruelty_diablo.description: Stunning an enemy with Shadow Charge or Overpower increases Diablo's Attack Speed by 50% for 7 seconds, up to 100%.

CrushingBlows_samuro.name: Crushing Blows
CrushingBlows_samuro.description: Critical Strike now has 2 charges. Samuro's Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Critical Strike by 1.75 seconds.

CrushingHope_leoric.name: Crushing Hope
CrushingHope_leoric.description: If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, it instantly deals an additional 15% of the target's maximum Health as damage. This damage does not heal Leoric.

CrushingJaws_orphea.name: Crushing Jaws
CrushingJaws_orphea.description: After 1.25 seconds, pulls enemies in an area towards the center, dealing 250 damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.

Cryptweave_anubarak.name: Cryptweave
Cryptweave_anubarak.description: Staying near the Cocoon allows Anub'arak to extend the duration by up to 4 seconds per Cocoon.

CrystalAegis_auriel.name: Crystal Aegis
CrystalAegis_auriel.description: Place an allied Hero into Stasis for 2 seconds. Upon expiration, Crystal Aegis deals 255 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies.

CubeMastery_deckard.name: Cube Mastery
CubeMastery_deckard.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Horadric Cube reduces the cooldown of Scroll of Sealing by 3 seconds.

CurseofExhaustion_guldan.name: Curse of Exhaustion
CurseofExhaustion_guldan.description: Drain Life deals 50% more damage and slows the target's movement speed by 35% if they are afflicted by Corruption.

CursedBullet_greymane.name: Cursed Bullet
CursedBullet_greymane.description: Greymane shapeshifts into a Human and fires a bullet that hits the first enemy Hero in its path, dealing 35% of their current Health in damage.  Does not affect Vehicles.

CustomOptics_ana.name: Custom Optics
CustomOptics_ana.description: Increase the Aim Down Sights Basic Attack range bonus from 2 to 4.

CyberShield_genji.name: Cyber Shield
CyberShield_genji.description: Using Cyber Agility grants 50 Spell Armor for 2.5 seconds.

CydaeasKiss_azmodan.name: Cydaea's Kiss
CydaeasKiss_azmodan.description: Reduces the Channel time of All Shall Burn by 0.5 seconds. If All Shall Burn's Channel lasts its full duration against a Hero, Azmodan is healed for 8% of his maximum Health.

DampeningField_fenix.name: Dampening Field
DampeningField_fenix.description: Fenix gains 25 Spell Armor while he has a Shield from Shield Capacitor.

DanceOfDeath_samuro.name: Dance Of Death
DanceOfDeath_samuro.description: Mirror Images use Bladestorm when Samuro does.

DarkBargain_guldan.name: Dark Bargain
DarkBargain_guldan.description: Gul'dan's maximum Health is permanently increased by 30% but his Death Respawn time is increased by 15 seconds.

DarkConversion_malganis.name: Dark Conversion
DarkConversion_malganis.description: Channel on an enemy Hero for 0.75 seconds, then swap Health percentages with the target over 3 seconds.

DarkLadysCall_sylvanas.name: Dark Lady's Call
DarkLadysCall_sylvanas.description: Heroes hit by Mind Control have their vision radius greatly reduced for 5 seconds. Mind Control's cooldown is reduced by 30 seconds.

DarknessDescends_zeratul.name: Darkness Descends
DarknessDescends_zeratul.description: Activate to gain 40% Attack Speed for 5 seconds.  Passive: Gain 20% Attack Speed.

DarknessWithin_guldan.name: Darkness Within
DarknessWithin_guldan.description: After using Life Tap, the next Ability Gul'dan casts has 25% increased Spell Power.

DarnassianArchery_tyrande.name: Darnassian Archery
DarnassianArchery_tyrande.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant a stacking 10% increased Attack Damage bonus for 6 seconds. This bonus is lost when Basic Attacking non-Heroes.

Dash_tychus.name: Dash
Dash_tychus.description: Quest: Run and Gun increases Tychus's Movement Speed by 1% for each Regeneration Globe gathered, up to 25%. Lasts 2 seconds. Reward: Once 25 Regeneration Globes have been gathered, the range of Run and Gun is increased by 50%.

DashofLight_kharazim.name: Dash of Light
DashofLight_kharazim.description: Radiant Dashing to an ally increases the healing they receive from Breath of Heaven by 75% for 3 seconds.

Dauntless_yrel.name: Dauntless
Dauntless_yrel.description: Casting a Basic Ability grants Yrel 35 Physical Armor for 2 seconds.

DazerZone_dva.name: Dazer Zone
DazerZone_dva.description: Enemy Heroes affected by Defense Matrix are Slowed by 20%.

DeadMagic_orphea.name: Dead Magic
DeadMagic_orphea.description: Basic Attacks that consume Chaos ignore Armor and deal 115 Spell Damage to all enemies around the target.

DeadRush_nazeebo.name: Dead Rush
DeadRush_nazeebo.description: Zombie Wall deals 75% more damage. When it expires up to 5 remaining Zombies uproot and attack nearby enemies for 3 seconds.

DeadlyCalm_garrosh.name: Deadly Calm
DeadlyCalm_garrosh.description: Heroes hit by Decimate deal 20% less damage for 3 seconds.

DeadlyCharge_alarak.name: Deadly Charge
DeadlyCharge_alarak.description:
After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing 200 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.6 seconds.  Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling. 
This ability will take over your Trait button.

DeadlyStrike_chen.name: Deadly Strike
DeadlyStrike_chen.description: Flying Kick no longer costs Brew. Additionally, its damage is increased by 100% while Chen has Shields from Fortifying Brew.

DeafeningBlast_gall.name: Deafening Blast
DeafeningBlast_gall.description: Runic Blast silences enemy Heroes for 1.25 seconds.

DeafeningBlast_sylvanas.name: Deafening Blast
DeafeningBlast_sylvanas.description: Enemies at the center of Wailing Arrow's explosion take 50% more damage and are silenced for twice as long.

DeathDealer_valla.name: Death Dealer
DeathDealer_valla.description: Increases Vault Basic Attack damage bonus from 6% to 14% per stack of Hatred. If this attack kills its victim, the Mana cost and cooldown of Vault are refunded.

DeathFromAbove_valeera.name: Death From Above
DeathFromAbove_valeera.description: Teleporting with Ambush reduces the cooldown of Vanish by 4 seconds.

DeathMarch_leoric.name: Death March
DeathMarch_leoric.description: The final swing of March of the Black King also applies Drain Hope to nearby enemy Heroes.

DeathMetal_etc.name: Death Metal
DeathMetal_etc.description: Upon dying, a ghost uses Mosh Pit at E.T.C's location.

DeathSiphon_valla.name: Death Siphon
DeathSiphon_valla.description: Strafe also fires penetrating bolts in a line for 34 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds. 25% of the damage dealt with Strafe is returned as Health.

DeathWish_garrosh.name: Death Wish
DeathWish_garrosh.description: If an enemy Hero is killed while Taunted by Warlord's Challenge, its cooldown is reduced by 45 seconds.

DeathsAdvance_arthas.name: Death's Advance
DeathsAdvance_arthas.description: Activate to increase Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds.  Passive: Increases Movement Speed by 10%.

Deathchill_kelthuzad.name: Deathchill
Deathchill_kelthuzad.description: When Frost Blast's Root expires, enemies are Slowed by 40% for 3 seconds. Heroes killed while under the effects of Frost Blast instantly release another Frost Blast explosion.

Deathlord_arthas.name: Deathlord
Deathlord_arthas.description: Reduces Death Coil's cooldown by 3 seconds and increase its range by 30%.

DebilitatingDart_ana.name: Debilitating Dart
DebilitatingDart_ana.description: Activate to fire a dart which slows the movement speed and reduces the damage dealt by the first enemy Hero it hits by 50% for 3 seconds.

DebilitatingFlames_diablo.name: Debilitating Flames
DebilitatingFlames_diablo.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Fire Stomp are Slowed by 5% for 4 seconds, up to 50%. Heroes Slowed by 25% or more by Debilitating Flames deal 50% less damage.

DebilitatingRounds_raynor.name: Debilitating Rounds
DebilitatingRounds_raynor.description: Decrease the cooldown of Penetrating Round by 3 seconds. While Inspire is active, Penetrating Round's Slow is increased by 20%.

Debilitation_anubarak.name: Debilitation
Debilitation_anubarak.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Burrow Charge have their Spell Power reduced by 50% for 4 seconds.

Decimate_garrosh.name: Decimate
Decimate_garrosh.description: Deal 50 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and Slow them by 30% for 1.5 seconds. Deals 100% more damage to Heroes, and each Hero hit reduces the cooldown by 1 second.  Stores up to 3 charges.

DeepBreathing_chromie.name: Deep Breathing
DeepBreathing_chromie.description: Quest: Every time Dragon's Breath hits a Hero increase its damage by 5, up to 60. Reward: After hitting 12 Heroes, increase its damage by an additional 140 and also increase Chromie's sight radius by 100%.

DeepChill_jaina.name: Deep Chill
DeepChill_jaina.description: Frostbite's Chill can now stacks a second time, slowing targets up to 40%.

DeepImpact_guldan.name: Deep Impact
DeepImpact_guldan.description: Rain of Destruction slows enemies Movement Speed by 90% for 0.5 seconds.

DeepRoots_malfurion.name: Deep Roots
DeepRoots_malfurion.description: Entangling Roots grows 25% larger and persist on the ground 40% longer.

DeepShift_tassadar.name: Deep Shift
DeepShift_tassadar.description: Dimensional Shift's duration and Movement Speed bonuses are increased by 50%.

DeepSleep_malganis.name: Deep Sleep
DeepSleep_malganis.description: Increase Night Rush's Sleep duration by 0.75 seconds and its Movement Speed bonus by 10%.

DefenseoftheAngels_tyrael.name: Defense of the Angels
DefenseoftheAngels_tyrael.description: Activate to gain 50 Armor for 5 seconds.  Each time Righteousness's Shield absorbs damage, Defense of the Angel's cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds.

DefensiveMeasures_garrosh.name: Defensive Measures
DefensiveMeasures_garrosh.description: Stunning a Hero with Groundbreaker grants Garrosh a 350 (+4% per level) Shield for 6 seconds.

DefensiveShielding_zarya.name: Defensive Shielding
DefensiveShielding_zarya.description: Upon expiration or breaking, Personal Barrier and Shield Ally grant 75 Physical Armor against the next 2 Hero Basic Attacks for 6 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 75%.

Deflection_samuro.name: Deflection
Deflection_samuro.description: Advancing Strikes grants 30 Physical Armor against Hero Basic Attacks, reducing their damage by 25%.

DemolitionsExpert_zarya.name: Demolitions Expert
DemolitionsExpert_zarya.description: Quest: For every 5 enemy Heroes hit by Particle Grenade, its recharge rate lowers by 0.4375 seconds, up to 3.5 seconds. Reward: Once Particle Grenade has hit 40 enemy Heroes, its radius is increased by 15%.

DemonicCircle_guldan.name: Demonic Circle
DemonicCircle_guldan.description: Summon a Demonic Circle at Gul'dan's location. Activate to teleport Gul'dan to the Demonic Circle.

DemonicForm_illidan.name: Demonic Form
DemonicForm_illidan.description: Permanently remain in Demonic Form. Metamorphosis also increases Attack Speed by 20% and reduces the duration of slows, roots, and stuns by 50%. Illidan can now mount in Demonic Form.

DemonicInvasion_azmodan.name: Demonic Invasion
DemonicInvasion_azmodan.description: Rain a small army of Demonic Grunts down on enemies, dealing 65 damage per impact. Grunts deal 42 damage, have 750 health and last up to 10 seconds. When Grunts die they explode, dealing 98 damage to nearby enemies.

DemoralizingShout_varian.name: Demoralizing Shout
DemoralizingShout_varian.description: Activate to demoralize nearby enemy Heroes, reducing damage they deal by 40% for 5 seconds.

DetachableBoxMagazine_ana.name: Detachable Box Magazine
DetachableBoxMagazine_ana.description: Quest: Stack 5 Doses on an enemy Hero. Reward: After reaching maximum Dosage 12 times, unlock the Active Reload Ability, which can be activated to instantly gain 3 charges of Healing Dart.

Determination_orphea.name: Determination
