Determination_orphea.description: After dashing with Shadow Waltz, Orphea gains 50 Spell Armor, stacking up to 2 times. While Orphea has Determination, her Physical damage is increased by 15%.

DevastatingCharge_diablo.name: Devastating Charge
DevastatingCharge_diablo.description: Increase Shadow Charge's terrain collision damage by 80%. Quest: Each time an enemy Hero takes terrain collision damage, increase this bonus by 20%, to a maximum of 120%.

DevilsDue_diablo.name: Devil's Due
DevilsDue_diablo.description: Black Soulstone increases the effects of Regen Globes and Healing Fountains by 2.25% per Soul.

DevouringMaw_zagara.name: Devouring Maw
DevouringMaw_zagara.description: Summon a Devouring Maw that devours enemies for 4 seconds. Devoured enemies cannot fight and take 88 (+4% per level) damage per second.  Usable on Unstoppable enemies.

DiabolicalMomentum_diablo.name: Diabolical Momentum
DiabolicalMomentum_diablo.description: When Diablo's Basic Attacks damage enemies, reduce the cooldown of his Basic Abilities by 0.75 second.

DiamondResolve_auriel.name: Diamond Resolve
DiamondResolve_auriel.description: When Crystal Aegis expires, it grants the target 75 Armor for 5 seconds, reducing damage taken by 75%.

DiamondSkin_liming.name: Diamond Skin
DiamondSkin_liming.description: Teleport grants a Shield equal to 25% of Li-Ming's maximum Health for 4 seconds.

DieAlone_malthael.name: Die Alone
DieAlone_malthael.description: Soul Rip deals 50% more damage to Heroes if it hits only one Hero.

DigestiveJuices_stitches.name: Digestive Juices
DigestiveJuices_stitches.description: Increases Devour's damage to Heroes by 40%. Enemy Heroes hit by Devour deal 50% reduced damage for 5 seconds.

DireBeast_rexxar.name: Dire Beast
DireBeast_rexxar.description: Rexxar and Misha's Basic Attacks increase the damage of the next Misha, Charge! by 40%, stacking up to a 400% bonus.

Disintegrate_liming.name: Disintegrate
Disintegrate_liming.description: Channel a powerful beam, dealing 440 (+5% per level) damage over 2.5 seconds to enemies while they are in it. The direction of the beam changes with your mouse cursor position.

Dissonance_alarak.name: Dissonance
Dissonance_alarak.description: Increase Discord Strike's Silence duration by 0.75 seconds.

DivertPowerWeapons_fenix.name: Divert Power: Weapons
DivertPowerWeapons_fenix.description: Activate to gain 40% Basic Attack damage for 5 seconds. Basic Attacking a Hero refreshes this duration. Once Divert Power: Weapons ends, drain all of Shield Capacitor's Shields.

DivertingPower_dva.name: Diverting Power
DivertingPower_dva.description: The area of Defense Matrix is 100% wider and 25% longer, but D.Va's Movement Speed is reduced by an additional 30% for the duration.

DivineFavor_yrel.name: Divine Favor
DivineFavor_yrel.description: Casting a Basic Ability reduces the cooldown of Divine Purpose by 1.5 seconds.

DivineHurricane_uther.name: Divine Hurricane
DivineHurricane_uther.description: Divine Storm's radius is increased by 50% and its cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds.

DivinePalm_kharazim.name: Divine Palm
DivinePalm_kharazim.description: Protect an allied Hero from death, causing them to be healed for 1200 (+4% per level) if they take fatal damage in the next 3 seconds.

DivineProtection_uther.name: Divine Protection
DivineProtection_uther.description: Devotion now stacks twice, and its duration is refreshed when applied.

DivineRage_imperius.name: Divine Rage
DivineRage_imperius.description: Striking an enemy Hero with Molten Armor reduces its cooldown by 0.25 seconds.

DivineReckoning_whitemane.name: Divine Reckoning
DivineReckoning_whitemane.description: After 1 second, consecrate an area for 4 seconds, dealing 50 damage every 0.5 seconds to enemies inside.

DivineShield_uther.name: Divine Shield
DivineShield_uther.description: Make an allied Hero Invulnerable and increase their Movement Speed by 20% for 3 seconds.

DivineSteed_yrel.name: Divine Steed
DivineSteed_yrel.description: Mounting is instant and grants 60% Movement Speed that decays over 3 seconds.

DivineStorm_uther.name: Divine Storm
DivineStorm_uther.description: Deal 170 (+4% per level) damage and Stun nearby enemies for 1.75 seconds.

DivineVigor_tyrael.name: Divine Vigor
DivineVigor_tyrael.description: If Smite hits an enemy, Tyrael's Basic Attacks within the next 4 seconds heal for 50% of the damage dealt.

Dodge_genji.name: Dodge
Dodge_genji.description: Genji dodges 1 Heroic Basic Attack every 8 seconds.

Dominance_liming.name: Dominance
Dominance_liming.description: Takedowns restore 30% of Li-Ming's missing Health.

Domination_diablo.name: Domination
Domination_diablo.description: Casting Overpower resets the cooldown of Shadow Charge.

DoubleBack_gall.name: Double Back
DoubleBack_gall.description: Activate Dread Orb before the second bounce ends to reverse the direction of the third bounce.  Passive: The third bounce of Dread Orb deals 200% more damage to Non-Heroic targets.

DoubleDragon_lili.name: Double Dragon
DoubleDragon_lili.description: After hitting a target with Water Dragon, another Water Dragon is summoned at the point of impact.

DoubleTap_nova.name: Double Tap
DoubleTap_nova.description: Pinning Shot now has 2 charges but it's cooldown is increased by 2 seconds.

DoubleTrouble_gall.name: Double Trouble
DoubleTrouble_gall.description: Quest: If Shadowflame hits an enemy Hero that is afflicted by Cho's Consuming Blaze, its cooldown is reduced by 0.5 second. Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, Shadowflame's cooldown is instead permanently reduced by 1 second.

DoubleUp_garrosh.name: Double Up
DoubleUp_garrosh.description: Armor Up can be activated to increase its Armor bonus by 100% for 3 seconds.  Double Up's activation has a 30 second cooldown.

DraconicBarrage_chromie.name: Draconic Barrage
DraconicBarrage_chromie.description: Increase the damage from Bronze Talons by an additional 100%. Hitting an enemy Hero with Sand Blast applies Bronze Talons to Chromie's next 2 Basic Attacks.

DragonClaw_genji.name: Dragon Claw
DragonClaw_genji.description: After Genji blocks 330 (+4% per level) damage with Deflect, activate to release a Dragon Claw, dealing 190 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies.

DragonScales_alexstrasza.name: Dragon Scales
DragonScales_alexstrasza.description: Gain 40 Armor while Stunned, Silenced, or Rooted, and for 2 seconds after. Can only trigger once every 10 seconds.

DragonsArrow_hanzo.name: Dragon's Arrow
DragonsArrow_hanzo.description:
Fire a missile that travels across the battleground. Explodes upon hitting an enemy Hero, dealing 100 damage to all nearby enemies and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.  After traveling a medium distance, the damage is increased to 200 and the Stun duration to 1.25 seconds. 
After traveling a long distance, the damage is increased to 350 and the Stun duration to 2 seconds.

DragonsEye_chromie.name: Dragon's Eye
DragonsEye_chromie.description: Dragon's Breath deals 25% more damage to enemies in the center.

Dragonblade_genji.name: Dragonblade
Dragonblade_genji.description: Unleash the Dragonblade for 8 seconds. While active, Dragonblade can be reactivated to lunge forward and slash in a huge arc, dealing 240 (+4% per level) damage.

Dragonstrike_hanzo.name: Dragonstrike
Dragonstrike_hanzo.description: After 1.5 seconds, summon a pair of Spirit Dragons which travel forward, dealing 70 damage every 0.25 seconds to enemy Heroes in its area. Enemies in the center take 150% damage.

DrainMomentum_leoric.name: Drain Momentum
DrainMomentum_leoric.description: Drain Hope no longer Slows Leoric. If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, gain 30% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.

DrakkenLaserDrill_tychus.name: Drakken Laser Drill
DrakkenLaserDrill_tychus.description: Call down a Laser Drill to attack nearby enemies, dealing 142 (+4% per level) damage every second. Reactivate to assign a new target. Lasts 22 seconds.

DreamShot_brightwing.name: Dream Shot
DreamShot_brightwing.description: Increase Arcane Flare's range by 50%. Hitting a Hero with Arcane Flare's center reduces its cooldown to 2 seconds.

DuranceofHate_mephisto.name: Durance of Hate
DuranceofHate_mephisto.description: After 1 second, unleash a wave of evil spirits that Root the first enemy Hero hit for 2 seconds and deal 160 damage to them over the same duration.  Durance of Hate spreads outwards from its initial target, Rooting and damaging additional nearby enemy Heroes.

DuskWing_raynor.name: Dusk Wing
DuskWing_raynor.description: Increase the damage, Health, and leash range of Raynor's Raider by 100%. When it dies, both Inspire and Adrenaline Rush are activated for free.

DustofAppearance_medivh.name: Dust of Appearance
DustofAppearance_medivh.description: Activate to greatly increase sight range for 5 seconds and reveal enemy Heroes in the area for 8 seconds. Does not cancel Raven Form.  Passive: Increase Medivh's sight range while in Raven Form by 25%.

DustofDisappearance_medivh.name: Dust of Disappearance
DustofDisappearance_medivh.description: Stealth an allied Hero for 20 seconds.  Stores up to 2 charges.

DwarfLaunch_muradin.name: Dwarf Launch
DwarfLaunch_muradin.description: Increase the range of Dwarf Toss by 40%. Hitting an enemy Hero with Dwarf Toss reduces its cooldown by 3 seconds.

DyingBreath_diablo.name: Dying Breath
DyingBreath_diablo.description: Apocalypse's cooldown is reduced by 25 seconds for every enemy Hero hit (to a minimum of 5 seconds) and is cast for free when Diablo dies.

DynamicShooting_ana.name: Dynamic Shooting
DynamicShooting_ana.description: Basic Attacks increase Attack Speed by 10% for 4 seconds, up to 100%.

EagerAdventurer_lili.name: Eager Adventurer
EagerAdventurer_lili.description: Increase Fast Feet's duration by 125% and increase Mana regeneration by 100% while Fast Feet is active.

EagerWolf_greymane.name: Eager Wolf
EagerWolf_greymane.description: Increases the Attack Speed bonus of Inner Beast by an additional 40% after it has been active for 4 seconds.

EarthAlly_kharazim.name: Earth Ally
EarthAlly_kharazim.description: Place an Earth Ally that grants nearby allied Heroes 50 Physical Armor against Heroic Basic Attacks, reducing damage taken by 50%. Has 400 (+4% per level) Health and lasts 10 seconds.  Kharazim can Radiant Dash to Earth Allies.

EarthShield_rehgar.name: Earth Shield
EarthShield_rehgar.description: Lightning Shield gives a Shield that absorbs damage equal to 12% of their maximum Health for 3 seconds.

EarthenShields_thrall.name: Earthen Shields
EarthenShields_thrall.description: Allies within the Earthquake area gain a Shield equal to 15% of their maximum Health each pulse. This shield lasts 4 seconds.

EarthgraspTotem_rehgar.name: Earthgrasp Totem
EarthgraspTotem_rehgar.description: When Earthbind Totem is first cast, it slows nearby enemies by 90% for 1 second.

EarthlivingEnchant_rehgar.name: Earthliving Enchant
EarthlivingEnchant_rehgar.description: When Chain Heal heals a Hero below 50% Health, they are healed an additional 225 Health over 5 seconds.

Earthquake_thrall.name: Earthquake
Earthquake_thrall.description: After 0.5 seconds, summon a massive Earthquake that pulses every 4 seconds. Each pulse lasts 2 seconds, Slowing all enemies in the area by 50%, and deals 50 (+4% per level) damage to enemy Heroes. Does 3 pulses.

Earthshaker_garrosh.name: Earthshaker
Earthshaker_garrosh.description: Wrecking Ball Stuns enemies near the impact area for 0.5 seconds.

EasyPrey_rexxar.name: Easy Prey
EasyPrey_rexxar.description: Increases Misha's damage to Minions and Mercenaries by 150%, and Misha gains 50 Armor against Minions and Mercenaries, reducing damage taken by 50%.

EchoofDoom_malganis.name: Echo of Doom
EchoofDoom_malganis.description: When Necrotic Embrace expires, it explodes again for 50 damage. If an enemy Hero is hit, Mal'Ganis retains 25 Armor for 1 more second.  Does not wake Sleeping targets.

EchoofHeaven_kharazim.name: Echo of Heaven
EchoofHeaven_kharazim.description: Breath of Heaven heals 75% of its normal amount, but heals a second time 3 seconds later.

EchooftheElements_thrall.name: Echo of the Elements
EchooftheElements_thrall.description: Quest: Kill Minions or Heroes within 1.5 seconds of hitting them with Chain Lightning. Reward: After killing 10 enemies, reduce the Mana cost of Chain Lightning from 45 to 25. Reward: After killing 20 enemies, gain a second charge of Chain Lightning.

EchoPedal_etc.name: Echo Pedal
EchoPedal_etc.description: Using a Basic or Heroic Ability releases two pulses of 15 (+4% per level) damage.  This deals 250% bonus damage to Minions and Mercenaries. The first occurs instantly, the second occurs 2 seconds later.

EchoPulse_probius.name: Echo Pulse
EchoPulse_probius.description: Disruption Pulse now returns to Probius 1.25 seconds after reaching its target, dealing 75% damage on the return trip.

EchoedCorruption_guldan.name: Echoed Corruption
EchoedCorruption_guldan.description: Quest: Hit 40 enemy Heroes with Corruption. Reward: After the third strike, Corruption strikes 3 times in the opposite direction.

EchoesofDeath_xul.name: Echoes of Death
EchoesofDeath_xul.description: Spectral Scythe spawns 2 additional scythes next to the first after 1.5 seconds, dealing 60% damage.

EdgeofMadness_gall.name: Edge of Madness
EdgeofMadness_gall.description: Every subsequent hit of Shadowflame against the same enemy Hero deals an additional 8% damage, to a maximum of 40%. These bonuses are lost if the Hero has not been hit for 4 seconds.

EggHunt_murky.name: Egg Hunt
EggHunt_murky.description: Activate to place a fake Egg. If the fake Egg dies, it casts an untalented Slime. Maximum 3 fake Eggs.  Passive: Spawning from his Egg grants Murky Stealth for 5 seconds.

EggShell_murky.name: Egg Shell
EggShell_murky.description: Spawning from his Egg grants Murky a Shield equal to 100% of his maximum Health. The shield lasts indefinitely.

EldritchConduit_orphea.name: Eldritch Conduit
EldritchConduit_orphea.description: Each Chaos consumed increases Orphea's Spell Power by 3%, up to 50%. After reaching the maximum bonus, the Spell Power is increased by an additional 30%. Lasts 10 seconds.

ElectricCharge_rehgar.name: Electric Charge
ElectricCharge_rehgar.description: Increases the radius of Lightning Shield by 25%.

ElementalConduit_chen.name: Elemental Conduit
ElementalConduit_chen.description:
Increases the spirits' Health to 100% of Chen's maximum Health and empowers their abilities.  Storm can grant the spirits Unstoppable. Earth's leap cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds.
Fire grants Attack Speed as long as it is alive.

ElunesChosen_tyrande.name: Elune's Chosen
ElunesChosen_tyrande.description: Activate to make Tyrande's Basic Attacks heal the target ally for 200% of the damage dealt. Lasts for 8 seconds.

ElunesGrace_malfurion.name: Elune's Grace
ElunesGrace_malfurion.description: Increases the range of Regrowth, Moonfire, and Entangling Roots by 25%.

ElunesWrath_maiev.name: Elune's Wrath
ElunesWrath_maiev.description: Hitting at least 2 Heroes with a single Fan of Knives causes the next Fan of Knives to drop a star on targets that deals 77 damage when it impacts.

ElusiveBrawler_chen.name: Elusive Brawler
ElusiveBrawler_chen.description: Activate to evade enemy Basic Attacks for 2 seconds. Chen's Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by 2 seconds.

ElusiveStrike_illidan.name: Elusive Strike
ElusiveStrike_illidan.description: Sweeping Strike reduces the cooldown of Evasion by 3 seconds every time it damages an enemy Hero.

Elusiveness_valeera.name: Elusiveness
Elusiveness_valeera.description: Increases Valeera's Movement Speed while Vanished by an additional 20%.

EmbraceDeath_arthas.name: Embrace Death
EmbraceDeath_arthas.description: Death Coil deals more damage and heals more the lower Arthas's current health is, to a maximum of 100% bonus damage and healing.

Emerald_deckard.name: Emerald
Emerald_deckard.description: Activate to make the next Horadric Cube reduce healing received by 75% for 4 seconds.  Only 1 Gem may be active at a time.

EmeraldWind_brightwing.name: Emerald Wind
EmeraldWind_brightwing.description: After 0.5 seconds, create an expanding nova of wind, dealing 225 (+4% per level) damage and pushing enemies away.

EmergencyProtocol_fenix.name: Emergency Protocol
EmergencyProtocol_fenix.description: When Shield Capacitor's Shield becomes depleted, gain 25% Movement Speed for 5 seconds.

EmergencyShielding_dva.name: Emergency Shielding
EmergencyShielding_dva.description: When D.Va's Mech would be destroyed, it instead gains a Shield that absorbs 210 (+4% per level) damage over 6 seconds.  This effect has a 15 second cooldown.

EMPGrenade_ltmorales.name: EMP Grenade
EMPGrenade_ltmorales.description: Displacement Grenade deals an additional 100 (+4% per level) damage over 2 seconds, and up to 400 (+4% per level) bonus damage to Shields.

EmpathicLink_auriel.name: Empathic Link
EmpathicLink_auriel.description: Auriel stores 25% of damage taken by allies with Bestow Hope.

Empower_tyrande.name: Empower
Empower_tyrande.description: Reduce Sentinel's cooldown by 3 seconds. The first Hero hit by Sentinel takes bonus damage equal to 7% of their maximum Health.

EnPointe_orphea.name: En Pointe
EnPointe_orphea.description: Shadow Waltz deals an increased 75% damage to enemies hit by its end.

Encore_etc.name: Encore
Encore_etc.description: Face Melt leaves an Amp behind, which will knock enemies away again 2 seconds later.

EndlessCreep_zagara.name: Endless Creep
EndlessCreep_zagara.description: The cast range for Creep Tumor is increased by 2000%. Creep Tumors now last 600 seconds. While on Creep, Zagara gains an additional 10% Movement Speed.

EndlessNades_junkrat.name: Endless Nades
EndlessNades_junkrat.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Frag Launcher reduces its cooldown by 1.5 seconds.

EndlessSpores_lunara.name: Endless Spores
EndlessSpores_lunara.description: Casting Crippling Spores while at least 2 Heroes are afflicted by Nature's Toxin reduces the cooldown by 3 seconds.

EnduranceStimpack_blaze.name: Endurance Stimpack
EnduranceStimpack_blaze.description: Activate to gain a Shield that absorbs 480 damage over 5 seconds.

EnduranceTraining_zarya.name: Endurance Training
EnduranceTraining_zarya.description: While at or above 75 Energy, Zarya gains 20 Armor, reducing all damage taken by 20%.

EnduringSwarm_dehaka.name: Enduring Swarm
EnduringSwarm_dehaka.description: Dark Swarm grants 50 Spell Armor while active.

EnduringWill_medivh.name: Enduring Will
EnduringWill_medivh.description: Preventing at least 268 damage with Force of Will reduces its cooldown to 4 seconds.

EnergizedCord_auriel.name: Energized Cord
EnergizedCord_auriel.description: Increases the energy stored from Auriel's Basic Attacks to 100% of the damage against Heroes and 40% of the damage against non-Heroes.  Does not affect Auriel's Bestow Hope ally.

EnergyRoil_kaelthas.name: Energy Roil
EnergyRoil_kaelthas.description: Reduce the Mana cost of Gravity Lapse by 70. If Gravity Lapse hits a Hero, reduce its cooldown by 9 seconds.

EngineGunk_gazlowe.name: Engine Gunk
EngineGunk_gazlowe.description: Rock-It! Turret attacks slow enemies by 20% for 2 seconds.

EngulfingFlame_ragnaros.name: Engulfing Flame
EngulfingFlame_ragnaros.description: Increase Blast Wave's damage by 75% and its radius by 15%.

EngulfingOblivion_orphea.name: Engulfing Oblivion
EngulfingOblivion_orphea.description: Crushing Jaws reduces the Armor of Heroes hit by 25 for 2 seconds. Takedowns set its cooldown to 5 seconds.

EnhancedAgility_dehaka.name: Enhanced Agility
EnhancedAgility_dehaka.description: Brushstalker's Movement Speed bonus now lasts for 5 seconds after leaving a bush. Repeatable Quest: Every 50 Essence collected permanently increases the Movement Speed bonus of Brushstalker by 2%, up to 20%.

EnoughtoShare_chen.name: Enough to Share
EnoughtoShare_chen.description: Fortifying Brew also Shields nearby allied Heroes for 54 (+4% per level) per second.

Enraged_thebutcher.name: Enraged
Enraged_thebutcher.description: While below 50% of his maximum Health, taking damage causes The Butcher to become Enraged for 10 seconds, gaining 40% Attack Speed and 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25%.  This effect has a 25 second cooldown.

EnragedRegeneration_cho.name: Enraged Regeneration
EnragedRegeneration_cho.description: While Gall's Ogre Rage is active, Cho's Health Regeneration is increased by 200%.

Ensnare_zuljin.name: Ensnare
Ensnare_zuljin.description: Throw a net forward, Rooting the first enemy Hero hit for 1.5 seconds.

Entomb_leoric.name: Entomb
Entomb_leoric.description: Create an unpassable tomb for 4 seconds.

Entrenched_sgthammer.name: Entrenched
Entrenched_sgthammer.description: While in Siege Mode, Concussive Blasts's damage and knockback distance are increased by 75%.

EnvelopingShadows_valeera.name: Enveloping Shadows
EnvelopingShadows_valeera.description: Whenever Valeera uses Vanish, she also gains Cloak of Shadows.

EnvenomedNest_abathur.name: Envenomed Nest
EnvenomedNest_abathur.description: Toxic Nests deal 75% more damage over 3 seconds.

EnvenomedSpikes_abathur.name: Envenomed Spikes
EnvenomedSpikes_abathur.description: Abathur's Symbiote's Spike Burst also slows enemy Movement Speed by 40% for 2 seconds.

EnvenomedSpines_zagara.name: Envenomed Spines
EnvenomedSpines_zagara.description: Activate to have Zagara's next Basic Attack apply 230 (+4% per level) damage over 5 seconds.

EpicMount_falstad.name: Epic Mount
EpicMount_falstad.description: Reduce the cooldown of Flight to 35 seconds, reduce the cast time before flying to 0.5 seconds, and increase the speed by 50%.

Epicenter_anubarak.name: Epicenter
Epicenter_anubarak.description: Increases Burrow Charge impact area by 60% and lowers the cooldown by 1.25 seconds for each Hero hit.

Epiphany_kharazim.name: Epiphany
Epiphany_kharazim.description: Activate to restore 33% of Kharazim's maximum Mana and refill 2 charges of Radiant Dash.

EriktheSwift_thelostvikings.name: Erik the Swift
EriktheSwift_thelostvikings.description: Permanently increases Erik's base Movement Speed by 10%, and as long as Erik is moving he heals 34 (+4% per level) Health per second.

EssenceClaws_dehaka.name: Essence Claws
EssenceClaws_dehaka.description: Dehaka's Basic Attacks slow the target by 20% for 1 second. If the target is a Hero, Dehaka gains 5 Essence.

EternalFeast_orphea.name: Eternal Feast
EternalFeast_orphea.description: After 1.5 seconds, deal 210 damage in an area. Eternal Feast repeats every 1 second as long as it hits an enemy Hero.

EternalFlames_diablo.name: Eternal Flames
EternalFlames_diablo.description: When Diablo Stuns an enemy Hero with Shadow Charge or Overpower, reset the cooldown of Fire Stomp.

EternalHunger_arthas.name: Eternal Hunger
EternalHunger_arthas.description: Quest: Use Frostmourne Hungers on an enemy Hero. Reward: Increases the Mana it restores by 4, to a maximum of 40, and its damage by 4.

EternalRetaliation_johanna.name: Eternal Retaliation
EternalRetaliation_johanna.description: Lower the cooldown of Condemn by 0.5 seconds and refund 3 Mana for every enemy hit. Maximum of 10 targets.

EtherealExistence_malthael.name: Ethereal Existence
EtherealExistence_malthael.description: Gain 10 Physical Armor per enemy Hero afflicted by Reaper's Mark, up to a maximum of 30.

EvasiveFire_sylvanas.name: Evasive Fire
EvasiveFire_sylvanas.description: Hitting an enemy with Withering Fire grants 6% Movement Speed for 2 seconds, up to 30%. Basic Attacks refresh this duration.

EverlastingLight_tyrande.name: Everlasting Light
EverlastingLight_tyrande.description: If Light of Elune's second charge is cast on a different target from the first, it heals for 40% more.

EvolutionComplete_abathur.name: Evolution Complete
EvolutionComplete_abathur.description: Monstrosity gains the ability to Deep Tunnel to any visible location once every 25 seconds.

EvolutionaryLink_abathur.name: Evolutionary Link
EvolutionaryLink_abathur.description: As long as the Ultimate Evolution is alive, the original target of the clone gains a Shield equal to 25% of their maximum Health.  Refreshes every 5 seconds.

EvolveMonstrosity_abathur.name: Evolve Monstrosity
EvolveMonstrosity_abathur.description: Turn an allied Minion or Locust into a Monstrosity. When enemy Minions near the Monstrosity die, it gains 5% Health and 5% Basic Attack damage, stacking up to 40 times.  The Monstrosity takes 50% less damage from non-Heroic enemies.  Using Symbiote on the Monstrosity allows Abathur to control it, in addition to Symbiote's normal benefits.  This Ability can be reactivated to automatically cast Symbiote on his Monstrosity.

Execute_raynor.name: Execute
Execute_raynor.description: Increase Attack Speed by 20%. Basic Attack damage is increased by 25% against targets below 50% Health.

Executioner_greymane.name: Executioner
Executioner_greymane.description: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by 30% for 3 seconds.

ExpensivePlating_dva.name: Expensive Plating
ExpensivePlating_dva.description: Increase Mech Health by 20%, but also increase the cooldown of Call Mech by 15 seconds.  This does not decrease the amount of Self-Destruct Charge gained.

ExplosiveArrows_hanzo.name: Explosive Arrows
ExplosiveArrows_hanzo.description: Upon hitting a Minion or Monster, Storm Bow deals 75% of its damage to enemies around its target.

ExplosiveAttacks_thelostvikings.name: Explosive Attacks
ExplosiveAttacks_thelostvikings.description: Increases Baleog's splash damage against non-Heroes to 100%.

ExplosiveBarrier_zarya.name: Explosive Barrier
ExplosiveBarrier_zarya.description: Upon expiration or breaking, Personal Barrier explodes, dealing 100 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

ExplosiveRound_nova.name: Explosive Round
ExplosiveRound_nova.description: Snipe also deals 90% damage to enemies near the impact.

ExpulsionZone_zarya.name: Expulsion Zone
ExpulsionZone_zarya.description: Launch a gravity bomb that deals 124 (+4% per level) damage and creates an expulsion zone for 3.5 seconds. Enemies who enter the affected area are knocked back and have their Movement Speed reduced by 50% for 1 second.

ExtendedCare_ltmorales.name: Extended Care
ExtendedCare_ltmorales.description: Increase the range of Healing Beam by 30%.

ExtendedLightning_alarak.name: Extended Lightning
ExtendedLightning_alarak.description:
Reduce Sadism by 10%. Quest: Hit Heroes with the center of Lightning Surge. Reward: After hitting 5 Heroes, increase Lightning Surge's range by 20%. Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, Lightning Surge's center also Slows enemies by 40% for 2 seconds.
Reward: After hitting 3 Heroes with the center of a single cast, increase Sadism by 10% and instantly gain all other Rewards.

Exterminator_raynor.name: Exterminator
Exterminator_raynor.description: Basic Attacks deal 50% more damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters. This is increased to 100% while Inspire is active.

ExtraOomph_junkrat.name: Extra Oomph
ExtraOomph_junkrat.description: Increase RIP-Tire's knockback distance by 50%, and its cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds for each enemy Hero hit.

ExtraTNT_gazlowe.name: Extra TNT
ExtraTNT_gazlowe.description: Increases Xplodium Charge damage by 10% per target hit, up to 100%.

ExtraWoundTimers_junkrat.name: Extra-Wound Timers
ExtraWoundTimers_junkrat.description: Frag Launcher grenades last an additional 2 seconds before automatically detonating.

Exuberance_alexstrasza.name: Exuberance
Exuberance_alexstrasza.description: While above 75% Health, gain 15% Movement Speed.

EyeofHorus_ana.name: Eye of Horus
EyeofHorus_ana.description: Assume a sniping position, gaining the ability to fire up to 6 specialized rounds with unlimited range. Rounds hit the first allied or enemy Hero or enemy Structure in their path. Allies are healed for 285 (+4% per level) and enemies are damaged for 166 (+4% per level). Deals 50% less damage to Structures.  Ana is unable to move while Eye of Horus is active.

EyeofZuljin_zuljin.name: Eye of Zul'jin
EyeofZuljin_zuljin.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant Zul'jin 6% Movement Speed for 2 seconds, up to 30%.

EyesoftheHuntress_tyrande.name: Eyes of the Huntress
EyesoftheHuntress_tyrande.description: Shadowstalk reveals all enemy Heroes for 2 seconds and heals allies below 50% for 50% more.

EZPZDimensionalRipper_gazlowe.name: EZ-PZ Dimensional Ripper
EZPZDimensionalRipper_gazlowe.description: Deth Lazor slows Heroes by 50% and freezes non-Heroes for 3 seconds.

FaceSmelt_etc.name: Face Smelt
FaceSmelt_etc.description: Face Melt slows enemies by 50% fading over 2 seconds.

FaerieProtector_brightwing.name: Faerie Protector
FaerieProtector_brightwing.description: Activate to apply Pixie Dust to all nearby Heroes.

FallingSword_johanna.name: Falling Sword
FallingSword_johanna.description: Johanna leaps towards an area.  While in the air, she can steer the landing location by moving.  After 2 seconds Johanna lands, dealing 210 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies, Stunning them for 0.2 seconds, and Slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds.

FanaticalPower_whitemane.name: Fanatical Power
FanaticalPower_whitemane.description: Activate to gain 50% Spell Power and lose 25 Armor for 5 seconds.

Fanaticism_johanna.name: Fanaticism
Fanaticism_johanna.description: Increase the duration of Iron Skin by 2 seconds. While Iron Skin is active, Johanna gains 8% Movement Speed each time she takes damage, up to 40%.

FarflightQuiver_valla.name: Farflight Quiver
FarflightQuiver_valla.description: Increases Valla's Basic Attack range by 2.2.

FarseersBlessing_rehgar.name: Farseer's Blessing
FarseersBlessing_rehgar.description: Increases healing amount by 75%. Allies near the target are healed for 75% of the amount of health regained.

Farsight_rehgar.name: Farsight
Farsight_rehgar.description: Activate to reveal an area for 5 seconds. Enemies in the area are revealed for 3 seconds.

FastForward_chromie.name: Fast Forward
FastForward_chromie.description: If Sand Blast travels at least 70% of its base distance and hits a Hero, its cooldown is reduced to 0.75 seconds.

FastReload_nova.name: Fast Reload
FastReload_nova.description: Triple Tap's cooldown is reset if it kills an enemy Hero.

FatalFinesse_valeera.name: Fatal Finesse
FatalFinesse_valeera.description: Quest: Each time Blade Flurry damages an enemy Hero, its damage increases by 4, up to 80. Reward: After damaging 20 Heroes with Blade Flurry, permanently reduce its Energy cost by 20.

FavoroftheOldGods_cho.name: Favor of the Old Gods
FavoroftheOldGods_cho.description: Upheaval roots enemy Heroes for 1.5 seconds.

FealtyUntoDeath_leoric.name: Fealty Unto Death
FealtyUntoDeath_leoric.description: When a nearby friendly or enemy Minion dies, Leoric restores 1.25% (+4% per level) of his maximum Health and 6 Mana.

FeartheReaper_malthael.name: Fear the Reaper
FeartheReaper_malthael.description: Activate to increase Movement Speed by 25% and pass through other units for 4 seconds.

FeastonFear_diablo.name: Feast on Fear
FeastonFear_diablo.description: Stunning an enemy Hero with Shadow Charge or Overpower heals Diablo for 12% of his maximum Health over 3 seconds.

FeedingFrenzy_dehaka.name: Feeding Frenzy
FeedingFrenzy_dehaka.description: Basic Attacks reduce Drag's cooldown by 2 seconds.

FeedingtheFlame_blaze.name: Feeding the Flame
FeedingtheFlame_blaze.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Flame Stream reduces the cooldown of Oil Spill by 2 seconds and refunds 5 Mana.

FeeltheHeat_zarya.name: Feel the Heat
FeeltheHeat_zarya.description: Zarya's Basic Attack deals 50% additional damage to enemies in melee range.

FeignDeath_rexxar.name: Feign Death
FeignDeath_rexxar.description: Rexxar fakes his death, becoming Invulnerable and untargetable for 5 seconds. During this time you control Misha.

FelArmor_guldan.name: Fel Armor
FelArmor_guldan.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Fel Flame grants 40 Spell Armor for 2.5 seconds, reducing Ability Damage taken by 40%.

FelInfusion_kaelthas.name: Fel Infusion
FelInfusion_kaelthas.description: Increases Kael'thas's Spell Power by 4%. Kael'thas heals for 94 (+4% per level) Health when activating Verdant Spheres.

FeralHeart_rehgar.name: Feral Heart
FeralHeart_rehgar.description: Increases Health and Mana Regeneration by 75% while in Ghost Wolf form.

FeralResilience_thrall.name: Feral Resilience
FeralResilience_thrall.description: Heroes damaged by Feral Spirit grant 3 stacks of Frostwolf Resilience, and 2 stacks of Feral Resilience, granting 50 Physical Armor against the next incoming Hero Basic Attack.  Stacks are consumed on the next cast of Feral Spirit.

FerociousStalker_dehaka.name: Ferocious Stalker
FerociousStalker_dehaka.description: Dark Swarm deals 50% more damage while Brushstalker's Movement Speed bonus is active.

Ferocity_zuljin.name: Ferocity
Ferocity_zuljin.description: Increases the Attack Speed bonus of Berserker by 40%.

FesteringWounds_sylvanas.name: Festering Wounds
FesteringWounds_sylvanas.description: Increase Haunting Wave's damage by 25%. Haunting Wave applies 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse.

FetidTouch_stukov.name: Fetid Touch
FetidTouch_stukov.description: Quest: Hit Heroes with Weighted Pusule. Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, reduce the cooldown of Weighted Pustule by 2.5 seconds. Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, reduce the cooldown of Weighted Pustule by an additional 2.5 seconds and remove its Mana cost.

FieldStudy_deckard.name: Field Study
FieldStudy_deckard.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Scroll of Sealing grants 20% Spell Power for 16 seconds, up to 40%.

FieryBrand_illidan.name: Fiery Brand
FieryBrand_illidan.description: Every 4th attack against the same Hero deals an additional 7% of their maximum Health as damage.

FightorFlight_raynor.name: Fight or Flight
FightorFlight_raynor.description: Reduce Adrenaline Rush's cooldown by 10 seconds. Casting Adrenaline Rush grants 25 Armor for 3 seconds.

FinalCurtain_malthael.name: Final Curtain
FinalCurtain_malthael.description: Death Shroud leaves a trail in its wake for 4 seconds, applying Reaper's Mark to enemies in its area.

FinalCut_genji.name: Final Cut
FinalCut_genji.description: After 1 second, Swift Strike deals an additional 125 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in the area.

FinalToccata_orphea.name: Final Toccata
FinalToccata_orphea.description: Activate to instantly reset the cooldown of Shadow Waltz. For the next 6 seconds, dashing with Shadow Waltz resets its cooldown.

FingersofFrost_jaina.name: Fingers of Frost
FingersofFrost_jaina.description: Quest: Gathering Regeneration Globes to increase Jaina's Mana regeneration by 0.1 per second, up to 2 per second. Reward: After gathering 20 Globes, the damage bonus from Frostbite is increased by 10%.

FireWard_ragnaros.name: Fire Ward
FireWard_ragnaros.description: When Living Meteor hits an enemy Hero, gain a charge of Spell Block, reducing damage from the next enemy ability by 50%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

FireWithin_alexstrasza.name: Fire Within
FireWithin_alexstrasza.description: Hitting a Burning Hero with Flame Buffet heals Alexstrasza for 10% of her maximum Health.

Fireflies_liming.name: Fireflies
Fireflies_liming.description: Drastically increases Magic Missiles speed. Its cooldown is reduced by 1 second, and its Mana cost is reduced by 5.

FiresofHell_thebutcher.name: Fires of Hell
FiresofHell_thebutcher.description: Furnace Blast explodes a second time 3 seconds after the initial explosion.

Firestarter_cho.name: Firestarter
Firestarter_cho.description: Basic Attacks against ignited Heroes decreases the cooldown of Consuming Blaze by 1 second.  Passive: Reduce the cooldown of Consuming Blaze by 3 seconds.

FirinMahLazorz_gazlowe.name: Firin' Mah Lazorz
FirinMahLazorz_gazlowe.description: Firing Deth Lazor causes all of Gazlowe's Rock-It! Turrets to fire a Deth Lazor of their own that deals 137 (+4% per level) damage.

FirstResponder_ltmorales.name: First Responder
FirstResponder_ltmorales.description: While above 70 Energy, Healing Beam's healing is increased by 25%.

FirstStrike_sgthammer.name: First Strike
FirstStrike_sgthammer.description: Basic Attacks deal 25% more damage if Sgt. Hammer hasn't been attacked within the last 5 seconds.

FishEye_murky.name: Fish Eye
FishEye_murky.description: Egg's Health is increased by 100%, its sight radius is increased by 300% and it can see Stealthed enemies.  Passive: Spawning from his Egg increases Murky's mount speed to 45% for 5 seconds.

FishOil_murky.name: Fish Oil
FishOil_murky.description: The Pufferfish casts Slime at its location upon landing.

FishTank_murky.name: Fish Tank
FishTank_murky.description: Murky is healed for 25% of the damage he deals with Basic Attacks and Basic Abilities.

FissionBomb_kaelthas.name: Fission Bomb
FissionBomb_kaelthas.description: Increases Living Bomb's explosion radius by 20%.

FlailAxe_thebutcher.name: Flail Axe
FlailAxe_thebutcher.description: Increases the length of Hamstring by 40%.

FlailingSwipe_stukov.name: Flailing Swipe
FlailingSwipe_stukov.description: Swipe 3 times in front of Stukov over 1.75 seconds, dealing 48 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit and knocking them away. Each swipe is larger than the previous.

FlamesofFury_alexstrasza.name: Flames of Fury
FlamesofFury_alexstrasza.description: Quest: Hit 20 Burning Heroes with Flame Buffet. Reward: Hitting a Burning Hero with Flame Buffet reduces Dragonqueen's cooldown by 5 seconds.

FlamesofSulfuron_ragnaros.name: Flames of Sulfuron
FlamesofSulfuron_ragnaros.description: Sulfuras Smash slows enemies by 50% for 2 seconds, and enemies in the center are stunned for an additional 0.5 seconds.

Flamethrower_kaelthas.name: Flamethrower
Flamethrower_kaelthas.description: Increases the cast range of Flamestrike by 40%. If Flamestrike hits 2 or more Heroes, its cooldown is reduced by 4 seconds.

Flare_rexxar.name: Flare
Flare_rexxar.description: Fire a flare at an area, revealing it for 20 seconds.

FlashFire_blaze.name: Flash Fire
FlashFire_blaze.description: While Channeling Combustion, Blaze's Movement Speed is no longer reduced, and nearby enemies are Slowed by 60%

FlashofAnger_imperius.name: Flash of Anger
FlashofAnger_imperius.description: Hitting a Hero marked with Solarion's Fire with Celestial Charge deals 180 damage around the target.

FlawlessTechnique_hanzo.name: Flawless Technique
FlawlessTechnique_hanzo.description: Hitting Heroes with Storm Bow increases the damage of Hanzo's next Basic Attack within 5 seconds by 30%. Basic Attacks against Heroes increase the damage of Hanzo's next Storm Bow within 5 seconds by 30%.

FleetofFoot_hanzo.name: Fleet of Foot
FleetofFoot_hanzo.description: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow grants 10% Movement Speed for 6 seconds, up to 30%.

FlowLikeWater_genji.name: Flow Like Water
FlowLikeWater_genji.description: Each enemy Hero hit with Swift Strike reduces its cooldown by 3 seconds.

FlowRider_falstad.name: Flow Rider
FlowRider_falstad.description: While Tailwind is active, Falstad's Basic Abilities recharge 100% faster.

FlowingWounds_xul.name: Flowing Wounds
FlowingWounds_xul.description: Reduces Spectral Scythe's cooldown by 5 seconds if an enemy Hero is hit.

FocusFire_tracer.name: Focus Fire
FocusFire_tracer.description: If an entire ammo magazine is unloaded on an enemy, the last bullet will deal 94 (+4% per level) bonus damage.  This is equal to 35% of the total magazine.

FocusedBeam_tassadar.name: Focused Beam
FocusedBeam_tassadar.description: While Oracle is active, Basic Attacks against Heroes deal an additional 1% of the target's maximum Health as damage.

FocusingDiodes_tychus.name: Focusing Diodes
FocusingDiodes_tychus.description: Increases the range of the Drakken Laser Drill by 50%.  Deals increasing damage the longer it remains on a single target, up to 100% extra damage.

FollowThrough_artanis.name: Follow Through
FollowThrough_artanis.description: After using an Ability, your next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% additional damage.

ForceArmor_liming.name: Force Armor
ForceArmor_liming.description: When Magic Missiles damages an enemy Hero, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability, reducing the damage taken by 50%. Gain 1 charge per cast.  Stores up to 4 charges.

ForceBarrier_tassadar.name: Force Barrier
ForceBarrier_tassadar.description: Force Wall's Range is increased by 100% and its cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.

ForceofMagic_medivh.name: Force of Magic
ForceofMagic_medivh.description: Preventing at least 268 damage with a single cast of Force of Will grants 30% Spell Power for 15 seconds. This can stack up to 2 times.

ForceofWill_artanis.name: Force of Will
ForceofWill_artanis.description: Casting Basic Abilities reduces the cooldown of Shield Overload by 5 seconds.

ForceWall_tassadar.name: Force Wall
ForceWall_tassadar.description: Create a wall that blocks all units from moving through it for 2 seconds.  Passive: Increases the slow amount of Distortion Beam to 30%.

ForestMedicine_zuljin.name: Forest Medicine
ForestMedicine_zuljin.description: Regeneration is no longer Channeled, and cannot be interrupted.

ForestsWrath_lunara.name: Forest's Wrath
ForestsWrath_lunara.description: Thornwood Vine now applies 2 stacks of Nature's Toxin. Increases Thornwood Vine's range by 30% and Lunara's vision radius by 35%.

FortifiedBunker_blaze.name: Fortified Bunker
FortifiedBunker_blaze.description: Occupants can cast Oil Spill from Bunker Drop every 6 seconds. Additionally, Bunker Drop's Armor bonus upon exiting is increased by 25, and its duration by 1 second.

FreeDrinks_lili.name: Free Drinks
FreeDrinks_lili.description: Healing Brew's cooldown is reduced by 1 second and its Mana cost is refunded if it heals a Hero under 50% Health.

FrenziedAssault_malganis.name: Frenzied Assault
FrenziedAssault_malganis.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes with a higher Health percentage grant 40% Attack Speeed and 15% increased Physical Damage for 3% seconds.

FrenziedFists_cho.name: Frenzied Fists
FrenziedFists_cho.description: Gain 75% Attack Speed for 5 seconds after using Surging Fist.

Frenzy_varian.name: Frenzy
Frenzy_varian.description: Twin Blades of Fury increases Varian's Attack Speed by an additional 15%, and Basic Attacks increase his Movement Speed by an additional 10%.

FrenzyofKalimdor_rexxar.name: Frenzy of Kalimdor
FrenzyofKalimdor_rexxar.description: Rexxar's Basic Attacks deal 10% more damage, and Misha's Basic Attacks slow the target by 20% for 1.25 seconds.

FreshestIngredients_chen.name: Freshest Ingredients
FreshestIngredients_chen.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Chen's Health Regeneration by 1 per second. Reward: After gathering 30 Regeneration Globes, 50% of the Shield from Fortifying Brew persists indefinitely after drinking.

FriendorFoe_illidan.name: Friend or Foe
FriendorFoe_illidan.description: Increases the range of Dive by 20% and allows it to be used to dive to allied Heroes.

Fright_orphea.name: Fright
Fright_orphea.description: Dread's Slow also applies to enemies in Dread's path.

FrostArmor_jaina.name: Frost Armor
FrostArmor_jaina.description: Enemies that attack Jaina are Chilled. Additionally, every 10 seconds, Jaina gains 50 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 50%.

FrostBlast_kelthuzad.name: Frost Blast
FrostBlast_kelthuzad.description: Launch a meteor of ice at an enemy Hero. Upon impact, the meteor deals 115 (+2.5% per level) damage to its target and 275 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemies in the area. All enemies hit by Frost Blast are Rooted for 1.5 seconds.

FrostPresence_arthas.name: Frost Presence
FrostPresence_arthas.description: Quest: Root enemy Heroes with Howling Blast. Reward: After rooting 5 Heroes, Howling Blast's cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds. Reward: After rooting 10 Heroes, Howling Blast's range is increased by 30%. Reward: After rooting 20 Heroes, Howling Blast also roots enemies in its path.

FrostShards_jaina.name: Frost Shards
FrostShards_jaina.description: Frostbolt will now pierce the first target to hit an additional target behind them.

FrostShot_valla.name: Frost Shot
FrostShot_valla.description: Increases the range of Multishot by 20% and it also slows by 25% for 1.5 seconds.

FrostStorm_mephisto.name: Frost Storm
FrostStorm_mephisto.description: Enemies near Shade of Mephisto are Slowed by 50% for 2 seconds. Hitting enemies with Skull Missile while Shade of Mephisto is active increases its Slow to 50%.

FrostStrike_arthas.name: Frost Strike
FrostStrike_arthas.description: Reduces Frostmourne Hungers' cooldown by 2 seconds. Frostmourne Hungers also slows the enemy by 50% for 1.5 seconds.

FrostmourneFeeds_arthas.name: Frostmourne Feeds
FrostmourneFeeds_arthas.description: Increases the amount of Basic Attacks empowered by Frostmourne Hungers to 2.

FrostwolfPack_thrall.name: Frostwolf Pack
FrostwolfPack_thrall.description: Quest: Hit 6 Heroes with Feral Spirit. Progress is lost on death and when Thrall fails to hit a Hero. Reward: Reduce the cooldown and Mana cost of Feral Spirit by 50%.

FrostwolfsGrace_thrall.name: Frostwolf's Grace
FrostwolfsGrace_thrall.description: Frostwolf Resilience can be activated to instantly heal for 150% of its normal amount.  Frostwolf's Grace's activation has a 15 second cooldown.

FrozenWastes_arthas.name: Frozen Wastes
FrozenWastes_arthas.description: Frozen Tempest Mana cost reduced by 4 per second. Quest: Damage enemy Heroes with Frozen Tempest. Reward: After damaging enemy Heroes 150 times with Frozen Tempest, the Movement and Attack Speed slows of Frozen Tempest last an extra 1.5 seconds against enemy Heroes.

FuelfortheFlame_cho.name: Fuel for the Flame
FuelfortheFlame_cho.description: Quest: Every Minion killed near Cho increases the amount healed by Consuming Blaze by 0.3%. Quest: Every Hero Takedown increases the amount healed by Consuming Blaze by 3%.

FuelLeak_blaze.name: Fuel Leak
FuelLeak_blaze.description: Jet Propulsion creates Oil Spills along Blaze's path. If Jet Propulsion impacts an enemy Hero, an additional Oil Spill is created underneath them.

FuelTheRush_raynor.name: Fuel The Rush
FuelTheRush_raynor.description: While Inspire is active, increase Adrenaline Rush's cooldown reduction from Basic Attacks by 200%.

FueledbyTorment_malganis.name: Fueled by Torment
FueledbyTorment_malganis.description: While Necrotic Embrace is active, Mal'Ganis heals for 11 when damage is taken and Vampiric Touch converts 15% more Hero damage into healing.

FuriousBlow_sonya.name: Furious Blow
FuriousBlow_sonya.description: Every 4th cast of Seismic Slam deals 50% more damage to the primary target and costs no Fury.

FuriousSpark_mephisto.name: Furious Spark
FuriousSpark_mephisto.description: Every 5th hit from Lightning Nova against the same target deals 94 bonus damage.

FurnaceBlast_thebutcher.name: Furnace Blast
FurnaceBlast_thebutcher.description: After a 3 second delay, fire explodes around The Butcher dealing 500 (+4% per level) damage to enemies.  Can be cast while using Ruthless Onslaught.

FuryoftheStorm_nazeebo.name: Fury of the Storm
FuryoftheStorm_nazeebo.description: Every 5 seconds, your next Basic Attack will deal an additional 91 (+4% per level) damage to the target, and 228 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

FuryoftheSunwell_kaelthas.name: Fury of the Sunwell
FuryoftheSunwell_kaelthas.description: Flamestrike will explode a second time 1.5 seconds later.

FuryoftheSwarm_kerrigan.name: Fury of the Swarm
FuryoftheSwarm_kerrigan.description: Gain 10% more Assimilation Shields from Basic Attacks. After casting Ravage, Kerrigan's next Basic Attack within 3 seconds splashes for 100% damage around the target.

FusionGenerator_dva.name: Fusion Generator
FusionGenerator_dva.description: Every time an enemy Hero deals damage while inside Defense Matrix, D.Va's Self-Destruct Charge increases by 1%.  Max of 15% Charge gained per use.

GainTrain_zarya.name: Gain Train
GainTrain_zarya.description: Shield Ally now grants an untalented shield to a nearby ally upon impact.

GaleForce_lili.name: Gale Force
GaleForce_lili.description: Increase Blinding Wind's duration by .75 second. Li Li's Basic Attacks against Blinded Heroes deal 75% increased damage.

GallopingGait_lunara.name: Galloping Gait
GallopingGait_lunara.description: Activate to increase the Movement Speed bonus of Dryad's Swiftness to 80% for 6 seconds.  Galloping Gait's activation has a 30 second cooldown.

Gargantuan_nazeebo.name: Gargantuan
Gargantuan_nazeebo.description: Summon a Gargantuan to guard an area for 20 seconds. Deals 100 (+4% per level) damage when summoned, attacks for 140 (+4% per level) damage, and can be ordered to stomp nearby enemies.

GasFlare_stitches.name: Gas Flare
GasFlare_stitches.description: Deals 15 damage per second to nearby Enemies. Hitting an enemy Hero with Hook increases this damage by 150% for 4 seconds.

GateKeeper_probius.name: Gate Keeper
GateKeeper_probius.description: Null Gate lasts indefinitely if either end is within a Power Field.  Only one Null Gate may be active at a time.

GatherMinerals_probius.name: Gather Minerals
GatherMinerals_probius.description: Quest: Enemy Heroes and Minions drop Minerals when killed. Collect them to increase the Health of Photon Cannons by 8, up to 560. Reward: After collecting 70 Minerals, Photon Cannons deal 35% more damage, can see over obstacles, and reveal nearby Cloaked units.

GatheringStorm_falstad.name: Gathering Storm
GatheringStorm_falstad.description: Quest: Every time Hammerang hits a Hero increase its damage by 1.5 and refund 10 Mana.

GetStuffed_tracer.name: Get Stuffed!
GetStuffed_tracer.description: Reduces Melee's cooldown by 3 seconds. Hitting an enemy with Melee who is stuck with a Pulse Bomb causes the bomb to instantly explode and knocks the target away.

GetThroughThis_dva.name: Get Through This!
GetThroughThis_dva.description: Increase the duration of Defense Matrix by 3 seconds.

GGWP_dva.name: GG, WP
GGWP_dva.description: Increase Pilot Mode Basic Attack damage by 50%. Participating in a Takedown while in Pilot Mode instantly refreshes the cooldown of Call Mech.

GhastlyArmor_mephisto.name: Ghastly Armor
GhastlyArmor_mephisto.description: Shade of Mephisto grants 20 Armor while active and for 2.5 seconds after it ends.

GhastlyReach_leoric.name: Ghastly Reach
GhastlyReach_leoric.description: Increase the range of Skeletal Swing by 25%.

GhostProtocol_nova.name: Ghost Protocol
GhostProtocol_nova.description: Activate to gain Stealth and become Unrevealable for 2 seconds. Nova's attacks and Abilities will also not break Stealth during this time.

GiantKiller_sgthammer.name: Giant Killer
GiantKiller_sgthammer.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1.5% of the Hero's maximum Health.

GiantKiller_falstad.name: Giant Killer
GiantKiller_falstad.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1.5% of the Hero's maximum Health.

GiantScorcher_ragnaros.name: Giant Scorcher
GiantScorcher_ragnaros.description: Empower Sulfuras burns enemy Heroes for 9% of their maximum Health over 3 seconds. This additional damage does not heal Ragnaros.

GiantSlammer_sonya.name: Giant Slammer
GiantSlammer_sonya.description: Basic Attacks and Seismic Slam deal an additional 1.25% of Heroes' maximum Health as damage.

GiantSlayer_hanzo.name: Giant Slayer
GiantSlayer_hanzo.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Scatter Arrow and Basic Attacks take a bonus 2% of their maximum Health as damage.

GiddyUp_raynor.name: Giddy-Up
GiddyUp_raynor.description: Gain 8% Movement Speed while mounted and unmounted. Inspire grants 8% more Movement Speed.

GiftoftheNaaru_yrel.name: Gift of the Naaru
GiftoftheNaaru_yrel.description: Divine Purpose heals the lowest Health nearby allied Hero other than Yrel for 275.

GiftoftheXelNaga_zeratul.name: Gift of the Xel'Naga
GiftoftheXelNaga_zeratul.description: Allies are no longer affected by Void Prison, and enemies are slowed by 50% for 3 seconds once Void Prison ends.

GilneanRoulette_greymane.name: Gilnean Roulette
GilneanRoulette_greymane.description: Cursed Bullet now hits all enemy heroes in its path and has its cooldown reduced by 5 seconds per hit.

GiveemtheAxe_muradin.name: Give 'em the Axe!
GiveemtheAxe_muradin.description: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases Muradin's Basic Attack damage by 50% for 3 seconds.

GiveMeMore_raynor.name: Give Me More!
GiveMeMore_raynor.description: Increase Adrenaline Rush healing by 50%. While Inspire is active, gain 1 Basic Attack range.

GiveMeTwenty_zarya.name: Give Me Twenty
GiveMeTwenty_zarya.description: Quest: Regeneration Globes increase Shield Ally absorb amount by 15, up to 300 permanently. Reward: After collecting 20 Regen Globes, permanently reduce the cooldown of Shield Ally by 2 seconds.

GladiatorsWarShout_rehgar.name: Gladiator's War Shout
GladiatorsWarShout_rehgar.description: Increases Bloodlust's healing from 30% to 60% of Basic Attack damage done.

GlassCannon_liming.name: Glass Cannon
GlassCannon_liming.description: Increase Li-Ming's Spell Power by 15%, but decrease her maximum Health by 15%.

GlimmerofHope_auriel.name: Glimmer of Hope
GlimmerofHope_auriel.description: Collecting a Regeneration Globe reduces the cost of Auriel's next Ray of Heaven by 75%.

Gloom_valla.name: Gloom
Gloom_valla.description: Activate to consume all Hatred, granting 3 Spell Armor per Hatred consumed for 5 seconds.  Passive: Permanently gain 20 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 20%.

GlorytotheAlliance_varian.name: Glory to the Alliance
GlorytotheAlliance_varian.description: Banner now also increases health regeneration and all healing received for nearby allied Heroes by 50%, and the cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds.

Gluttony_azmodan.name: Gluttony
Gluttony_azmodan.description: Increase the number of stacks of Annihilation gained by hitting Heroes with Globe of Annihilation from 2 to 3. Quest: After gaining 200 Annihilation, each enemy hit by Globe of Annihilation reduces its cooldown by 0.25 seconds, doubled against Heroes.

GlyphOfPolyBomb_medivh.name: Glyph Of Poly Bomb
GlyphOfPolyBomb_medivh.description: Poly Bomb explodes 1 second sooner and the spread radius is increased by 25%.

GofortheThroat_greymane.name: Go for the Throat
GofortheThroat_greymane.description: Leap at an enemy Hero and shapeshift into a Worgen, slashing for 355 (+4% per level) damage. If this kills them, the Ability can be used a second time within 10 seconds for free.

GoblinFusion_gazlowe.name: Goblin Fusion
GoblinFusion_gazlowe.description: Deth Lazor can be charged for 1 additional second to increase its damage bonus by an additional 100%.

GoblinRepairs_gazlowe.name: Goblin Repairs
GoblinRepairs_gazlowe.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Health Regeneration by 1 per second, up to 25. Reward: After gathering 25 Globes, gain an additional 15 Health Regeneration per second.

Gorge_stitches.name: Gorge
Gorge_stitches.description: Consume an enemy Hero, trapping them for 4 seconds. When Gorge ends, the enemy Hero takes 274 (+4% per level) damage. The trapped Hero cannot move or act and doesn't take damage from other sources.  Cannot be used on massive Heroes.

GottaTrapEmAll_junkrat.name: Gotta Trap 'Em All!
GottaTrapEmAll_junkrat.description: Quest: Hit 7 Heroes with Steel Trap. Reward: Reduce Steel Trap's cooldown by 3 seconds and increase the maximum number of active traps to 3.

GraceOfAir_thrall.name: Grace Of Air
GraceOfAir_thrall.description: Windfury attacks grant twice as many stacks of Frostwolf Resilience.

GraduatingRange_sgthammer.name: Graduating Range
GraduatingRange_sgthammer.description: While in Siege Mode, Basic Attack range is increased by 1 every 3 seconds, up to 3.

GrandSlam_muradin.name: Grand Slam
GrandSlam_muradin.description: Haymaker gains a 2nd charge and its damage its increased by 25%. If a Hero dies within 3 seconds of being hit by Haymaker, instantly gain 1 charge.

GravOBomb3000_gazlowe.name: Grav-O-Bomb 3000
GravOBomb3000_gazlowe.description: After a 2 second delay, pull enemies toward the center of an area and deal 251 (+4% per level) damage.

GravitonSurge_zarya.name: Graviton Surge
GravitonSurge_zarya.description: Launch a gravity bomb that detonates after 1 second and draws enemy Heroes toward the center for 2.5 seconds.

GravitonVortex_artanis.name: Graviton Vortex
GravitonVortex_artanis.description: Reduce the Mana cost of Phase Prism from 70 to 25. Hitting an enemy Hero with Basic Attacks or Blade Dash reduces the cooldown of Phase Prism by 1.25 seconds.

GravityKills_zarya.name: Gravity Kills
GravityKills_zarya.description: Increases Graviton Surge's duration by 1 second and causes it to deal 175 (+4% per level) damage over the duration.

GravityWell_probius.name: Gravity Well
GravityWell_probius.description: Enemies are slowed more the closer they are to the center of the Warp Rift, up to a maximum slow of 60%.

GreaterCleave_zeratul.name: Greater Cleave
GreaterCleave_zeratul.description: Increases the radius of Cleave by 33%.

GreaterPolymorph_brightwing.name: Greater Polymorph
GreaterPolymorph_brightwing.description: Increase Polymorph's range by 30%. Hero Takedowns refresh the cooldown of Polymorph.

GreaterSpellShield_lunara.name: Greater Spell Shield
GreaterSpellShield_lunara.description: Every 30 seconds, gain 75 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 75%.  Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

Greed_azmodan.name: Greed
Greed_azmodan.description: Increase the time Minions will grant Annihilation from 1.5 to 3 seconds. Quest: After gaining 200 Annihilation, Globe of Annihilation's range is increased by 33% and it deals 20% more damage to Non-Heroic targets.

GrenadeCalibration_ana.name: Grenade Calibration
GrenadeCalibration_ana.description: Quest: Hit enemy Heroes with Biotic Grenade. Reward: After hitting 10 Heroes, Biotic Grenade does 75% more damage per allied and enemy Hero hit. Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, Biotic Grenade's duration on allies is increased from 4 seconds to 12 seconds, and its healing radius is increased by 100%, and its healing amplification applies to all sources.

Grenadier_zarya.name: Grenadier
Grenadier_zarya.description: All Particle Grenade charges are returned at once.

GrillandKill_blaze.name: Grill and Kill
GrillandKill_blaze.description: Quest: Damage enemy Heroes with Ignited Oil Spills 60 times. Reward: Increase Oil Spill's Ignite duration by 2 seconds, and damage by 20%.

GrimScythe_xul.name: Grim Scythe
GrimScythe_xul.description: Each enemy hit by Cursed Strikes reduces its cooldown by 0.75 seconds, up to 12 seconds.

GrizzledFortitude_rexxar.name: Grizzled Fortitude
GrizzledFortitude_rexxar.description: Every 7 seconds, Rexxar and Misha gain 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%.  Stores up to 2 charges. Both Rexxar and Misha have their own charges.

GroundingBolt_cassia.name: Grounding Bolt
GroundingBolt_cassia.description: Lightning Fury Slows enemies hit by 20% for 1.5 seconds.

GrowingInfestation_stukov.name: Growing Infestation
GrowingInfestation_stukov.description: Lurking Arm's area expands by 50% over 2.5 seconds, but it cannot be Channeled for longer than 4 seconds.

GrowingNightmare_orphea.name: Growing Nightmare
GrowingNightmare_orphea.description: Each Hero hit by the wave of Dread increases the damage of its eruption by 25%.

GuardianofAncientKings_uther.name: Guardian of Ancient Kings
GuardianofAncientKings_uther.description: Healing a Hero that is Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced increases the Armor bonus they receive from Devotion from 15 to 50.

GuardianofTirisfal_medivh.name: Guardian of Tirisfal
GuardianofTirisfal_medivh.description: Minions and Catapults hit by Arcane Rift are instantly killed.

GuardianToads_nazeebo.name: Guardian Toads
GuardianToads_nazeebo.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Plague of Toads gives 25 Armor for 2 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

GuidingLight_whitemane.name: Guiding Light
GuidingLight_whitemane.description: Whenever Zeal is applied to allies other than Whitemane, it grants them 20% Movement Speed for 2 seconds.

Guillotine_zuljin.name: Guillotine
Guillotine_zuljin.description: Zul'jin launches a massive axe into the air that drops on the targeted area, dealing 330 (+4% per level) damage plus bonus damage the lower his Health is.

GuitarHero_etc.name: Guitar Hero
GuitarHero_etc.description: While Guitar Solo is active, E.T.C. heals for 50% of his damage dealt by Basic Attacks.

HallowedGround_yrel.name: Hallowed Ground
HallowedGround_yrel.description: Casting Avenging Wrath while inside Sacred Ground moves Sacred Ground to Yrel's location upon landing.

HammerGains_falstad.name: Hammer Gains
HammerGains_falstad.description: Basic Attacks heal for 20% of the damage dealt to the primary target.

HammeroftheLightbringer_uther.name: Hammer of the Lightbringer
HammeroftheLightbringer_uther.description: Quest: Basic Attack enemies 75 times. Reward: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Hammer of Justice by 1.5 second.  Passive: Basic Attacks restore 1.5% of Uther's maximum Mana.

HammerofTwilight_cho.name: Hammer of Twilight
HammerofTwilight_cho.description: Activate to swing the Hammer of Twilight, dealing 150 (+4.5% per level) damage, pushing enemies away, and Stunning them for 0.75 seconds.  Passive: Cho's Basic Attacks deal 25% increased damage.

Hammeron_etc.name: Hammer-on
Hammeron_etc.description: After using an Ability, E.T.C.'s next 2 Basic Attacks deal 35% more damage.

HandofFreedom_yrel.name: Hand of Freedom
HandofFreedom_yrel.description: Grant an allied Hero 50% Movement Speed for 3 seconds and remove all Slows and Roots from them.  Cannot be used on Yrel.

HandofProtection_uther.name: Hand of Protection
HandofProtection_uther.description: Activate to make target ally Unstoppable for 1 second. Cannot be cast on Uther. Basic Attacks reduce Hand of Protection's cooldown by 5 seconds.

HandofRagnaros_ragnaros.name: Hand of Ragnaros
HandofRagnaros_ragnaros.description: If Empower Sulfuras hits at least 2 enemy Heroes, it restores 10 Mana and its cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.

HardStyle_lucio.name: Hard Style
HardStyle_lucio.description: Gain 25 Armor while Wall Ride's Movement Speed bonus is active, reducing damage taken by 25%.

HardenedBones_leoric.name: Hardened Bones
HardenedBones_leoric.description: Gain 40 Armor while Drain Hope is active. If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, retain the Armor bonus for 2 seconds.

HardenedShield_anubarak.name: Hardened Shield
HardenedShield_anubarak.description: Activate to gain 75 Armor for 4 seconds, taking 75% less damage.

HardenedSkin_rexxar.name: Hardened Skin
HardenedSkin_rexxar.description: Rexxar and Misha gain 75 Armor for 4 seconds, reducing damage taken by 75%.

HarshDiscipline_whitemane.name: Harsh Discipline
HarshDiscipline_whitemane.description: Hitting a Hero with Searing Lash while they are being targeted by Inquisition Roots them for 1.5 seconds.

HarshMoonlight_tyrande.name: Harsh Moonlight
HarshMoonlight_tyrande.description: Sentinel Slows the first target hit by 40% and reduces their damage dealt by 40% for 4 seconds.

HarshWinds_samuro.name: Harsh Winds
HarshWinds_samuro.description: Attacking a Hero during Wind Walk causes them to take 30% increased damage from Samuro for 3 seconds.

HarvestLife_guldan.name: Harvest Life
HarvestLife_guldan.description: Drain Life heals for 75% more Health when used on Heroes.

HarvestVitality_xul.name: Harvest Vitality
HarvestVitality_xul.description: Cursed Strikes heals for 60% of the damage dealt to Heroes.

HastyBargain_alarak.name: Hasty Bargain
HastyBargain_alarak.description: Activate to permanently reduce Alarak's Sadism by 4% and reset the cooldowns of his Basic Abilities.

HatefulMending_mephisto.name: Hateful Mending
HatefulMending_mephisto.description: Skull Missile heals Mephisto for 60% of the damage it deals to Heroes.

Haunt_guldan.name: Haunt
Haunt_guldan.description: Increases the duration of Horrify by 1 second, and while Feared, enemies lose 20 Armor, causing them to take 20% increased damage.

Haymaker_muradin.name: Haymaker
Haymaker_muradin.description: Stun target enemy Hero, and wind up a punch dealing 319 (+4% per level) damage and knocking the target back, hitting enemies in the way for 319 (+4% per level) damage and knocking them aside.

Headhunter_zuljin.name: Headhunter
Headhunter_zuljin.description: Quest: Zul'jin's first Takedown against each enemy Hero permanently increases his damage dealt by 2%. Reward: After getting Takedowns on every enemy Hero, Basic Attack range is increased by 1.1.

HealingStatic_muradin.name: Healing Static
HealingStatic_muradin.description: Muradin heals for 5% of his Max Health for each Hero hit by Thunder Clap.

HealingTotem_rehgar.name: Healing Totem
HealingTotem_rehgar.description: Activate to place a Totem that heals allies in an area for 2% of their maximum Health every second for 10 seconds.

HealthFunnel_guldan.name: Health Funnel
HealthFunnel_guldan.description: Drain Life's cooldown recharges 100% faster while it is channeling. If an enemy dies while under the effect of Drain Life, the cooldown is instantly refreshed.

Healthstone_guldan.name: Healthstone
Healthstone_guldan.description: Activate to heal for 25% of Gul'dan's maximum Health.

HeatExhaustion_alexstrasza.name: Heat Exhaustion
HeatExhaustion_alexstrasza.description: Increase Flame Buffet's initial Slow from 40% to 60%.

HeatofBattle_imperius.name: Heat of Battle
HeatofBattle_imperius.description: Molten Armor heals 35% more while Imperius is below 50% Health.

HeatTreatment_blaze.name: Heat Treatment
HeatTreatment_blaze.description: Heal for 75% of the damage dealt by Pyromania.

HeavensFury_johanna.name: Heaven's Fury
HeavensFury_johanna.description: While in the air, holy bolts rain down on enemies dealing 75 (+4% per level) damage and reducing the cooldown of Falling Sword by 3 seconds for each enemy hit.

HeavenlyHost_imperius.name: Heavenly Host
HeavenlyHost_imperius.description: Nearby allied Heroes gain 600 Shield for 3 seconds.  If the Shield lasts the full duration, fire a sword at the nearest enemy Hero, dealing 140 damage.

HeavenlyZeal_kharazim.name: Heavenly Zeal
HeavenlyZeal_kharazim.description: Increases Breath of Heaven's Movement Speed bonus to 30%.

HeavyBurden_auriel.name: Heavy Burden
HeavyBurden_auriel.description: When an enemy Hero is stunned by Detainment Strike, their Movement Speed is slowed by 40% for 3 seconds after the stun.

HeavyImpact_muradin.name: Heavy Impact
HeavyImpact_muradin.description: Enemies hit by Dwarf Toss are slowed by 80% for 0.75 seconds.

HeavySlugs_raynor.name: Heavy Slugs
HeavySlugs_raynor.description: Activate to increase the distance of the next Penetrating Round by 30% and increase its Slow duration to 6 seconds.

HellRift_azmodan.name: Hell Rift
HellRift_azmodan.description: If All Shall Burn Channels for its full duration, Demon Warrior is summoned at the target's location and all Demon Warriors deal 100% increased damage for 5 seconds.

Hellfire_diablo.name: Hellfire
Hellfire_diablo.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Fire Stomp grants 2% Spell Power for 10 seconds, up to 30%.

HellforgedArmor_azmodan.name: Hellforged Armor
HellforgedArmor_azmodan.description: Demon Warriors and Lieutenants gain 25 Armor and last 4 seconds longer.

Hellgate_diablo.name: Hellgate
Hellgate_diablo.description: Teleport and place a demonic rune at target location. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 137 (+4% per level) damage and stunning enemies for 1.75 seconds.

Hemorrhage_valeera.name: Hemorrhage
Hemorrhage_valeera.description: Valeera's Basic Attacks deal 30% additional damage to enemies affected by Garrote.

HereandThere_chromie.name: Here and There
HereandThere_chromie.description: Activate to swap Chromie's position with her Sand Blast Echo.

HeroStalker_dehaka.name: Hero Stalker
HeroStalker_dehaka.description: Increases Essence gained from Takedowns by 100%. Hitting enemy Heroes with Dark Swarm grants 1 Essence.

HeroicDifficulty_ragnaros.name: Heroic Difficulty
HeroicDifficulty_ragnaros.description: Molten Core has 25% increased Health and Damage, and its cooldown is reduced by 50 seconds.

HexedCrawlers_nazeebo.name: Hexed Crawlers
HexedCrawlers_nazeebo.description: Corpse spiders restore 1% of Nazeebo's maximum Health and Mana when they attack an enemy Hero.

HighInquisitor_whitemane.name: High Inquisitor
HighInquisitor_whitemane.description: Casting Inquisition instantly removes all stacks of Desperation and restores 75 Mana per stack removed.

HighKingsQuest_varian.name: High King's Quest
HighKingsQuest_varian.description: Quest: Hit 50 Heroes with Basic Attacks. Quest: Participate in 5 Hero Takedowns. Quest: Gather 20 Regeneration Globes. Reward: Completing a Quest grants 10 Base Attack Damage. Completing all 3 Quests grants an additional 45 Base Attack Damage.

HinderedMotion_alarak.name: Hindered Motion
HinderedMotion_alarak.description: Telekinesis Slows enemies by 25% for 2 seconds.

HinderingMoonfire_malfurion.name: Hindering Moonfire
HinderingMoonfire_malfurion.description: Moonfire Slows enemy Heroes by 25% for 2 seconds.

HinderingWinds_lili.name: Hindering Winds
HinderingWinds_lili.description: Blinding Wind Slows enemy Hero Movement Speed by 25% for 1.5 seconds.

HinterlandBlast_falstad.name: Hinterland Blast
HinterlandBlast_falstad.description: After 1 second, deal 475 (+4.8% per level) damage to enemies within a long line. The cooldown is reduced by 25 seconds for every enemy Hero hit.

HippityHop_lunara.name: Hippity Hop
HippityHop_lunara.description: After not Basic Attacking or taking damage for 5 seconds, increase the Move Speed bonus of Dryad's Swiftness by 10%.

HiredGoons_gazlowe.name: Hired Goons
HiredGoons_gazlowe.description: Friendly non-Boss Mercenaries near Gazlowe deal 50% more damage. Rock-it! Turrets gain 50 Armor against Minions and Mercenaries, reducing their damage taken by 50%.

HitMe_zarya.name: Hit Me
HitMe_zarya.description: Damage absorbed by Zarya's Shields contributes 15% more Energy.

HittheNitrous_dva.name: Hit the Nitrous
HittheNitrous_dva.description: Initial speed of Boosters is increased to 325%, then decays to normal boost speed over 0.5 seconds. During this time, Boosters deals 50% extra damage.

HiveMaster_anubarak.name: Hive Master
HiveMaster_anubarak.description: Gain a permanent Vampire Locust that attacks a nearby enemy every 3 seconds. The Vampire Locust deals 153 (+4% per level) damage and returns to heal Anub'arak for 37 (+4% per level) health.

Hivemind_abathur.name: Hivemind
Hivemind_abathur.description: Symbiote creates an additional Symbiote on a nearby allied Hero.  This Symbiote mimics the commands of the first, but does half damage and shielding.

HoldYourGround_johanna.name: Hold Your Ground
HoldYourGround_johanna.description: Increases Iron Skin's Shield by 50% and its cooldown is reduced by 4 seconds.

HoloStability_nova.name: Holo Stability
HoloStability_nova.description: Increases the cast range of Holo Decoy by 100% and its duration by 120%.

HolyArena_tyrael.name: Holy Arena
HolyArena_tyrael.description: Increases duration of Sanctification by 1 second and increases the damage of allies by 25%.

HolyAvenger_yrel.name: Holy Avenger
HolyAvenger_yrel.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Avenging Wrath at maximum charge reduces its cooldown to 1 second.

HolyFervor_imperius.name: Holy Fervor
HolyFervor_imperius.description: Activate to cause the next 4 Basic Attacks to cleave for 157 damage.

HolyFire_uther.name: Holy Fire
HolyFire_uther.description: Deal 13 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes increase this damage by 20% for 3 seconds. This can stack up to 3 times.

HolyFury_johanna.name: Holy Fury
HolyFury_johanna.description: Deal 12 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Each Hero hit by Condemn increases this damage by 40% for 5 seconds.

HolyGround_tyrael.name: Holy Ground
HolyGround_tyrael.description: Create a ring that blocks enemies from entering the area teleported to using El'druin's Might.

HolyRenewal_johanna.name: Holy Renewal
HolyRenewal_johanna.description: Every enemy Hero affected by Shield Glare restores 114 (+4% per level) health.

HolyShock_uther.name: Holy Shock
HolyShock_uther.description: Holy Light can be used on an enemy to do 50% of its healing amount as damage. When used this way, Uther receives its self-healing benefits, its cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds, and it refunds 45 Mana.

HolyWrath_yrel.name: Holy Wrath
HolyWrath_yrel.description: After casting a Basic Ability, Yrel's next Basic Attack splashes for 20% increased damage around the target.

Hopelessness_leoric.name: Hopelessness
Hopelessness_leoric.description: Increase the range of Drain Hope by 25%.

HoradricReforging_tyrael.name: Horadric Reforging
HoradricReforging_tyrael.description: Tyrael's Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of El'druin's Might by 1.5 seconds.

HoradricStaff_deckard.name: Horadric Staff
HoradricStaff_deckard.description: Every 5 seconds, Deckard's next Basic Attack Stuns Heroes for 0.75 seconds.

Horrify_guldan.name: Horrify
Horrify_guldan.description: After 0.5 seconds, deal 120 (+4% per level) damage and fear enemy Heroes in the area for 2 seconds.

HotPursuit_valla.name: Hot Pursuit
HotPursuit_valla.description: When at 10 stacks of Hatred, the Movement Speed bonus increases to 20% total and Valla gains 4 Mana per second.

HoverSiegeMode_sgthammer.name: Hover Siege Mode
HoverSiegeMode_sgthammer.description: Sgt. Hammer can move at 40% Movement Speed while in Siege Mode.

Humongoid_nazeebo.name: Humongoid
Humongoid_nazeebo.description: Reduce Gargantuan's cooldown by 40 seconds and its Mana cost by 50%.

HungerforPower_guldan.name: Hunger for Power
HungerforPower_guldan.description: Increases Spell Power by 15% but reduces healing received from allies by 25%.

HungeroftheWolf_rehgar.name: Hunger of the Wolf
HungeroftheWolf_rehgar.description: Ghost Wolf attacks against Heroes deal an additional 5% of the target's maximum Health and heal Rehgar for 5% of his maximum Health.

HungeringCold_kelthuzad.name: Hungering Cold
HungeringCold_kelthuzad.description: Enemies that are Rooted take an additional 55 (+2.5% per level) damage each time they are damaged by Kel'Thuzad.

HungryBear_rexxar.name: Hungry Bear
HungryBear_rexxar.description: Misha's Basic Attacks heal her for 4.5% of her maximum Health.

HungryforMore_stitches.name: Hungry for More
HungryforMore_stitches.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Stitches's maximum Health by 30. Reward: Every 15 Globes gathered permanently increases Stitches's Movement Speed by 5%, up to 20%.

HungryHungryStitches_stitches.name: Hungry Hungry Stitches
HungryHungryStitches_stitches.description: For 4 seconds after using Gorge, Stitches can teleport a short distance to additional targets and Gorge them.

HunkaBurningOlaf_thelostvikings.name: Hunka' Burning Olaf
HunkaBurningOlaf_thelostvikings.description: Olaf deals 34 (+4% per level) damage every second to nearby enemies.

HuntersBlunderbuss_greymane.name: Hunter's Blunderbuss
HuntersBlunderbuss_greymane.description: Human Basic Attacks splash for 100% damage behind the target.

HuntersOnslaught_illidan.name: Hunter's Onslaught
HuntersOnslaught_illidan.description: Basic Abilities heal for 25% of the damage they deal. This bonus is doubled versus Heroes.

HunterGatherer_rexxar.name: Hunter-Gatherer
HunterGatherer_rexxar.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Rexxar's Health Regeneration by 1.25 per second, up to 25 per second. Reward: After gathering 20 Globes, Rexxar and Misha gain 15 Armor.

HuntressFury_tyrande.name: Huntress' Fury
HuntressFury_tyrande.description: Increase the cast range and duration of Hunter's Mark by 25%. Tyrande's Basic Attacks against targets with Hunter's Mark splash to nearby enemies.

Hurricane_sonya.name: Hurricane
Hurricane_sonya.description: Reduces the cooldown of Whirlwind by 2 second and Whirlwind removes all slows and roots on Sonya.

Hush_brightwing.name: Hush!
Hush_brightwing.description: Enemy Heroes hit by the center of Arcane Flare are Silenced for 1 seconds and deal 25% less damage for 3 seconds.

HydraliskTransfusion_zagara.name: Hydralisk Transfusion
HydraliskTransfusion_zagara.description: Zagara is healed for 75% of the damage dealt by Hunter Killers' Basic Attacks to Heroes.

HyperShift_brightwing.name: Hyper Shift
HyperShift_brightwing.description: Increase Phase Shift's healing by an additional 10% of the target's maximum Health. Nearby enemy Minion deaths reduce Phase Shift's cooldown by 2 seconds.

HyperCoolingEngines_sgthammer.name: Hyper-Cooling Engines
HyperCoolingEngines_sgthammer.description: While in Siege Mode, hitting Heroes with Basic Attacks reduces the cooldown of Thrusters by 5 seconds.

Hyperactivity_ltmorales.name: Hyperactivity
Hyperactivity_ltmorales.description: Reduce the cooldown of Stim Drone from 90 seconds to 45 seconds, and increase the Movement Speed bonus from 25% to 50%.

HyperfocusCoils_gazlowe.name: Hyperfocus Coils
HyperfocusCoils_gazlowe.description: The mana cost of Deth Lazor is reduced by 30 and it charges twice as fast.

Hyperion_raynor.name: Hyperion
Hyperion_raynor.description: Order the Hyperion to make a strafing run dealing 66 (+4% per level) damage a second, hitting up to 4 enemies. Also occasionally fires its Yamato Cannon on Structures for 794 (+4% per level) damage. Lasts 12 seconds.

Hysteria_mephisto.name: Hysteria
Hysteria_mephisto.description: Lord of Hatred also reduces the cooldown of Mephisto's Heroic Ability.

IAmtheStrongest_zarya.name: I Am the Strongest
IAmtheStrongest_zarya.description: Personal Barrier absorbs an additional 140 (+4% per level) damage.

IceBarrier_jaina.name: Ice Barrier
IceBarrier_jaina.description: Gain a Shield for 25% of Ability damage dealt to Chilled targets. The shield lasts 4 seconds.

IceBlink_jaina.name: Ice Blink
IceBlink_jaina.description: Activate to teleport a short distance and Chill all nearby enemies.

IceBlock_nazeebo.name: Ice Block
IceBlock_nazeebo.description: Activate to place yourself in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 3 seconds.

IceCold_kelthuzad.name: Ice Cold
IceCold_kelthuzad.description: Reduce the cooldown of Glacial Spike by 5 seconds and increase its damage by 300%.

IceFloes_jaina.name: Ice Floes
IceFloes_jaina.description: Increase the width of Cone of Cold by 100% and cause each chilled Hero hit to reduce its cooldown by 3 seconds, up to a maximum of 6 seconds per use.

IceLance_jaina.name: Ice Lance
IceLance_jaina.description: Hitting a Chilled target with Frostbolt reduces its cooldown by 2 seconds and restores 10 Mana.

IcebladeArrows_tyrande.name: Iceblade Arrows
IcebladeArrows_tyrande.description: Increase Attack Speed by 20%. Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes reduce their damage dealt by 8% for 2 seconds. This effect stacks up to 5 times.

IceboundFortitude_arthas.name: Icebound Fortitude
IceboundFortitude_arthas.description: Activate to gain 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25%, and reduce the duration of Stuns, Slows, and Roots against Arthas by 75% for 3 seconds.

IcefuryWand_jaina.name: Icefury Wand
IcefuryWand_jaina.description: Basic Attacks against Chilled Heroes deal 100% more damage and lower the cooldown of Blizzard by 1.5 seconds.

IcyGrasp_kelthuzad.name: Icy Grasp
