IcyGrasp_kelthuzad.description: Increase Frost Nova's Slow by 15%. Each time Kel'thuzad damages enemies Slowed by Frost Nova, its Slow duration is increased by 0.5 seconds.

IcyTalons_arthas.name: Icy Talons
IcyTalons_arthas.description: Gain 3% Attack Speed for 1.5 seconds every time a Hero is damaged by Frozen Tempest, to a maximum of 60%.

IcyVeins_jaina.name: Icy Veins
IcyVeins_jaina.description: Activate to make Jaina's Basic Abilities' cooldowns recharge 200% faster and reduce their Mana cost by 50% for 5 seconds.

Ignite_kaelthas.name: Ignite
Ignite_kaelthas.description: Flamestrikes apply Living Bomb to the enemy Hero closest to its center who is not currently affected by Living Bomb.

IgnoreAllDistractions_hanzo.name: Ignore All Distractions
IgnoreAllDistractions_hanzo.description: Basic Attacks instantly kill Minions and increase Hanzo's Basic Attack range by 2 for 3 seconds.

IgnorePain_sonya.name: Ignore Pain
IgnorePain_sonya.description: Activate to gain 60 Armor for 4 seconds, taking 60% less damage.  Usable while Whirlwinding.

IllusionMaster_samuro.name: Illusion Master
IllusionMaster_samuro.description: Mirror Images can be controlled individually or as a group and their damage is increased by 100%.  Passive: Image Transmission's cooldown is reduced to 10 seconds.

Illusionist_liming.name: Illusionist
Illusionist_liming.description:
If Li-Ming loses more than 20% of her Health at once, its cooldown is instantly refreshed.  This effect has a 4 second cooldown. 
Passive: Increases Teleport range by 50%

Immolation_illidan.name: Immolation
Immolation_illidan.description: After using Sweeping Strike, burn nearby enemies for 22 (+4% per level) damage a second for 4 seconds.

ImmortalCoil_arthas.name: Immortal Coil
ImmortalCoil_arthas.description: Gain the healing effect of Death Coil even when used on enemies. If Death Coil is used on Arthas, it heals for an additional 50% bonus healing.

Impale_cassia.name: Impale
Impale_cassia.description: Enemies below 60% Health take 50% increased damage from Fend.

ImpalingLight_imperius.name: Impaling Light
ImpalingLight_imperius.description: Celestial Charge deals 125% increased damage. Quest: Stun multiple enemy Heroes with a single Celestial Charge. Reward: After Stunning 2 Heroes, permanently reduce the cooldown by 2 seconds. Reward: After Stunning 3 Heroes, permanently reduce the cooldown by an additional 2 seconds.

ImpatienceIsaVirtue_thelostvikings.name: Impatience Is a Virtue
ImpatienceIsaVirtue_thelostvikings.description: Enemies damaged by a Viking's Basic Attack reduce the cooldown of all Viking Abilities by 0.25 seconds.

Impervious_imperius.name: Impervious
Impervious_imperius.description: Activate to become Unstoppable and gain 75 Spell Armor for 2 seconds. Hitting Heroes with the center of Solarion's Fire reduces this cooldown by 5 seconds.

ImposingPresence_etc.name: Imposing Presence
ImposingPresence_etc.description: Activate to slow the Attack Speed by 50% and Movement Speed by 20% of nearby Heroes and Summons for 2.5 seconds.  Passive: Heroes and Summons that attack your Hero have their Attack Speed slowed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

ImprisoningLight_cassia.name: Imprisoning Light
ImprisoningLight_cassia.description: Upon impaling a Hero, Cassia's Valkyrie creates a wave of light that deals 200 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and Roots them for 3 seconds.

InFortheKill_garrosh.name: In For the Kill
InFortheKill_garrosh.description: Increase Bloodthirst's damage against non-Heroes by 70%. Killing enemies with Bloodthirst resets its cooldown and refunds its Mana cost.

IntheRhythm_tychus.name: In the Rhythm
IntheRhythm_tychus.description: Quest: While Minigun is active, Basic Attacks against Heroes permanently increase future Minigun durations by .03 seconds.

IncendiaryElixir_greymane.name: Incendiary Elixir
IncendiaryElixir_greymane.description: Quest: Every time Greymane hits an enemy Hero with the explosion damage from Gilnean Cocktail, increase its explosion damage by 15, up to 225. Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, the cooldown is also reduced by 4 seconds.

IncineratorGauntlets_blaze.name: Incinerator Gauntlets
IncineratorGauntlets_blaze.description: Increase Basic Attack area by 15%, and Basic Attack damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters by 70%. Additionally, Basic Attack splashes Ignite Oil Spills.

IncreasingClarity_auriel.name: Increasing Clarity
IncreasingClarity_auriel.description: Quest: Every time Sacred Sweep hits a Hero in the center, increase the center damage by 2, up to 50. Reward: After hitting 25 Heroes, this center damage bonus is increased to 180.

Indestructible_johanna.name: Indestructible
Indestructible_johanna.description: Upon taking fatal damage, Johanna gains a Shield equal to her maximum Health for 5 seconds. This effect has a 120 second cooldown.

Indomitable_garrosh.name: Indomitable
Indomitable_garrosh.description: Activate to become Unstoppable for 1.5 seconds.

IndomitableResolve_raynor.name: Indomitable Resolve
IndomitableResolve_raynor.description: Give 'Em Some Pepper lowers the cooldown of Hyperion by 5 seconds if the primary target is a Hero. Inspire grants Raynor Unstoppable for 2 seconds.

Indulgence_whitemane.name: Indulgence
Indulgence_whitemane.description: Searing Lash's first strike restores 20 Mana per Hero hit, and its second strike restores 40 Mana per Hero hit.

InevitableEnd_malthael.name: Inevitable End
InevitableEnd_malthael.description: Activate to become Unstoppable for 2 seconds, but remove all active Reaper's Marks.

Infest_zagara.name: Infest
Infest_zagara.description: Nearby Ranged Minions deal an additional 100% damage, plus an additional 1% per 1000 Siege damage Zagara has dealt. Can be toggled on or off.

InfiniteLightning_cassia.name: Infinite Lightning
InfiniteLightning_cassia.description: Ball Lightning can now bounce indefinitely, and its cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds every time an enemy Hero is hit.

InhibitingEnergy_fenix.name: Inhibiting Energy
InhibitingEnergy_fenix.description: While Phase Bomb is active, Basic Attacks against Slowed Heroes Slow all enemies in the area by 30% for 3 seconds. Does not spread from Inhibiting Energy's Slow.

Initiative_valeera.name: Initiative
Initiative_valeera.description: Ambush, Cheap Shot, and Garrote award 1 Combo Points.

InnerLight_cassia.name: Inner Light
InnerLight_cassia.description:
Whenever Cassia is Stunned or Rooted, Blinding Light is cast at her location.  This effect has a 6 second cooldown. 
Passive: Blinding Light's radius is increased by 25%.

InnerRage_garrosh.name: Inner Rage
InnerRage_garrosh.description: Body Check gains an additional charge, and its cooldown recharges 100% faster while Armor Up's bonus is at or above 25.

Insatiable_greymane.name: Insatiable
Insatiable_greymane.description: Inner Beast causes Basic Attacks to restore 10 Mana.

Insatiable_orphea.name: Insatiable
Insatiable_orphea.description: Hitting a Hero with Chomp sets its cooldown to 2 seconds.

InsatiableBlade_thebutcher.name: Insatiable Blade
InsatiableBlade_thebutcher.description: While facing a branded enemy, The Butcher's Movement Speed is increased by 25%.

Insight_kharazim.name: Insight
Insight_kharazim.description: Quest: Every 3rd Basic Attack restores 14 (+4% per level) Mana and grants a stack of Insight and gives 25% increased move speed for 2 seconds. Reward: Upon getting 100 stacks of Insight, every 3rd attack also reduces the cooldown of all of Kharazim's Basic Abilities by 1.75 second.

IntensifyingToxin_lunara.name: Intensifying Toxin
IntensifyingToxin_lunara.description: At 3 stacks, Nature's Toxin deals 40% more damage.

IntensiveWinds_brightwing.name: Intensive Winds
IntensiveWinds_brightwing.description: Permanently reduce Emerald Wind's cooldown to 5 seconds and increase its Mana cost to 200.

Intercession_whitemane.name: Intercession
Intercession_whitemane.description: Activate to make an ally Unstoppable for 1 second and gain 1 stack of Desperation.

Interference_probius.name: Interference
Interference_probius.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Warp Rift detonations have their Spell Power reduced by 35% for 5 seconds.

Intimidation_garrosh.name: Intimidation
Intimidation_garrosh.description: Groundbreaker reduces the Attack Speed of Heroes hit by 40% for 4 seconds.

IntotheFray_garrosh.name: Into the Fray
IntotheFray_garrosh.description: Activate to throw a nearby ally and grant them 25 Armor for 3 seconds. Deals 91 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies upon impact and Slows them by 30% for 2.5 seconds.  While in flight, allied Heroes are Unstoppable.

InvasiveMiasma_orphea.name: Invasive Miasma
InvasiveMiasma_orphea.description: Activate to deal 150 damage to all nearby enemies after 2 seconds. For each Hero hit, heal for 182 and gain 1 Chaos.

InvigoratingSpores_lunara.name: Invigorating Spores
InvigoratingSpores_lunara.description: Crippling Spores grants 30% Attack Speed for 6 seconds. Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes with 3 stacks of Nature's Toxin deal damage equal to 1.5% of their maximum Health.

Invigoration_thebutcher.name: Invigoration
Invigoration_thebutcher.description: If Hamstring hits a Hero, half of the Mana cost is refunded and the cooldown is reduced by 1 second.

InvisibleFriends_brightwing.name: Invisible Friends
InvisibleFriends_brightwing.description: Blink Heal grants Stealth to Brightwing. If Blink Heal is cast on a Hero, they are also granted Stealth. While Stealthed by Invisible Friends, Heroes heal for 20 Health per second and are Unrevealable for the first 0.5 seconds.  Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.

IonicForceField_nova.name: Ionic Force Field
IonicForceField_nova.description: Gain 25 Armor for 3 seconds after losing Stealth.

IronFists_kharazim.name: Iron Fists
IronFists_kharazim.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack deals 110% bonus damage and gives 30% increased Move Speed for 2 seconds.

IronforgedMomentum_muradin.name: Iron-forged Momentum
IronforgedMomentum_muradin.description: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Storm Bolt and Thunderclap by 0.75 seconds.

Irradiate_ltmorales.name: Irradiate
Irradiate_ltmorales.description: Enemies near Healing Beam's target take 22 (+4% per level) damage a second.

IsThataHealthPack_tracer.name: Is That a Health Pack?!
IsThataHealthPack_tracer.description: Increases Regeneration Globe and Healing Fountain healing by 100%.

Isolation_dehaka.name: Isolation
Isolation_dehaka.description: Launch biomass that hits the first enemy Hero dealing 200 (+4% per level) damage, Silencing and Slowing them 30% for 3 seconds. Additionally, their vision radius is greatly reduced for 6 seconds.

ItHungers_stukov.name: It Hungers
ItHungers_stukov.description: Increase the range of Lurking Arm by 20%. If Lurking Arm damages enemy Heroes 12 times, its cooldown is reset and its Mana cost is refunded.

ItsaSabotage_thelostvikings.name: It's a Sabotage!
ItsaSabotage_thelostvikings.description: Erik's Basic Attacks against Structures light them on fire for 5 seconds, causing 250 (+4% per level) damage.

ItsRainingScrap_gazlowe.name: It's Raining Scrap
ItsRainingScrap_gazlowe.description: Activate to create 5 Scrap around Gazlowe over 5 seconds.

Jailors_xul.name: Jailors
Jailors_xul.description: Bone Prison spawns 2 Skeletal Warriors.  These do not count towards Xul's Raise Skeleton maximum. Quest: Spawn 80 Skeletal Warriors. Reward: While fixating on an enemy, Skeletal Warriors gain 50% Movement and Attack Speed.

Judgment_tyrael.name: Judgment
Judgment_tyrael.description: After 0.75 seconds, charge an enemy Hero dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage and stunning them for 1.5 seconds. Nearby enemies are knocked away and take 75 (+4% per level) damage.

JudgmentDay_whitemane.name: Judgment Day
JudgmentDay_whitemane.description: Divine Reckoning deals 30% more damage and pulls enemies to its center the first time it hits them.

Jugof1000Cups_lili.name: Jug of 1,000 Cups
Jugof1000Cups_lili.description: Channel for up to 6 seconds. Every 0.25 seconds, heal the lowest Health nearby allied Hero for 66.5 (+4% per level) Health and increase the cooldown of Jug of 1,000 Cups by 2 seconds, up to 50.

Jugof1000000Cups_lili.name: Jug of 1,000,000 Cups
Jugof1000000Cups_lili.description: Jug of 1,000 Cups heals two allies at a time.

Juggernaut_varian.name: Juggernaut
Juggernaut_varian.description: Charge deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 4% of their maximum Health.

JuggernautPlating_blaze.name: Juggernaut Plating
JuggernautPlating_blaze.description: Activate to gain 50 Spell Armor for 3 seconds. Upon expiration, gain a Shield equal to 125% of the Spell Damage reduced by Juggernaut Plating.

Jump_thelostvikings.name: Jump!
Jump_thelostvikings.description: Makes all Vikings Invulnerable and able to pass over enemies for 1.5 seconds.

Jumper_tracer.name: Jumper
Jumper_tracer.description: Increases Blink's charges by 1, but also increase Blink's cooldown by 2 seconds.

JusticeforAll_tyrael.name: Justice for All
JusticeforAll_tyrael.description: Increase the Shield applied to allies by Righteousness to 75% of the Shield gained by Tyrael.

KalansEdict_xul.name: Kalan's Edict
KalansEdict_xul.description: Skeletal Warrior attacks reduce the cooldown of Xul's Heroic Ability by 1%.

KaldoreiResistance_tyrande.name: Kaldorei Resistance
KaldoreiResistance_tyrande.description: Light of Elune grants the target 10 Spell Armor for 2 seconds. This effect stacks up to 2 times.

KanaisCube_deckard.name: Kanai's Cube
KanaisCube_deckard.description: Horadric Cube reduces Hero damage dealt by 30% for 4 seconds.

Kawarimi_samuro.name: Kawarimi
Kawarimi_samuro.description: Wind Walk creates a Mirror Image at Samuro's location that will continue whatever he was doing.

KeepMoving_gall.name: Keep Moving!
KeepMoving_gall.description: Increases the duration of Shove's movement speed bonus by 1 second. Cho's Basic Attacks against Heroes increases the duration of an active Shove by 1 second.

KegToss_chen.name: Keg Toss
KegToss_chen.description: Quest: Every time Keg Smash hits a Hero, increase its damage by 4, up to 80. Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, increase its range by 125% and gain an additional charge.

KhalasCelerity_tassadar.name: Khala's Celerity
KhalasCelerity_tassadar.description: Plasma Shield also grants 20% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.

KhalasEmbrace_tassadar.name: Khala's Embrace
KhalasEmbrace_tassadar.description: Increase the Life Steal of Plasma Shield to 75%.

KhalasLight_tassadar.name: Khala's Light
KhalasLight_tassadar.description: Upon expiration or breaking, the target of Plasma Shield gains 20 Armor for 3 seconds, causing them to take 20% less damage.

KhaydarinResonance_tassadar.name: Khaydarin Resonance
KhaydarinResonance_tassadar.description: Quest: Regeneration Globes grant an additional 100% Mana. Reward: After collecting 15 Regeneration Globes, Plasma Shield's value is increased by 20%. Reward: After collecting 30 Regeneration Globes, Plasma Shield's value is increased by 40%.

KillCommand_rexxar.name: Kill Command
KillCommand_rexxar.description: Unleash the Boars deals 50% more damage and roots for 1.5 seconds.

KineticFulmination_kerrigan.name: Kinetic Fulmination
KineticFulmination_kerrigan.description: Damaging an enemy increase the damage of Kerrigan's next Impaling Blades within 10 seconds by 10%, up to 100%.

KneelPeasants_leoric.name: Kneel, Peasants!
KneelPeasants_leoric.description: Skeletal Swing deals 100% more damage to Minions and Mercenaries.

KwikReleaseCharge_gazlowe.name: Kwik Release Charge
KwikReleaseCharge_gazlowe.description: Xplodium Charge gains a second charge.

Lacerate_zuljin.name: Lacerate
Lacerate_zuljin.description: Increase the Slow amount of each Twin Cleave axe by 10%.

Lacerate_stitches.name: Lacerate
Lacerate_stitches.description: Slam afflicts enemies with Vile Gas, and Heroes hit by Slam have their Armor reduced by 10 for 4 seconds.

LambtotheSlaughter_thebutcher.name: Lamb to the Slaughter
LambtotheSlaughter_thebutcher.description: Throw a hitching post that attaches to the nearest enemy Hero after a 1 second delay. This deals 171 (+4% per level) damage and causes the enemy to be chained to the post and Silenced for 3 seconds.

LandingMomentum_muradin.name: Landing Momentum
LandingMomentum_muradin.description: Increases Muradin's Movement Speed by 25% for 5 seconds upon landing with Dwarf Toss.

LargeandInCharge_thelostvikings.name: Large and In Charge
LargeandInCharge_thelostvikings.description: When Olaf charges enemies, they are stunned for 1 second.

LashingOut_whitemane.name: Lashing Out
LashingOut_whitemane.description: Searing Lash's second strike deals 25% more damage and reduces Searing Lash's cooldown to 1 second if it hits a Hero.

LastLaugh_alarak.name: Last Laugh
LastLaugh_alarak.description: Activate teleport to the chosen location and remove all Roots, Slows, and damage over time effects. If Alarak fails to hit enemy Heroes 3 times with Basic Abilities within 4 seconds of using Last Laugh, his Health is reduced to 1.

LastRites_malthael.name: Last Rites
LastRites_malthael.description: Apply a death sentence to an enemy Hero that, after 2 seconds, deals damage equal to 50% of their missing Health. Repeatable Quest: Enemies killed between the application of Last Rites and within 1.5 seconds of it dealing damage permanently reduce its cooldown by 5 seconds, to a minimum of 15 seconds.

LavaSurge_ragnaros.name: Lava Surge
LavaSurge_ragnaros.description: Lava Wave gains an additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by 30 seconds.

LavaWave_ragnaros.name: Lava Wave
LavaWave_ragnaros.description: Release a wave of lava from Ragnaros's Core that travels down the targeted lane, dealing 240 (+4% per level) damage per second to non-Structure enemies in its path and instantly killing enemy Minions. Damage increased by 100% versus Heroes.

LawandOrder_tyrael.name: Law and Order
LawandOrder_tyrael.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Smite reduces the cooldown of Righteousness by 1 second. Each allied Hero Shielded by Righteousness increases the damage of the next Smite by 25%.

LawsofHope_johanna.name: Laws of Hope
LawsofHope_johanna.description: Activate to heal 30% of Johanna's max Health over 4 seconds.  Passive: Regenerate 1.5 (+4% per level) Health per second.

LeadRain_tychus.name: Lead Rain
LeadRain_tychus.description: Overkill also slows enemy movement speed by 30%.

LeadenOrb_gall.name: Leaden Orb
LeadenOrb_gall.description: Dread Orb stuns enemy Heroes for 0.5 seconds.

Leap_sonya.name: Leap
Leap_sonya.description: Leap into the air, dealing 135 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies, and stunning them for 1.25 seconds.

LeapingStrike_lunara.name: Leaping Strike
LeapingStrike_lunara.description: Leap over an enemy, slowing them by 80% for 0.35 seconds and dealing 271 (+4% per level) damage.  Stores up to 2 charges.

LeechingRounds_tracer.name: Leeching Rounds
LeechingRounds_tracer.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes heal Tracer for 20% of their damage dealt.

LeechingScarabs_anubarak.name: Leeching Scarabs
LeechingScarabs_anubarak.description: Beetles gain 20% bonus attack damage and they heal Anub'arak for 50% of their damage with each attack if he is nearby.

LegionofBeetles_anubarak.name: Legion of Beetles
LegionofBeetles_anubarak.description: Beetles have 40 Spell Armor. Automatically spawn a Beetle every 8 seconds. Can be toggled on and off.

LegionofNorthrend_arthas.name: Legion of Northrend
LegionofNorthrend_arthas.description: 3 additional Ghouls are created.  Ghouls heal for an additional 50% and last 5 seconds longer.

LettheKillingBegin_zuljin.name: Let the Killing Begin
LettheKillingBegin_zuljin.description: When Zul'jin kills an enemy, his Attack Speed is increased by 5%, up to 40%, for 12 seconds. Basic Attacks refresh the duration.  Hero Takedowns instantly grant 40% Attack Speed.

LetThemWither_lunara.name: Let Them Wither
LetThemWither_lunara.description: Increases Crippling Spores' Slow duration by 1 second and causes it to no longer decay.

LetsGo_lili.name: Let's Go!
LetsGo_lili.description: Activate to heal an allied Hero for 140 (+4% per level) and make them Unstoppable for 1 second. Let's Go's cooldown is affected by Fast Feet.  Cannot be used on Li Li.

LethalDecoy_nova.name: Lethal Decoy
LethalDecoy_nova.description: Holo Decoy deals 30% of Nova's damage.

LethalOnslaught_alarak.name: Lethal Onslaught
LethalOnslaught_alarak.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Discord Strike grants 50% of Sadism's damage bonus to Alarak's Basic Attacks for 4 seconds. Basic Attacks against Heroes refresh this duration.

LeyLineSeal_medivh.name: Ley Line Seal
LeyLineSeal_medivh.description: After 0.5 seconds, unleash a wave of energy that places enemy Heroes in Time Stop for 3 seconds.

LifeDrain_sylvanas.name: Life Drain
LifeDrain_sylvanas.description: Heal for 15% of damage dealt by Sylvanas to enemies with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse. Healing is doubled against Heroes.

LifeFunnel_sonya.name: Life Funnel
LifeFunnel_sonya.description: Increases the healing of Whirlwind to 35%, tripled versus Heroes.

LifeLeech_diablo.name: Life Leech
LifeLeech_diablo.description: Diablo gains 1 Soul and heals for 1.5% of his maximum Health when Basic Attacking an enemy Hero. While at 100 Souls, increase this healing to 3% of his maximum Health.

LifeSupport_ltmorales.name: Life Support
LifeSupport_ltmorales.description: Generate 2 Energy each time Safeguard reduces damage, up to a maximum of 20 Energy per use.

LifeUnbound_alexstrasza.name: Life Unbound
LifeUnbound_alexstrasza.description:
Activate to heal an allied Hero for 14.84% of their maximum Health and deal 200 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.  Healing a Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced ally reduces Life Unbound's cooldown by 30 seconds. 
Cannot be used on Alexstrasza.

LifeBinder_alexstrasza.name: Life-Binder
LifeBinder_alexstrasza.description: Bind Alexstrasa's life force with an allied Hero. Both her and her target are healed for 480 Health over 2 seconds. Afterwards, the Hero with a lower percentage of health is set to the same Health percentage as the other Hero.

Lifebloom_malfurion.name: Lifebloom
Lifebloom_malfurion.description: Regrowth instantly heals its target for 10% of their missing Health.

Lifeblossom_alexstrasza.name: Lifeblossom
Lifeblossom_alexstrasza.description: While Alexstrasza is above 75% Health, Gift of Life creates a Lifeblossom at the target's location. Alexstrasza can collect the Lifeblossom to make her next Gift of Life cost no Health.

LightofKarabor_yrel.name: Light of Karabor
LightofKarabor_yrel.description: Increase Vindication's radius by 15%. Vindication's healing is increased by 20% per enemy Hero hit.

LightSpeed_auriel.name: Light Speed
LightSpeed_auriel.description: Resurrected allies gain 200% increased Movement Speed, decaying over 4 seconds.  While a resurrected ally remains alive, Resurrect's next cooldown recharges 100% faster.

LightningBarrage_alarak.name: Lightning Barrage
LightningBarrage_alarak.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with the center of Lightning Surge allows it to be cast again for free on a different primary target within the next 2 seconds. This free cast cannot benefit from Lightning Barrage.

LightningBreath_diablo.name: Lightning Breath
LightningBreath_diablo.description: After 0.5 seconds, become Unstoppable and Channel for up to 4 seconds, dealing 50 damage every 0.25 seconds to enemies in front of Diablo. Enemies affected are Slowed by 4% for 2 seconds, up to 40%.  Lightning Breath's direction changes with your mouse cursor position.

LightningReaction_mephisto.name: Lightning Reaction
LightningReaction_mephisto.description: Skull Missile explodes on contact with Lightning Nova, dealing 138 damage to nearby enemies.

LightningSerpent_lili.name: Lightning Serpent
LightningSerpent_lili.description: Cloud Serpent attacks bounce to hit 2 additional Heroes for 50% (+4% per level) damage and healing.

LingeringChill_jaina.name: Lingering Chill
LingeringChill_jaina.description: Increase the duration of Chill from 4 seconds to 6 seconds.

LingeringSpines_stukov.name: Lingering Spines
LingeringSpines_stukov.description: Lurking Arm persists for 1.5 seconds after it is canceled.

LionsMaw_varian.name: Lion's Maw
LionsMaw_varian.description: Quest: Every time Lion's Fang hits a Hero, increase its damage by 4, up to 120. Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, the slow is increased to 50% and its duration is increased to 2 seconds.

Lionheart_varian.name: Lionheart
Lionheart_varian.description: Increase Lion's Fang's healing from Heroes by 50%.

LiveandLetLive_alexstrasza.name: Live and Let Live
LiveandLetLive_alexstrasza.description: While Alexstrasza is above 75% Health, Gift of Life's cooldown recharges 100% faster.

LivingtheDream_murky.name: Living the Dream
LivingtheDream_murky.description: Quest: Every 15 seconds Murky is alive, he gains 5% Spell Power, up to 20%. This bonus is reset upon his death.

LivingWeapon_genji.name: Living Weapon
LivingWeapon_genji.description: Each enemy Hero hit by X-Strike reduces its cooldown by 12 seconds.

LockedandLoaded_tracer.name: Locked and Loaded
LockedandLoaded_tracer.description: Reactivate Reload within the last 50% of its cast time to increase Tracer's Basic Attack damage by 40% for that magazine.

LocustBrood_abathur.name: Locust Brood
LocustBrood_abathur.description: Activate to spawn 3 Locusts at a nearby location.

LocustNest_abathur.name: Locust Nest
LocustNest_abathur.description: Activate to create a nest that periodically spawns Locusts. Only one Locust Nest can be active at a time.

LocustSwarm_anubarak.name: Locust Swarm
LocustSwarm_anubarak.description: Deal 62 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Each enemy damaged restores 21 (+4% per level) Health. Lasts 6 seconds.

LongboatRaid_thelostvikings.name: Longboat Raid!
LongboatRaid_thelostvikings.description: Hop into an Unstoppable Longboat that fires at nearby enemies for 112 (+4% per level) damage per second and can fire a mortar that deals 205 (+4% per level) damage in an area.  The boat has increased Health for each Viking inside. If the boat is destroyed by enemies, all Vikings are stunned for 1.5 seconds. Lasts 15 seconds.  Requires all surviving Vikings to be nearby.

Longshot_nova.name: Longshot
Longshot_nova.description: Increases the cast range of Pinning Shot by 30%. Pinning Shot also increases the range of Nova's next Basic Attack by 2.

LordofTerror_diablo.name: Lord of Terror
LordofTerror_diablo.description: Activate to steal 10% of the maximum Health of nearby enemy Heroes and gain 5 Souls per Hero hit.

Lorenado_deckard.name: Lorenado
Lorenado_deckard.description: Vector Targeting Create a swirling lorenado that travels in the targeted direction, continually knocking away enemies that come into contact with it.

LostSoul_sylvanas.name: Lost Soul
LostSoul_sylvanas.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse reduce the cooldown of Shadow Dagger by 1.75 seconds.

LoudSpeakers_etc.name: Loud Speakers
LoudSpeakers_etc.description: Increases Face Melt range and knockback by 50%.

LowBlow_stukov.name: Low Blow
LowBlow_stukov.description: Lurking Arm deals 100% more damage to enemy Heroes below 30% Health.

LunarBlaze_tyrande.name: Lunar Blaze
LunarBlaze_tyrande.description: Increase Lunar Flare's range by 30%. Quest: Hitting a Hero with Lunar Flare increases its damage by 5%, up to 100%.

LunarShower_malfurion.name: Lunar Shower
LunarShower_malfurion.description: If Moonfire hits a Hero, its cooldown its reduces by 1 second and the next Moonfire within 6 seconds deals 20% more damage. This damage bonus stacks up to 60%.

LungingStrike_cassia.name: Lunging Strike
LungingStrike_cassia.description: Increase Fend's range and area by 20%, and its duration by 0.5 seconds.

LurkerStrain_dehaka.name: Lurker Strain
LurkerStrain_dehaka.description: Emerging from Burrow grants Dehaka Stealth for 3 seconds and also knocks nearby enemies back, Slowing them by 30% for 3 seconds.

LurkingTerror_orphea.name: Lurking Terror
LurkingTerror_orphea.description: After Dread erupts and for 2 seconds after, activate to cast Chomp from the eruption area.

Maelstrom_kerrigan.name: Maelstrom
Maelstrom_kerrigan.description: Deals 74 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Lasts for 7 seconds.

MaelstromRounds_sgthammer.name: Maelstrom Rounds
MaelstromRounds_sgthammer.description: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage dealt by 35% for 5 seconds. Hitting Structures with Basic Attacks reduces the cooldown of Maelstrom Rounds by 5 seconds.  Stores up to 3 charges.

MaelstromWeapon_thrall.name: Maelstrom Weapon
MaelstromWeapon_thrall.description: Repeatable Quest: Basic Attacks against Heroes while Windfury's Movement Speed bonus is active increase Attack Damage by 1. Reward: After gaining 20 Attack Damage, increase the Movement Speed bonus of Windfury to 40%. Reward: After gaining 40 Attack Damage, Thrall permanently gains 15% increased Movement Speed.

MageArmor_medivh.name: Mage Armor
MageArmor_medivh.description: The first time an Ally uses a Portal, they gain 25 Armor for 4 seconds, reducing their damage taken by 25%.

MagicSpit_brightwing.name: Magic Spit
MagicSpit_brightwing.description: Increase Basic Attack range by 1.1. Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Soothing Mist by 5 seconds.

MajesticSpan_auriel.name: Majestic Span
MajesticSpan_auriel.description: Increases the radius of Sacred Sweep by 15%.

MakingInky_murky.name: Making Inky
MakingInky_murky.description: Reduces the Cooldown of Slime from 4 seconds to 2 seconds.

Malevolence_diablo.name: Malevolence
Malevolence_diablo.description: Basic Attacks cause Diablo's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds to deal an additional 100 Spell Damage. Stores up to 2 charges.

MaliciousIntent_mephisto.name: Malicious Intent
MaliciousIntent_mephisto.description: Shade of Mephisto grants 15% Spell Power while active and for 2.5 seconds after ending.

ManaAddict_kaelthas.name: Mana Addict
ManaAddict_kaelthas.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Kael'thas's maximum Mana by 15. Reward: After gathering 20 Globes, Kael'thas can activate Arcane Barrier to gain a Shield equal to 100% of his maximum Mana for 4 seconds. 45 second cooldown.

ManaTap_kaelthas.name: Mana Tap
ManaTap_kaelthas.description: Activating Verdant Spheres restores 4% of Kael'thas's maximum Mana.

ManaTide_thrall.name: Mana Tide
ManaTide_thrall.description: Frostwolf Resilience restores 15 Mana and reduces Basic Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.

Manticore_valla.name: Manticore
Manticore_valla.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack against the same Heroic target deals an additional 5% of their maximum Health as damage.

MaraadsInsight_yrel.name: Maraad's Insight
MaraadsInsight_yrel.description: After damaging an enemy Hero with a Basic Ability, Yrel's next Basic Attack heals her for 128.

MarchofSin_azmodan.name: March of Sin
MarchofSin_azmodan.description: Increases Azmodan's Movement Speed while channeling All Shall Burn to 80% of normal speed.

MarchoftheBlackKing_leoric.name: March of the Black King
MarchoftheBlackKing_leoric.description: Leoric becomes Unstoppable and walks forward, swinging his mace 3 times. Enemies hit take 250 (+4% per level) damage, and Heroes hit heal Leoric for 12% of his maximum Health.

MarchoftheMurlocs_murky.name: March of the Murlocs
MarchoftheMurlocs_murky.description: After 0.75 seconds, Murky commands a legion of Murlocs to march in a target direction, each one leaping onto the first enemy Hero or Structure they find. Each Murloc deals 125 (+4% per level) damage and slows its target by 15% for 5 seconds. Murlocs deal 50% damage to Structures.

MarkofMending_tyrande.name: Mark of Mending
MarkofMending_tyrande.description: Tyrande's Basic Attacks heal her for 2% of her maximum Health. Basic Attacks against targets with Hunter's Mark heal the attacker for 2% of their maximum Health.

MarkedforDeath_illidan.name: Marked for Death
MarkedforDeath_illidan.description: Dive deals an extra 180 (+4% per level) damage if used consecutively on a target within 10 seconds.

MartialLaw_cassia.name: Martial Law
MartialLaw_cassia.description: Basic Attacks against Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 3% of the Hero's maximum Health.

Martyrdom_whitemane.name: Martyrdom
Martyrdom_whitemane.description: Each stack of Desperation increases Desperate Plea's healing by 30%.

MassVortex_lili.name: Mass Vortex
MassVortex_lili.description: Increase the number of enemies hit by Blinding Wind from 2 to 3. Blinding Wind deals 75% additional damage if all 3 enemies hit are Heroes.

Massacre_malthael.name: Massacre
Massacre_malthael.description: Wraith Strike now damages and applies Reaper's Mark to enemies around its target.

MassiveShove_stukov.name: Massive Shove
MassiveShove_stukov.description: Extend Stukov's arm. If it hits an enemy Hero, they are rapidly shoved until they collide with terrain, taking 190 (+4% per level) damage. Stukov gains 50 Armor while shoving an enemy.

MasterAssassin_tychus.name: Master Assassin
MasterAssassin_tychus.description: Quest: Hero Takedowns increase Tychus's Attack Speed by 1%, up to 15%. Reward: After getting 15 Takedowns, Tychus's Attack Speed is increased by an additional 10%.

MasteratArms_varian.name: Master at Arms
MasteratArms_varian.description: Colossus Smash affects all enemies near the target, and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.

MasterofDestruction_azmodan.name: Master of Destruction
MasterofDestruction_azmodan.description: All Shall Burn's final damage applies to all enemies in an area around the target and grants 3 Annihilation per Hero hit.

MasterofFlames_kaelthas.name: Master of Flames
MasterofFlames_kaelthas.description: Living Bomb's spread from explosions can now also spread Living Bomb.

MasterWarpBlade_zeratul.name: Master Warp-Blade
MasterWarpBlade_zeratul.description: Every third consecutive Basic Attack against the same target deals 125% bonus damage.

MaximumCharge_zarya.name: Maximum Charge
MaximumCharge_zarya.description: Regen Globes now instantly grant 20 Energy. Quest: Spend 150 seconds at or above 50 Energy. Reward: Gain an additional 20 maximum Energy.

MaximumTempo_lucio.name: Maximum Tempo
MaximumTempo_lucio.description: Quest: Kill 5 enemy Heroes while Crossfade's Speed Boost is active. Reward: Permanently increase the Amp It Up bonus for Crossfade's Speed Boost to 60%.

MeatHook_stitches.name: Meat Hook
MeatHook_stitches.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Hook heals Stitches for 16% of his maximum Health over 4 seconds. For 4 seconds, Stitches Basic Attacks against the Hero hit refreshes the healing duration.

MeatShield_thebutcher.name: Meat Shield
MeatShield_thebutcher.description: When Ruthless Onslaught impacts an enemy Hero, The Butcher gains 50 Spell Armor for 2.5 seconds, reducing Ability Damage taken by 50%.

MechaLord_gazlowe.name: Mecha-Lord
MechaLord_gazlowe.description: Basic Attacks deal an additional 100% damage.  Passive: Gain 25 Armor.

MechanicalKnowhow_sgthammer.name: Mechanical Know-how
MechanicalKnowhow_sgthammer.description: Neosteel Plating grants 5% maximum Health as a Shield for 2 seconds. If this Shield is destroyed, Basic Attack damage is increased by 50% for 5 seconds.

MedivacDropship_ltmorales.name: Medivac Dropship
MedivacDropship_ltmorales.description: Target a location for a Medivac transport. For up to 10 seconds before takeoff, allies can right-click to enter the Medivac.

MedivhCheats_medivh.name: Medivh Cheats!
MedivhCheats_medivh.description: Increase the duration of the Time Stop by 33% and gain the ability to redirect the wave once while it's active.

MedusaBlades_zagara.name: Medusa Blades
MedusaBlades_zagara.description: Basic Attacks deal 33% damage to three nearby targets.

MEKAfall_dva.name: MEKAfall
MEKAfall_dva.description: Call Mech is instant and can target a location. Upon landing, the Mech deals 202 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the impact area.

Meltdown_blaze.name: Meltdown
Meltdown_blaze.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Pyromania reduces their damage dealt by 7% for 2.5 seconds, up to 35%.

MeltingTouch_imperius.name: Melting Touch
MeltingTouch_imperius.description: Consuming a Molten Armor mark reduces the target's Armor by 25% for 4 seconds.

MementoMori_malthael.name: Memento Mori
MementoMori_malthael.description: Reaper's Mark deals 80% increased damage after afflicting an enemy for more than 4 seconds.

MendingStrikes_zeratul.name: Mending Strikes
MendingStrikes_zeratul.description: Basic Attacks heal for 35% of the damage dealt.

MentalAcuity_tassadar.name: Mental Acuity
MentalAcuity_tassadar.description: Quest: Each Takedown earned lowers the cooldown of Oracle by 3 seconds, to a maximum of 15 seconds. Reward: Upon getting 5 Takedowns, the sight range of Oracle is increased by 50%.

MercenaryLord_thelostvikings.name: Mercenary Lord
MercenaryLord_thelostvikings.description: Friendly non-Boss Mercenaries near your Hero deal 50% more damage. Gain 50 Armor against Minions and Mercenaries, reducing the damage taken by 50%.

MercenaryQueen_sylvanas.name: Mercenary Queen
MercenaryQueen_sylvanas.description: Friendly non-Elite Mercenaries near Sylvanas deal 60% more damage. Sylvanas Stuns and deals 30% additional damage to Mercenaries with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse.

MercilessStrikes_samuro.name: Merciless Strikes
MercilessStrikes_samuro.description: Samuro's Basic Attacks against Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed enemies are always Critical Strikes.

Metamorphosis_illidan.name: Metamorphosis
Metamorphosis_illidan.description: Transform into Demon Form at the target location, dealing 46 (+4% per level) damage in the area. Temporarily increases maximum Health by 220 (+4% per level) for each Hero hit by the initial impact. Lasts for 18 seconds.

MeteorBomb_ragnaros.name: Meteor Bomb
MeteorBomb_ragnaros.description: Living Meteor explodes at the end of its path, dealing 220 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies.

MicCheck_etc.name: Mic Check
MicCheck_etc.description: Hitting at least 2 targets with Face Melt reduces its cooldown by 6 seconds.

MightofSargeras_malganis.name: Might of Sargeras
MightofSargeras_malganis.description: Necrotic Embrace's Armor is increased to 50, but the duration is reduced to 2 seconds.

MightoftheBansheeQueen_sylvanas.name: Might of the Banshee Queen
MightoftheBansheeQueen_sylvanas.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Withering Fire increases Sylvanas' Attack Speed and Spell Power by 5% for 6 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.

MightoftheNerazim_zeratul.name: Might of the Nerazim
MightoftheNerazim_zeratul.description: Activate to cast an untalented version of Zeratul's most recently used Basic Ability, dealing 50% less damage.  Passive: After using an Ability, Zeratul's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 30% more damage.

MightoftheScourge_kelthuzad.name: Might of the Scourge
MightoftheScourge_kelthuzad.description: Hitting a Hero with Shadow Fissure resets it cooldown.

MightyGust_falstad.name: Mighty Gust
MightyGust_falstad.description: Push enemies away, and slow their Movement Speed by 40% decaying over 4 seconds.

Mimic_mephisto.name: Mimic
Mimic_mephisto.description: While both Shade of Mephisto and Lightning Nova are active, Lightning Nova also casts from the Shade's location.

MindControl_sylvanas.name: Mind Control
MindControl_sylvanas.description: After 0.25 seconds, fire a missile that Mind Controls the first enemy Hero hit. Heroes hit are Silenced, Slowed by 30%, and forced to walk towards Sylvanas for 1.75 seconds.

MindDevourer_orphea.name: Mind Devourer
MindDevourer_orphea.description: Quest: Hitting Heroes with Dread increases its damage by 5, up to 200. Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes, hitting an enemy Hero with Dread's eruption sets its cooldown to 6 seconds and refunds 50 Mana.

MindNumbingAgent_ana.name: Mind-Numbing Agent
MindNumbingAgent_ana.description: Every Dose a Hero has reduces their Spell Power by 10%.

MineField_sgthammer.name: Mine Field
MineField_sgthammer.description: Increase the number of mines by 2.

MiniatureBlackHole_gazlowe.name: Miniature Black Hole
MiniatureBlackHole_gazlowe.description: Increases Grav-O-Bomb radius by 25% and damage by 50%.

Mirage_samuro.name: Mirage
Mirage_samuro.description: Mirror Image grants Samuro and his Images 40 Spell Armor against the next 2 sources of Spell damage, reducing their damage by 40%.

Mirrorball_liming.name: Mirrorball
Mirrorball_liming.description: Magic Missiles fires an additional 2 missiles, but its Mana cost is increased by 5.

MirroredSteel_samuro.name: Mirrored Steel
MirroredSteel_samuro.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Mirror Image by 1 second.

Mistweaver_lili.name: Mistweaver
Mistweaver_lili.description: Activate to heal nearby allied Heroes for 149 (+4% per level). Basic Attacks and Cloud Serpent attacks reduce the cooldown of Mistweaver by 1 second.

MithrilMace_leoric.name: Mithril Mace
MithrilMace_leoric.description: Increase Leoric's Attack Speed by 20%. Repeatable Quest: Nearby enemy Minion deaths grant 0.3% permanent Attack Speed, and Takedowns grant 3% permanent Attack Speed, up to 30%.

MobileOffense_fenix.name: Mobile Offense
MobileOffense_fenix.description: After moving unmounted, Fenix's next Basic Attack deals 35% more damage to Heroes.

MobiusLoop_chromie.name: Mobius Loop
MobiusLoop_chromie.description: If Dragon's Breath's hits a Hero, reduce its cooldown by 3 seconds and restores 100 Mana.

MockingStrikes_alarak.name: Mocking Strikes
MockingStrikes_alarak.description: Basic Attacks against Stunned, Silenced, Slowed, or Rooted Heroes reduce the cooldown of Alarak's Basic Abilities by 3 seconds.

MoltenBlock_cho.name: Molten Block
MoltenBlock_cho.description: Activate to enter Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 3 seconds, damaging nearby enemies for 92 (+4% per level) damage per second.

MoltenPower_ragnaros.name: Molten Power
MoltenPower_ragnaros.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Living Meteor increases the damage of the next Living Meteor by 20%, up to a maximum of 100%.

MonsterHunter_valla.name: Monster Hunter
MonsterHunter_valla.description: Reduces the Mana cost of Hungering Arrow by 40 and increases the damage it deals to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters by 150%.

MonsterWithin_orphea.name: Monster Within
MonsterWithin_orphea.description: Eternal Feast grants 1 Chaos each time it hits a Hero. While Eternal Feast is active, Orphea's Attack Speed is increased by 50%.

Moonburn_malfurion.name: Moonburn
Moonburn_malfurion.description: Increase Moonfire's damage to Minions by 75%. Repeatable Quest: Every 5 Minions killed nearby increase this bonus by 1%, up to 25%. After reaching a 25% bonus, Moonburn's bonus damage also applies to Mercenaries and Monsters.

MoonlitArrows_tyrande.name: Moonlit Arrows
MoonlitArrows_tyrande.description: Basic Attacks decrease the cooldown of Light of Elune by an additional 0.25 seconds.

MoonlitHarmony_malfurion.name: Moonlit Harmony
MoonlitHarmony_malfurion.description: Increase Moonfire's heal by 15% per ally affected by Regrowth.

Morenados_deckard.name: Morenados!
Morenados_deckard.description: Lorenado's cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds every time an enemy Hero is knocked back. This effect can only occur once per 0.5 seconds.

MortalCombo_garrosh.name: Mortal Combo
MortalCombo_garrosh.description: If Wrecking Ball is used on a Hero within 3 seconds of pulling them with Groundbreaker, Wrecking Ball's cooldown is reduced by 9 seconds.

MortalStrike_varian.name: Mortal Strike
MortalStrike_varian.description: Heroes hit by Heroic Strike receive 40% reduced healing for 4 seconds.

MortalWound_xul.name: Mortal Wound
MortalWound_xul.description: Enemies hit by Spectral Scythe receive 75% less healing for 4 seconds.

Mortality_malthael.name: Mortality
Mortality_malthael.description: When damaging a Hero, Wraith Strike deals bonus damage equal to 6% of the Hero's maximum Health.

MoshPit_etc.name: Mosh Pit
MoshPit_etc.description: After 0.75 seconds, channel to stun nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

MountedArchery_hanzo.name: Mounted Archery
MountedArchery_hanzo.description: Upon mounting, gain 20% additional Movement Speed for 5 seconds. Using Natural Agility instantly mounts.

MountingPotency_kerrigan.name: Mounting Potency
MountingPotency_kerrigan.description: Ravage grants 5% Spell Power for 5 seconds, up to 40%.

MountingSand_chromie.name: Mounting Sand
MountingSand_chromie.description: Increase the damage of Echo's Sand Blast by 50%. Hitting 3 or more consecutive Sand Blasts without missing counts as hitting 3 Heroes.

Mutalisk_zagara.name: Mutalisk
Mutalisk_zagara.description: Hunter Killer now spawns a Mutalisk. Mutalisks have a bounce attack and last for 30 seconds.

Mutilate_valeera.name: Mutilate
Mutilate_valeera.description: Sinister Strike now hits with both blades, dealing 125% additional damage, but its range is reduced by 1.

MysticAssault_medivh.name: Mystic Assault
MysticAssault_medivh.description: If Arcane Rift hits an enemy Hero, Medivh's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% more damage and Heals for 40% of the damage dealt.

MysticalSpear_sonya.name: Mystical Spear
MysticalSpear_sonya.description: Ancient Spear always pulls Sonya to the target location even if it doesn't hit an enemy. When used this way, Ancient Spear's cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.

NaishasMemento_maiev.name: Naisha's Memento
NaishasMemento_maiev.description: Activate to make primary Basic Attacks bounce between nearby enemies up to 2 times. Lasts 8 seconds.  Recharge Naisha's Memento by hitting at least 2 Heroes with a single Fan of Knives.

NanoBoost_ana.name: Nano Boost
NanoBoost_ana.description: Instantly boost an allied Hero, restoring 200 Mana. For the next 8 seconds, they gain 30% Spell Power and their Basic Ability cooldowns recharge 150% faster.  Cannot be used on Ana.

NanoInfusion_ana.name: Nano Infusion
NanoInfusion_ana.description: Allies affected by Nano Boost heal for 50% of Spell Damage dealt.

NanomachineCoating_blaze.name: Nanomachine Coating
NanomachineCoating_blaze.description: Enemies standing in Oil Spills and Ignited Oil Spills have their Attack Speed reduced by 50% for 2.5 seconds.

NanoweaveSuit_dva.name: Nanoweave Suit
NanoweaveSuit_dva.description: For 4 seconds after ejecting from her Mech, D.Va gains 50 Armor and her Basic Attacks grant 50% more cooldown reduction towards Call Mech.

NapalmStrike_sgthammer.name: Napalm Strike
NapalmStrike_sgthammer.description: Deals 164 (+4% per level) damage on impact, and leaves a napalm area that deals 50 (+4% per level) damage per second. Lasts for 4 seconds.

NaturalPerspective_lunara.name: Natural Perspective
NaturalPerspective_lunara.description: Nature's Toxin reveals enemies for its duration.

NaturesBalance_malfurion.name: Nature's Balance
NaturesBalance_malfurion.description: Increase Moonfire's area by 25% and Regrowth's duration by 3 seconds.

NaturesCulling_lunara.name: Nature's Culling
NaturesCulling_lunara.description: Increases Nature's Toxin's damage by 125% to non-Heroes.

NaturesCure_malfurion.name: Nature's Cure
NaturesCure_malfurion.description: Activate to remove all Stuns, Roots, and Slows from allies affected by Regrowth.

NaturesSwiftness_malfurion.name: Nature's Swiftness
NaturesSwiftness_malfurion.description: Malfurion gains 6% Movement Speed per ally Hero affected by Regrowth.

Needlespine_abathur.name: Needlespine
Needlespine_abathur.description: Increases the damage and range of Symbiote's Stab by 20%.

NegativelyCharged_alarak.name: Negatively Charged
NegativelyCharged_alarak.description: Increase the Lightning Surge damage bonus to enemies between Alarak and his victim to 150%. Repeatable Quest: Each Hero hit by the center of Lightning Surge permanently increases the damage bonus by 5%.

NeosteelCoating_tychus.name: Neosteel Coating
NeosteelCoating_tychus.description: Activate to gain 75 Spell Armor for 3 seconds, reducing Ability Damage taken by 75%.

NerubianArmor_anubarak.name: Nerubian Armor
NerubianArmor_anubarak.description: Increase Harden Carapace's Spell Armor by 20.

NervesofSteel_sonya.name: Nerves of Steel
NervesofSteel_sonya.description: Activate to gain 25% of your maximum Health as a Shield for 3 seconds. Usable while Whirlwinding.

NetherWind_kaelthas.name: Nether Wind
NetherWind_kaelthas.description: Increases Gravity Lapse's range by 30%. When Gravity Lapse hits an enemy Hero, refund 80 Mana.

NetworkedCarapace_abathur.name: Networked Carapace
NetworkedCarapace_abathur.description: Using Symbiote's Carapace also applies an untalented Carapace Shield to all nearby allied Heroes, Minions, and Mercenaries.

NeuralStimpack_blaze.name: Neural Stimpack
NeuralStimpack_blaze.description: Activate to gain 30 Mana and cause Basic Ability cooldowns to recharge 100% faster for 5 seconds.

NeverOutmatched_hanzo.name: Never Outmatched
NeverOutmatched_hanzo.description: Reduce Scatter Arrow's Mana cost from 40 to 20. Basic Attacks against Heroes lower the cooldown of Scatter Arrow by 3 seconds.

NeverEndingMurlocs_murky.name: Never-Ending Murlocs
NeverEndingMurlocs_murky.description: March of the Murlocs can be channeled, sending little Murlocs indefinitely.

NewHabits_blaze.name: New Habits
NewHabits_blaze.description: Collecting Regeneration Globes reduces the cooldown of Pyromania by 8 seconds. Quest: Collect 15 Regeneration Globes. Reward: Pyromania grants Unstoppable for 2 seconds.

NexusBlades_illidan.name: Nexus Blades
NexusBlades_illidan.description: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and Slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

NexusFrenzy_falstad.name: Nexus Frenzy
NexusFrenzy_falstad.description: Increases Attack Speed by 20% and Attack Range by 1.1.

NightmareFuel_malganis.name: Nightmare Fuel
NightmareFuel_malganis.description: Basic Attacks deal 30% more damage while in a bush and for 4 seconds after leaving. They also deal 125% more damage to Sleeping targets.

NimbleDefender_illidan.name: Nimble Defender
NimbleDefender_illidan.description: If Sweeping Strikes hits an enemy Hero, gain 25 Armor for 2 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

NimbleWisp_lunara.name: Nimble Wisp
NimbleWisp_lunara.description: Increases Wisp Movement Speed by 100% and vision radius by 50%.

NinjaAssassin_hanzo.name: Ninja Assassin
NinjaAssassin_hanzo.description: Hitting Heroes with Storm Bow lowers Natural Agility's cooldown by 10 seconds. Additionally, Hero Takedowns reset Natural Agility's cooldown.

NoEscape_sonya.name: No Escape
NoEscape_sonya.description: Increases the Movement Speed bonus from using Basic and Heroic Abilities to 20%.

NoMercy_zuljin.name: No Mercy!
NoMercy_zuljin.description: Zul'jin's Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes marked with Grievous Throw ignore Armor.

NoOneCanStopDeath_malthael.name: No One Can Stop Death
NoOneCanStopDeath_malthael.description: Activate while dead to immediately respawn at the Altar but increase Malthael's next respawn time by 25%.

NonstopRemix_lucio.name: Nonstop Remix
NonstopRemix_lucio.description: While Reverse Amp is affecting at least 2 enemy Heroes, its duration lasts indefinitely.

NordicAttackSquad_thelostvikings.name: Nordic Attack Squad
NordicAttackSquad_thelostvikings.description: Activate to have all Viking Basic Attacks deal bonus damage equal to 1.25% of a Hero's maximum Health for 5 seconds.

NorseForce_thelostvikings.name: Norse Force!
NorseForce_thelostvikings.description: All Vikings gain a 130 (+4% per level) to 260 (+4% per level) point Shield, increasing in strength for each Viking alive. Lasts 4 seconds.

NorthernExposure_jaina.name: Northern Exposure
NorthernExposure_jaina.description: Enemies damaged by Cone of Cold have their Armor lowered by 20 for 2 seconds, increasing their damage taken by 20%.

NowheretoHide_illidan.name: Nowhere to Hide
NowheretoHide_illidan.description: The Hunt gains unlimited range. Illidan passively reveals enemy Heroes below 25% Health anywhere on the Battleground.

NuclearOption_dva.name: Nuclear Option
NuclearOption_dva.description: Increase Self Destruct's detonation timer by 3 seconds. Detonation damage increased by 70%.  A new Mech can still be called after 4 seconds.

NullGate_probius.name: Null Gate
NullGate_probius.description: Vector Targeting Project a barrier of negative energy in the target direction that lasts 4 seconds. Enemies who touch the barrier take 68 (+4% per level) damage per second and are slowed by 80% for as long as they remain in contact with it.

Nullification_tassadar.name: Nullification
Nullification_tassadar.description: Activate to reduce the damage the target enemy Hero deals by 75% for 4 seconds.

NumbingBlast_jaina.name: Numbing Blast
NumbingBlast_jaina.description: Cone of Cold Roots Chilled targets for 1 second.

NydusNetwork_zagara.name: Nydus Network
NydusNetwork_zagara.description:
Summon a Nydus Worm on Creep anywhere that Zagara has vision. Zagara can enter a Nydus Worm and travel to any other Nydus Worm by right-clicking near it. While inside a Nydus Worm, Zagara regenerates 10% Health and Mana per second.  Stores up to 2 charges. Maximum of 4 Nydus Worms at a time. 
Passive: Creep spreads 15% farther.
Passive: While on Creep, each Basic Attack reduces all of Zagara's cooldowns by .4 seconds.

OctoGrab_murky.name: Octo-Grab
OctoGrab_murky.description: Murky summons an octopus to stun target enemy Hero for 3 seconds while he hits them for 1 damage a second.

OfftheWall_lucio.name: Off the Wall
OfftheWall_lucio.description: If Soundwave is cast while having Wall Ride's speed bonus, the cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds.

OffensiveCadence_fenix.name: Offensive Cadence
OffensiveCadence_fenix.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack against Heroes while Repeater Cannon is active deals an additional 6% of the target's maximum Health as damage.

OgreRampage_gall.name: Ogre Rampage
OgreRampage_gall.description: Gall's Basic Abilities cooldown 75% faster for 5 seconds after Cho activates Ogre Hide.

OlaftheStout_thelostvikings.name: Olaf the Stout
OlaftheStout_thelostvikings.description: Every 5 seconds, Olaf gains 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

Omegastorm_kerrigan.name: Omegastorm
Omegastorm_kerrigan.description: Maelstrom's duration is increased by 0.25 seconds every time it damages a Hero.

OminousWraith_leoric.name: Ominous Wraith
OminousWraith_leoric.description: Increase Wraith Walk's duration by 100%. Enemy Heroes that come in contact with the wraith deal 50% less damage for 4 seconds.

OnaPaleHorse_malthael.name: On a Pale Horse
OnaPaleHorse_malthael.description: Gain an additional 20% Movement Speed while mounted.

OnRubyWings_alexstrasza.name: On Ruby Wings
OnRubyWings_alexstrasza.description: Healing or damaging Heroes 8 or more times with Cleansing Flame activates Dragonqueen for 15 seconds upon landing.

OntheProwl_greymane.name: On the Prowl
OntheProwl_greymane.description: Inner Beast increases Movement Speed by 30% once it has been active for 3 seconds.

OneGoodSpread_stukov.name: One Good Spread...
OneGoodSpread_stukov.description: After a Healing Pathogen infests 3 targets, restore 10 Mana and reduce the cooldown of Healing Pathogen by 2 seconds.

OneintheChamber_nova.name: One in the Chamber
OneintheChamber_nova.description: After using an Ability, Nova's next Basic Attack within 3 seconds deals 60% additional damage.

OneWithTheWind_samuro.name: One With The Wind
OneWithTheWind_samuro.description: While Samuro has Wind Walk and for 3 seconds after breaking it, both he and his Mirror Images gain 30 Armor, taking 30% reduced damage from all sources.

OneWhoCollects_dehaka.name: One-Who-Collects
OneWhoCollects_dehaka.description: Increases Essence collected from Minions by 50%.

Oppressor_garrosh.name: Oppressor
Oppressor_garrosh.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the target's Spell Power by 40% for 2.5 seconds.

OrbitalBFG_sgthammer.name: Orbital BFG
OrbitalBFG_sgthammer.description: Blunt Force Gun's missile orbits the planet every 5 seconds. Only the last missile fired orbits.

OrbitalBombardment_artanis.name: Orbital Bombardment
OrbitalBombardment_artanis.description: Suppression Pulse gains an additional charge.  There is a 10 second cooldown between uses.

OsseinRenewal_leoric.name: Ossein Renewal
OsseinRenewal_leoric.description: Activate to heal Leoric for 30% of his maximum Health over 5 seconds. Regeneration Globes lower the cooldown of this Ability by 20 seconds.

Overdose_ana.name: Overdose
Overdose_ana.description: Hitting enemies with Sleep Dart applies 3 Doses.

OverflowingLight_tyrande.name: Overflowing Light
OverflowingLight_tyrande.description: While Tyrande is above 60% Health, Light of Elune's healing is increased by 30%.

Overpower_varian.name: Overpower
Overpower_varian.description: When Parry blocks a Hero's Basic Attack, Heroic Strike's cooldown is refreshed and the next one does 30% more damage.

OverpoweringNightmare_diablo.name: Overpowering Nightmare
OverpoweringNightmare_diablo.description: Gain 2 additional charges of Overpower, with a 2 second cooldown between uses.

Overprotective_alexstrasza.name: Overprotective
Overprotective_alexstrasza.description: Heroes healed by Abundance gain a Shield for 3 seconds equal to 60% of the amount healed.

OverwhelmingAffliction_sylvanas.name: Overwhelming Affliction
OverwhelmingAffliction_sylvanas.description: Enemy Heroes with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse are Slowed by 15%. Sylvanas' Basic Attacks against Slowed enemy Heroes deal 1% of their maximum Health as damage.

Pacify_alexstrasza.name: Pacify
Pacify_alexstrasza.description: Activate to Slow and reduce an enemy Hero's damage by 50% for 3 seconds.  Healing a Stunned, Silenced, or Rooted ally reduces Pacify's cooldown by 30 seconds.

PainDontHurt_thelostvikings.name: Pain Don't Hurt
PainDontHurt_thelostvikings.description: Baleog's Basic Attacks and splash damage heal for 20% of the damage dealt. Healing is doubled against Heroes.

PainisTemporary_zarya.name: Pain is Temporary
PainisTemporary_zarya.description: Activate to consume all Energy and gain a shield that absorbs 0.5% of Zarya's maximum Health per Energy consumed and lasts for 3 seconds. Zarya may only have one personal shield active on herself at a time.

PainfulSpikes_kerrigan.name: Painful Spikes
PainfulSpikes_kerrigan.description: Enemies hit by Impaling Blades take an additional 70 damage the next 6 times Kerrigan damages them within 5 seconds.

PaintThemRed_raynor.name: Paint Them Red
PaintThemRed_raynor.description: Increase the damage of Penetrating Round by 50% and heal for 90% of the damage it deals to Heroes.

Pandemic_nazeebo.name: Pandemic
Pandemic_nazeebo.description: Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes with Plague of Toads, it spawns 2 additional toads.

ParalyzingEnzymes_dehaka.name: Paralyzing Enzymes
ParalyzingEnzymes_dehaka.description: Drag slows enemies by 50% for 2 seconds after it ends.

ParalyzingRage_leoric.name: Paralyzing Rage
ParalyzingRage_leoric.description: Increase the Slow of Skeletal Swing by 20%.

ParticleAccelerator_probius.name: Particle Accelerator
ParticleAccelerator_probius.description: Disruption Pulse deals 10% more damage for each enemy or Warp Rift hit, up to 50%.

PartingGift_tracer.name: Parting Gift
PartingGift_tracer.description: Recall leaves behind 3 bombs that deal 240 (+4% per level) damage each to different targets.

PartyMix_lucio.name: Party Mix
PartyMix_lucio.description: Quest: Play LÃºcio's Crossfade tracks to nearby Allies for a total of 8 minutes. Multiple Allies provide additional time. Reward: Permanently increase Crossfade's range by 20%.

PatchworkCreation_stitches.name: Patchwork Creation
PatchworkCreation_stitches.description: Increase regeneration effects and all healing received by 15%. Whenever a nearby enemy Minion dies, restore 30 Health. Takedowns restore 240 Health.

PatheticMortals_imperius.name: Pathetic Mortals
PatheticMortals_imperius.description: Stunning enemy Heroes with Celestial Charge reduces their damage by 35% for 4 seconds.

Pathfinder_genji.name: Pathfinder
Pathfinder_genji.description: Jumping over terrain with Cyber Agility increases Genji's Movement Speed by 25% for 6 seconds.

PeacefulRepose_kharazim.name: Peaceful Repose
PeacefulRepose_kharazim.description: Divine Palm's cooldown is set to 5 seconds if the Hero does not die.

Peekaboo_brightwing.name: Peekaboo!
Peekaboo_brightwing.description: Phase Shifting to an ally grants both Brightwing and her target a 335 point Shield and reveals a large area around them for 5 seconds.

Penetrate_cassia.name: Penetrate
Penetrate_cassia.description: Enemies take 3% increased damage from Fend each consecutive hit.

PerfectAgility_hanzo.name: Perfect Agility
PerfectAgility_hanzo.description: Natural Agility gains a 2nd charge and its cooldown by reduced by 10 seconds.

PerfectAim_greymane.name: Perfect Aim
PerfectAim_greymane.description: Increases Gilnean Cocktail's range by 30% and refunds 45 Mana if it hits an enemy Hero.

PerfectDefense_genji.name: Perfect Defense
PerfectDefense_genji.description: Deflected damage reduces the cooldown of Deflect by 2 seconds, up to a maximum of 10 seconds.

PerfectGems_deckard.name: Perfect Gems
PerfectGems_deckard.description: Reduce the cooldown of all Gems by 25 seconds and the cooldown of Horadric Cube by 5 seconds.

PerfectShot_nova.name: Perfect Shot
PerfectShot_nova.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Snipe reduces the cooldown by 4 seconds and refunds its mana cost.

PerfectStorm_muradin.name: Perfect Storm
PerfectStorm_muradin.description: Quest: Every time Storm Bolt hits a Hero, increase its damage by 5.

PewPewPew_dva.name: Pew! Pew! Pew!
PewPewPew_dva.description: Instead of a single shot, Big Shot fires 3 shots over 0.5 seconds. Each shot deals 50% damage.

PhantomPain_samuro.name: Phantom Pain
PhantomPain_samuro.description: Samuro's Critical Strikes deal an additional 45% of his Basic Attack damage for each Mirror Image that is active.

PhaseBulwark_artanis.name: Phase Bulwark
PhaseBulwark_artanis.description: Shield Overload grants 50 Spell Armor while active and for 2 seconds after it expires.

PhaseDisruption_tassadar.name: Phase Disruption
PhaseDisruption_tassadar.description: Enemy Heroes being hit by Psionic Storm have their Physical Armor reduced by 25, causing them to take 25% more damage from Basic Attacks.

PhaseOut_brightwing.name: Phase Out
PhaseOut_brightwing.description: Activate to place Brightwing in Stasis for 0.75 seconds.

Phoenix_kaelthas.name: Phoenix
Phoenix_kaelthas.description: Launch a Phoenix to an area, dealing 78 (+4% per level) damage to enemies along the way. The Phoenix persists for 7 seconds, attacking enemies for 78 (+4% per level) damage and splashing for 50%.

PhotonBarrier_probius.name: Photon Barrier
PhotonBarrier_probius.description: While a Photon Cannon is alive and powered, Probius gains 30 Spell Armor.

PhotonicWeaponry_fenix.name: Photonic Weaponry
PhotonicWeaponry_fenix.description: Fenix deals 15% more damage while he has a Shield from Shield Capacitor.

PhylacteryofKelThuzad_kelthuzad.name: Phylactery of Kel'Thuzad
PhylacteryofKelThuzad_kelthuzad.description: Quest: Collect 12 Regeneration Globes to charge Kel'Thuzad's Phylactery. Reward: Kel'Thuzad's Phylactery can be activated while dead to immediately respawn at the Hall of Storms, but must be charged again.  Passive: Kel'Thuzad heals for 10% of all Spell Damage dealt while the Phylactery is charged.

PhysicalTherapy_ltmorales.name: Physical Therapy
PhysicalTherapy_ltmorales.description: Safeguard removes all Slows from its target and its cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.

PickMeUp_lili.name: Pick Me Up
PickMeUp_lili.description: Healing Brew's healing for Heroes is increased by 33% (+4% per level) if they are under 50% Health.

Pierce_cassia.name: Pierce
Pierce_cassia.description: The primary missile of Lightning Fury now pierces, but splits only when hitting Heroes.

PiercingArrows_hanzo.name: Piercing Arrows
PiercingArrows_hanzo.description: Storm Bow and Scatter Arrow pierce, hitting an additional enemy. Additionally, Scatter Arrow can pierce through 1 enemy each time it ricochets.

PiercingBolt_muradin.name: Piercing Bolt
PiercingBolt_muradin.description: Penetrates through the first target hit, hitting 1 additional target.

PiercingDarts_ana.name: Piercing Darts
PiercingDarts_ana.description: Quest: Hit Heroes with Sleep Dart. Reward: After hitting 10 Heroes, Sleep Dart now hits 2 Heroes and its range is increased by 25%. Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, Healing Dart now hits 2 Heroes and its range is increased by 25%.

PiercingLash_auriel.name: Piercing Lash
PiercingLash_auriel.description: Detainment Strike now pierces and hits all enemy Heroes in a line, reducing the cooldown by 2 seconds for each Hero hit.

PiercingSands_chromie.name: Piercing Sands
PiercingSands_chromie.description: Sand Blast will now hit all Heroes in its path. Additional hits do not grant bonus damage or Quest progress.

PinDown_maiev.name: Pin Down
PinDown_maiev.description: Quest: Hit 3 enemy Heroes with a single Fan of Knives. Reward: Increase Fan of Knives damage by 25%. Reward: Each additional time 3 enemy Heroes are hit by a single Fan of Knives, gain an additional 5% damage, up to 30%. Reward: Hit 4 enemy Heroes with a single Fan of Knives to instantly gain all Rewards.

PinballWizard_etc.name: Pinball Wizard
PinballWizard_etc.description: Face Melt does 300% more damage to enemies recently affected by Powerslide.

PinpointAccuracy_zarya.name: Pinpoint Accuracy
PinpointAccuracy_zarya.description: Particle Grenade deals 40% more damage to enemies hit by the center of the blast.

PitytheFrail_whitemane.name: Pity the Frail
PitytheFrail_whitemane.description: Allies below 50% Health receive 25% more healing from Zeal.

PixieBoost_brightwing.name: Pixie Boost
PixieBoost_brightwing.description: Pixie Dust gives 40% bonus Move Speed, decaying to 20% over 3 seconds.

PixieCharm_brightwing.name: Pixie Charm
PixieCharm_brightwing.description: Activate to consume 20 stacks of Bribe to instantly defeat an uncaptured Mercenary.  Passive: Gain 1 stack of Bribe when a nearby enemy Minion dies, and 5 stacks when hitting an enemy Hero with Arcane Flare's center. Maximum 80 stacks.

PixiePower_brightwing.name: Pixie Power
PixiePower_brightwing.description: Reduce the cooldown of Pixie Dust by 3 seconds and increase the Spell Armor granted by 25.

PlagueBats_malganis.name: Plague Bats
PlagueBats_malganis.description: Necrotic Embrace unleashes a wave of bats in front of Mal'Ganis, dealing 81 damage.

PlanetCracker_fenix.name: Planet Cracker
PlanetCracker_fenix.description: After 0.5 seconds, Channel a powerful beam that spans across the battleground for 4 seconds, dealing 105 damage every 0.25 seconds to non-Structure enemies hit.

PlasmaBurn_artanis.name: Plasma Burn
PlasmaBurn_artanis.description: While Shield Overload is active, deal 70 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.

PlasmaShock_zarya.name: Plasma Shock
PlasmaShock_zarya.description: Particle Grenade slows Movement Speed by 35% for 2 seconds to enemies near the center.

PlateoftheWhale_cassia.name: Plate of the Whale
PlateoftheWhale_cassia.description: Regenerate 5 Health per second while Avoidance is active. Quest: For every 5 Basic Attacks absorbed with Avoidance, it regenerates an additional 1 Health per second. Reward: After absorbing 75 Basic Attacks, increase Cassia's maximum Health by 10%.

PlayAgain_thelostvikings.name: Play Again!
PlayAgain_thelostvikings.description: Summon, fully heal, and revive all Lost Vikings at target location after a Viking channels for 2 seconds.  Only one Viking may attempt to summon at a time.

PlayoftheGame_hanzo.name: Play of the Game
PlayoftheGame_hanzo.description: While in flight or for up to 2 seconds after impacting a target, Dragon's Arrow can be reactivated to teleport to its location and jump backwards. If used after impact, Hanzo shoots arrows that deal 137 damage to each target hit by the impact.  Hanzo is Unstoppable during Play of the Game.

Playtime_stitches.name: Playtime!
Playtime_stitches.description: Heroes hit by Slam reduce the cooldowns of Stitches's other Basic Abilities by 0.5 seconds, increased to 2 seconds for Heroes that are hit by its inner impact area.

PocketofTime_chromie.name: Pocket of Time
PocketofTime_chromie.description: Remove Slowing Sands Mana cost and increase the Slow from 60% to 80%.

PoisonNova_xul.name: Poison Nova
PoisonNova_xul.description: After 0.5 seconds, release poisonous missiles that deal 570 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies hit over 10 seconds.

PoisonedSpear_sonya.name: Poisoned Spear
PoisonedSpear_sonya.description: Ancient Spear deals an additional 100% damage over 6 seconds.

PolyBomb_medivh.name: Poly Bomb
PolyBomb_medivh.description: Polymorph an enemy Hero, suppressing their attacks and Silencing them for 2 seconds. On expiration, Poly Bomb spreads to other nearby enemy Heroes.

PoppinPustules_stukov.name: Poppin' Pustules
PoppinPustules_stukov.description: Detonating a Weighted Pustule with Bio-Kill Switch within 1.5 seconds of its expiration increases its damage by 100% and applies its damage and Slow in an area.

PortalMastery_medivh.name: Portal Mastery
PortalMastery_medivh.description: Medivh can manually place both Portal locations and it no longer breaks Raven Form.  Activate Medivh's Trait to cancel an unlinked Portal.

Possession_sylvanas.name: Possession
Possession_sylvanas.description: Activate to force an enemy Minion to fight for Sylvanas's team. Catapults require 3 charges. Stores up to 3 charges.

PotentBile_stitches.name: Potent Bile
PotentBile_stitches.description: Putrid Bile lasts 6 seconds longer and its slow amount is increased from 35% to 45%.

PotionofRevival_deckard.name: Potion of Revival
PotionofRevival_deckard.description: When a Healing Potion is picked up, it also heals all nearby allied Heroes for 50% of the healing amount.

PotionofShielding_deckard.name: Potion of Shielding
PotionofShielding_deckard.description: Whenever an ally is healed by a Healing Potion, they gain a 122 Shield for 6 seconds.

PowerHungry_liming.name: Power Hungry
PowerHungry_liming.description: Regeneration Globes restore 100% more Mana and grant 10% Spell Power for 20 seconds.

PowerofIcecrown_kelthuzad.name: Power of Icecrown
PowerofIcecrown_kelthuzad.description: Stunning, Rooting, or Slowing a Hero grants 6% Spell Power for 10 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.

PowerOverflowing_probius.name: Power Overflowing
PowerOverflowing_probius.description: Pylon's Power Field grants allied Heroes 10% increased Spell Power and 2 Mana per second.

PowerSurge_cho.name: Power Surge
PowerSurge_cho.description: Each Hero hit by Surging Fist reduces its cooldown by 4 seconds.

PoxPopuli_stukov.name: Pox Populi
PoxPopuli_stukov.description: Bio-Kill Switch no longer removes Healing Pathogen but instead sets its duration to 3 seconds.

PrecisionBarrage_nova.name: Precision Barrage
PrecisionBarrage_nova.description: Precision Strike gains a 2nd charge and its cooldown is reduced by 30 seconds.

PrecisionStrike_nova.name: Precision Strike
PrecisionStrike_nova.description: After a 1.5 second delay, deals 456 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within an area. Unlimited range.

PresenceOfMind_kaelthas.name: Presence Of Mind
PresenceOfMind_kaelthas.description: Increases Pyroblast's explosion radius by 50%. Heroes that are hit by Flamestrike or have Living Bomb spread to them reduce the cooldown of Pyroblast by 10 seconds.

PresstheAdvantage_tychus.name: Press the Advantage
PresstheAdvantage_tychus.description: Run and Gun increases Tychus's Basic Attack range by 1.5 for 3 seconds.

PresstheAttack_samuro.name: Press the Attack
PresstheAttack_samuro.description: While Advancing Strikes is active, Samuro and his Mirror Images gain 10% Attack Speed every time they Basic Attack, up to 40%.

PressurePoint_chen.name: Pressure Point
PressurePoint_chen.description: Flying Kick slows the target enemy by 35% for 1 second, or by 70% if they're soaked in Brew.

PressurizedGlands_abathur.name: Pressurized Glands
PressurizedGlands_abathur.description: Increases the range of Symbiote's Spike Burst by 25% and decreases the cooldown by 1 second.

Pride_azmodan.name: Pride
Pride_azmodan.description: After gaining 400 Annihilation, the area of Globe of Annihilation is increased by 15% and it deals 100 additional damage.

PrimalIntimidation_rexxar.name: Primal Intimidation
PrimalIntimidation_rexxar.description: Activate to slow the Attack Speed by 50% and Movement Speed by 20% of nearby Heroes and Summons near Rexxar and Misha for 2.5 seconds.  Passive: Heroes and Summons that attack Rexxar or Misha have their Attack Speed slowed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

PrimalRage_dehaka.name: Primal Rage
PrimalRage_dehaka.description: Gain 1% increased Attack Damage per Essence stored.

PrimalSwarm_dehaka.name: Primal Swarm
PrimalSwarm_dehaka.description: Dark Swarm causes enemies hit to lose 10 Armor for 0.75 seconds, causing them to take 10% extra damage.

PrismaticLink_tassadar.name: Prismatic Link
PrismaticLink_tassadar.description: Basic Attacks bounce to hit 2 additional targets for 40% damage.

ProMoves_dva.name: Pro Moves
ProMoves_dva.description: D.Va's Mech gains 2% Movement Speed for 1.5 seconds every time it takes damage, up to 30%.

ProbiusLoop_probius.name: Probius Loop
ProbiusLoop_probius.description: Whenever a Rift explosion hits 1 or more enemy Heroes, create a new Warp Rift in the same location.

ProgRock_etc.name: Prog Rock
ProgRock_etc.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe permanently increases the healing per second of Guitar Solo by 5, to a maximum of 100 Reward: After gathering 20 Regeneration Globes, Guitar Solo also heals nearby allied Heroes for 50 (+4% per level) Health every second while it is active.

ProlificDispersal_abathur.name: Prolific Dispersal
ProlificDispersal_abathur.description: Reduces the cooldown of Toxic Nest by 2 seconds and adds 2 additional charges.

ProtectiveCoating_zagara.name: Protective Coating
ProtectiveCoating_zagara.description: While on Creep, Zagara gains 20 Armor, taking 20% less damage.

PsiInfusion_tassadar.name: Psi-Infusion
PsiInfusion_tassadar.description: Quest: Gain 1 Mana for every non-Structure enemy hit by Psionic Storm. Reward: After hitting 500 enemies, increase the size of Psionic Storm by 20%. Reward: After hitting 1000 enemies, increase the damage of Psionic Storm by 20%

PsionicBarrier_kerrigan.name: Psionic Barrier
PsionicBarrier_kerrigan.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Primal Grasp grants 20 Spell Armor for 4 seconds.

PsionicEcho_tassadar.name: Psionic Echo
PsionicEcho_tassadar.description: A second Psionic Storm can be cast within 2 seconds of casting the first. Enemies can only be affected by one Psionic Storm at a time.

PsionicEfficiency_nova.name: Psionic Efficiency
PsionicEfficiency_nova.description: Snipe's range is increased by 15%, and hitting a Hero grants an additional stack of Precision Sniper.

PsionicProjection_tassadar.name: Psionic Projection
PsionicProjection_tassadar.description: Increases the cast range of Plasma Shield and Psionic Storm by 40%.

PsionicPulse_kerrigan.name: Psionic Pulse
PsionicPulse_kerrigan.description: Primal Grasp explodes a second time 2.5 seconds after its first explosion.

PsionicShift_kerrigan.name: Psionic Shift
PsionicShift_kerrigan.description: Activate to teleport to a nearby location, dealing 50 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies. Generates 300% increased Assimilation Shields from the damage dealt.

PsionicStrength_zeratul.name: Psionic Strength
PsionicStrength_zeratul.description: Dealing damage to enemy Heroes increases all damage dealt by 6% for 3 seconds, stacking up to 30%.

PsionicSynergy_artanis.name: Psionic Synergy
PsionicSynergy_artanis.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Phase Prism grants 20 Armor for 3 seconds.

PsychoticBreak_gall.name: Psychotic Break
PsychoticBreak_gall.description: Upon dying, Gall gains Ogre Rage and can use Abilities for 10 seconds.

PuckishScamp_junkrat.name: Puckish Scamp
PuckishScamp_junkrat.description: Reduce Rocket Ride's cooldown by 45 seconds and increase its damage by 15%.

PulseDetonationCore_sgthammer.name: Pulse Detonation Core
PulseDetonationCore_sgthammer.description: Spider Mines detonate 3 times over 3 seconds.

PulseRounds_tracer.name: Pulse Rounds
PulseRounds_tracer.description: Increases Pulse Bomb's range and charge rate from Basic Attacks against Heroes by 100%.

PulseStrike_tracer.name: Pulse Strike
PulseStrike_tracer.description: Increases Melee's Pulse Bomb charge from 10% to 20% against Heroes.

Pulverize_stitches.name: Pulverize
Pulverize_stitches.description: All enemies hit by Slam are Slowed by 75% for 0.75 seconds.

PuncturingArrow_valla.name: Puncturing Arrow
PuncturingArrow_valla.description: Quest: Hitting an enemy Hero with the initial impact of Hungering Arrow increases its damage by 5, up to a maximum of 100. Reward: After gaining 100 bonus damage, gain an additional 75 bonus damage and Hungering Arrow also bounces 1 additional time.

Punishment_valla.name: Punishment
Punishment_valla.description: Each stack of Hatred increases the damage of Multishot by 4%.

PureMalice_alarak.name: Pure Malice
PureMalice_alarak.description: Increase Sadism by 10% any time an allied Hero dies, up to 40%.  Sadism gained from Pure Malice is lost on death.

PurgeEvil_tyrael.name: Purge Evil
PurgeEvil_tyrael.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Smite increases Tyrael's Basic Attack damage by 45% for 4 seconds.

PurgetheWicked_whitemane.name: Purge the Wicked
PurgetheWicked_whitemane.description: Activate to blast an enemy Hero with holy fire, reducing their Armor by 25 and dealing 300 damage over 4 seconds.

PurificationSalvo_fenix.name: Purification Salvo
PurificationSalvo_fenix.description: Channel for 1.5 seconds, sweeping a laser in front of Fenix that locks onto enemy Heroes. Once Channeling finishes, fire 5 missiles at each locked Hero, dealing 79 damage each. Deals 50% increased damage to Slowed targets.

PurifierBeam_artanis.name: Purifier Beam
PurifierBeam_artanis.description: Target an enemy Hero with an orbital beam from the Spear of Adun, dealing 184 (+4% per level) damage per second for 8 seconds. The beam will chase the target as they move.  Unlimited range.

PurifyingBrew_chen.name: Purifying Brew
PurifyingBrew_chen.description: The next Stun or Silence used against Chen has its duration reduced by 75% and resets the cooldown of Fortifying Brew. Can only trigger once every 12 seconds. While Chen has Fortifying Brew Shields, he gains 40 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 40%.

PurifyingDarts_ana.name: Purifying Darts
PurifyingDarts_ana.description: Healing Dart removes Roots and Slows from the target, and heals for 20% more when doing so.

PursuitofFlame_guldan.name: Pursuit of Flame
PursuitofFlame_guldan.description: Quest: Hit 40 enemy Heroes with Fel Flame. Reward: Fel Flame's radius is increased by 10%.

PursuitofJustice_uther.name: Pursuit of Justice
PursuitofJustice_uther.description: Hammer of Justice increases Uther's Movement Speed by 25% for 3 seconds.

PursuitofVengeance_maiev.name: Pursuit of Vengeance
PursuitofVengeance_maiev.description: Each Hero tethered by Umbral Bind reduces the cooldown of Spirit of Vengeance by 2.5 seconds.

PushComesToShove_stukov.name: Push Comes To Shove
