PushComesToShove_stukov.description: Massive Shove slows its target by 50% for 4 seconds upon colliding with terrain. If Massive Shove pushes a target for more than 1.25 seconds, its cooldown is reduced by 15 seconds.

PutSomeEnglishOnIt_junkrat.name: Put Some English On It
PutSomeEnglishOnIt_junkrat.description: Increase Frag Launcher's travel distance by 50%, but does not increase its speed.

PutridBile_stitches.name: Putrid Bile
PutridBile_stitches.description: Emit bile that deals 37 (+4% per level) damage per second to enemies within, slowing them by 35%. Stitches gains 20% Movement Speed while emitting bile. Lasts 8 seconds.

PylonOvercharge_probius.name: Pylon Overcharge
PylonOvercharge_probius.description: Increase the size of Pylon power fields and allow them to attack enemies within it for 96 (+4% per level) damage per second. Lasts 10 seconds.

Pyroblast_kaelthas.name: Pyroblast
Pyroblast_kaelthas.description: After 1.5 seconds, cast a slow-moving fireball that deals 810 (+5% per level) damage to an enemy Hero and 405 (+5% per level) damage to enemies nearby.

Pyromaniac_kaelthas.name: Pyromaniac
Pyromaniac_kaelthas.description: Each time Living Bomb deals periodic damage, Kael'thas's Basic Ability cooldowns are reduced by 0.5 second.

QuantumEntanglement_probius.name: Quantum Entanglement
QuantumEntanglement_probius.description: Enemies continue to be slowed for 3 seconds after their last contact with a Warp Rift.

QuantumOverdrive_chromie.name: Quantum Overdrive
QuantumOverdrive_chromie.description: Activate to increase Spell Power by 25% for 10 seconds.

QuantumSpike_tracer.name: Quantum Spike
QuantumSpike_tracer.description: Pulse Bomb deals an additional 7% of the primary target's maximum Health.

Quarterback_tychus.name: Quarterback
Quarterback_tychus.description: Increases the range of Frag Grenade by 50%.

QueenofBlades_kerrigan.name: Queen of Blades
QueenofBlades_kerrigan.description: Damaging a Hero with Primal Grasp reduces Ravage's cooldown by 6 seconds.

QuickeningBlessing_tyrande.name: Quickening Blessing
QuickeningBlessing_tyrande.description: Gain 5% Movement Speed. Light of Elune increases the target's Movement Speed by 15% for 3 seconds.

Quicksilver_kharazim.name: Quicksilver
Quicksilver_kharazim.description: Radiant Dashing to an ally gives Kharazim and the target 30% bonus Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

QuicksilverBullets_greymane.name: Quicksilver Bullets
QuicksilverBullets_greymane.description: Increases Greymane's Human Basic Attack range by 1.1.

Radiance_whitemane.name: Radiance
Radiance_whitemane.description: Upon reaching 3 stacks of Desperation, all allies with Zeal are healed for 175.

RadiatingFaith_johanna.name: Radiating Faith
RadiatingFaith_johanna.description: Increases Blessed Shield's Stun duration by 33% and maximum enemies hit by 2.

RagnaroknRoll_thelostvikings.name: Ragnarok 'n' Roll!
RagnaroknRoll_thelostvikings.description: The Longboat can attack two targets at once and the range of its Mortar is increased by 100%.

RainofDestruction_guldan.name: Rain of Destruction
RainofDestruction_guldan.description: Channel to summon a rain of meteors in an area over 7 seconds. Each meteor deals 165 (+4% per level) damage in a small area.

RainofVengeance_valla.name: Rain of Vengeance
RainofVengeance_valla.description: Launch a wave of Shadow Beasts that deals 250 (+4% per level) damage and stuns enemies in the target area for 0.5 seconds.  Stores up to 2 charges.

RallyingCry_raynor.name: Rallying Cry
RallyingCry_raynor.description: Increase the duration of Inspire by 1 second. Casting Inspire grants nearby allied Heroes 10% Movement and Attack Speed for its duration.

Rampage_sonya.name: Rampage
Rampage_sonya.description: Increase Basic Attack damage by 25%. Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Ancient Spear by 0.5 seconds.

RampantHellfire_guldan.name: Rampant Hellfire
RampantHellfire_guldan.description: Fel Flame's damage is increased by 10% for 5 seconds when hitting an enemy Hero. This can stack up to 5 times.

Rancor_valla.name: Rancor
Rancor_valla.description: Each stack of Hatred also increases Attack Speed by 2%. While at 10 stacks of Hatred, gain an additional 30% Attack Speed.

Ranger_tyrande.name: Ranger
Ranger_tyrande.description: Activate to make the next Sentinel pierce through all Heroes hit.  Passive: Sentinel's width is increased by 25% and deals up to 250% more damage based on distance traveled.

RangersMark_tyrande.name: Ranger's Mark
RangersMark_tyrande.description: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Hunter's Mark by 1 second. Basic Attacks against marked targets increase the duration of Hunter's Mark by "0.5 second.

RapidChase_illidan.name: Rapid Chase
RapidChase_illidan.description: Dive grants 15% Movement Speed for 2 seconds.

RapidHarvest_xul.name: Rapid Harvest
RapidHarvest_xul.description: Gain 5% Attack Speed for 3 seconds each time Cursed Strikes hits an enemy, up to 75%.

RapidProjection_nova.name: Rapid Projection
RapidProjection_nova.description: Reduces Holo Decoy's cooldown and Mana cost by 50%.

RapidRecharge_fenix.name: Rapid Recharge
RapidRecharge_fenix.description: Whenever Fenix is healed, Shield Capacitor's Shield recharges for 60% of the healing received.

RavenFamiliar_medivh.name: Raven Familiar
RavenFamiliar_medivh.description: A Raven Familiar joins allies each time they use a Portal. The Raven will dive at the ally's next Basic Attack against a Hero within 5 seconds, dealing 114 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing them by 30% for 2.5 seconds.

RavensIntellect_medivh.name: Raven's Intellect
RavensIntellect_medivh.description: Raven Form increases Medivh's Mana and Health Regeneration by 75%.

RavenousHunger_orphea.name: Ravenous Hunger
RavenousHunger_orphea.description: Quest: Minions that die within 1.5 seconds of being hit by Chomp permanently increase its damage by 2 and heal Orphea for 60.  Heroes that die increase its damage by 40 and heal Orphea for 25% of her maximum Health.

RavenousSpirit_nazeebo.name: Ravenous Spirit
RavenousSpirit_nazeebo.description: Channel a Ravenous Spirit that deals 207 (+4% per level) damage per second. Cannot move while channeling. Lasts for 8 seconds.

RaynorsRaider_raynor.name: Raynor's Raider
RaynorsRaider_raynor.description: Summon a Banshee that assists Raynor. The Banshee deals 84 damage per second and regenerates 75 Health per second if it hasn't taken damage in the last 4 seconds. Can reactivate to retarget or move the Banshee.  The Banshee respawns automatically after 45 seconds.

Reabsorption_medivh.name: Reabsorption
Reabsorption_medivh.description: Increase the amount of healing from Force of Will to 70% of the damage it absorbed.

ReactiveBallistospores_stukov.name: Reactive Ballistospores
ReactiveBallistospores_stukov.description: When taking damage below 50% Health, instantly spread a Weighted Pustule to all nearby enemy Heroes and reset the cooldown of Bio-Kill Switch.  This effect has a 10 second cooldown.

ReactiveParry_artanis.name: Reactive Parry
ReactiveParry_artanis.description: Using Twin Blades grants 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing its damage by 75%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

ReaperofSouls_malthael.name: Reaper of Souls
ReaperofSouls_malthael.description: Increase Tormented Souls' duration by 2 seconds. While Tormented Souls is active, Hero Takedowns refresh the duration.

ReapersToll_xul.name: Reaper's Toll
ReapersToll_xul.description: Quest: Hit 20 Heroes with Spectral Scythe. Reward: Reduce the cooldown of Spectral Scythe by 3 seconds.

Rebirth_kaelthas.name: Rebirth
Rebirth_kaelthas.description: Increases Phoenix duration by 100%. While alive, the Phoenix may be ordered to move to a different location.

Reciprocate_tyrael.name: Reciprocate
Reciprocate_tyrael.description: When Righteousness expires, it explodes for 170 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

Recklessness_zuljin.name: Recklessness
Recklessness_zuljin.description: While Zul'jin is below 75% Health, he gains 10% Spell Power. While he is below 50% Health, his Basic Attack damage is increased by 20%

Redemption_hanzo.name: Redemption
Redemption_hanzo.description: Quest: Every 2 Basic Attacks against the same Hero within 10 seconds grants 1 Redemption, stacking up to 12. Dying decreases Redemption by 3, and Redemption can be lost even at maximum stacks. Reward: At 12 Redemption, gain 50% Attack Speed.

Redemption_uther.name: Redemption
Redemption_uther.description: After Eternal Vanguard ends, Uther revives at the spirit's location with 50% of his maximum Health.  This effect has a 180 second cooldown.

ReduceReuseRecycle_gazlowe.name: Reduce, Reuse, Recycle
ReduceReuseRecycle_gazlowe.description: Enemy Minions that die nearby have a 15% chance to drop Scrap.

Reflect_genji.name: Reflect
Reflect_genji.description: Deflect also deals an additional 33% of the damage blocked.

ReflexiveBlock_illidan.name: Reflexive Block
ReflexiveBlock_illidan.description: Using Dive grants 75 Physical Armor against the next 2 Hero Basic Attacks for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 75%.

RegenerationMaster_anubarak.name: Regeneration Master
RegenerationMaster_anubarak.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases your Health Regeneration by 1 per second, up to 30. Reward: After gathering 30 Regeneration Globes, you also gain 500 Health.

RegenerativeBioSteel_sgthammer.name: Regenerative Bio-Steel
RegenerativeBioSteel_sgthammer.description: Basic Attacks while in Siege Mode heal for 10% of the damage dealt.

RegenerativeMicrobes_abathur.name: Regenerative Microbes
RegenerativeMicrobes_abathur.description: Symbiote's Carapace heals the target for 62 (+4% per level) Health per second over 4 seconds.

Reinforce_johanna.name: Reinforce
Reinforce_johanna.description: Using a Basic Ability grants 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing damage taken by 75%.  Stores up to 3 charges.

Reinforcements_ltmorales.name: Reinforcements
Reinforcements_ltmorales.description: Activate to call down a Medivac Dropship at your Altar for your allies. After 10 seconds, or when the Ability is activated again, the Medivac will travel to the original cast location to unload its passengers. Cooldown is shared with Medivac Dropship.  Passive: Reduce the cooldown of Medivac Dropship from 60 to 30 seconds.

RejuvenatingBubble_murky.name: Rejuvenating Bubble
RejuvenatingBubble_murky.description: Safety Bubble restores 40% of Murky's maximum Health.

Rejuvenation_malfurion.name: Rejuvenation
Rejuvenation_malfurion.description: Malfurion regenerates 5 Health per second for every active Regrowth.

RejuvenationPotion_deckard.name: Rejuvenation Potion
RejuvenationPotion_deckard.description: Healing Potions restore 10 Mana and heal for an additional 108 over 4 seconds.

Rejuvenescencia_lucio.name: RejuvenescÃªncia
Rejuvenescencia_lucio.description: While Amp It Up is active, Crossfade's Healing Boost heals for an additional 2.5% of the target's maximum health each second.

RelentlessSoldier_tychus.name: Relentless Soldier
RelentlessSoldier_tychus.description: Being Stunned or Rooted grants 25 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

RelentlessStrikes_valeera.name: Relentless Strikes
RelentlessStrikes_valeera.description: Reduces the Energy cost of Sinister Strike by 15.

Remorseless_sylvanas.name: Remorseless
Remorseless_sylvanas.description: Increase Sylvanas's Basic Attack range by 1. Sylvanas's Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse shoot an untalented shot of Withering Fire. This shot of Withering Fire applies Banshee's Curse.

RemorselessWinter_arthas.name: Remorseless Winter
RemorselessWinter_arthas.description: Damage slows targets Movement and Attack Speeds by 5% for 1.5 seconds. This can stack up to 5 times.

RendingCleave_zeratul.name: Rending Cleave
RendingCleave_zeratul.description: Cleave deals an additional 40% damage over 3 seconds.

RepeatedOffense_auriel.name: Repeated Offense
RepeatedOffense_auriel.description: Enemies hit by Detainment Strike are knocked back 25% farther. Quest: Every time Detainment Strike stuns a Hero, increase the stun damage by 10, up to 60. Reward: After stunning 6 Heroes, increase this damage bonus to 250.

RepeatingArrow_valla.name: Repeating Arrow
RepeatingArrow_valla.description: The cooldown for Hungering Arrow is reset when Vault is used.

Repentance_yrel.name: Repentance
Repentance_yrel.description: Increase Avenging Wrath's Slow by 25% and duration by 0.5 seconds.

Repulsion_liming.name: Repulsion
Repulsion_liming.description: Increases Wave of Force knockback distance by 150% and increases its cast range by 100%.

Repulsor_probius.name: Repulsor
Repulsor_probius.description: Enemies hit by a Warp Rift explosion are knocked away from the center.

ReservoirofHope_auriel.name: Reservoir of Hope
ReservoirofHope_auriel.description: Quest: Each maximum energy Ray of Heaven Auriel casts increases the maximum amount of energy that can be stored by 75.

ResilientFlame_ragnaros.name: Resilient Flame
ResilientFlame_ragnaros.description: When Ragnaros is Stunned, he gains 40 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 40%.  This effect has a 15 second cooldown.

Resistant_sgthammer.name: Resistant
Resistant_sgthammer.description: Being Stunned or Rooted while in Siege Mode grants 50 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 50%.

Resonation_tassadar.name: Resonation
Resonation_tassadar.description: Distortion Beam slows enemies affected by Psionic Storm by 50%.

RespecttheElderly_deckard.name: Respect the Elderly
RespecttheElderly_deckard.description: Stay Awhile and Listen Silences and Blinds enemies for 2 seconds upon waking up from Sleep.

Resurrect_auriel.name: Resurrect
Resurrect_auriel.description: Channel on the spirit of a dead ally for 0.5 seconds. After a 5 second delay, they are brought back to life with 50% of their maximum Health at the location where they died.

Reverberation_muradin.name: Reverberation
Reverberation_muradin.description: Increases the Attack Speed slow from 25% to 50% and the duration from 2.5 seconds to 3.5 seconds.

ReverseAmp_lucio.name: Reverse Amp
ReverseAmp_lucio.description:
Blast LÃºcio's Crossfade track at enemy Heroes for 4 seconds, causing Healing Boost to inflict 104 (+4% per level) damage per second and Speed Boost to slow for 45%.  This ability is unaffected by Crossfade talents. 
Passive: Increase Amp It Up's duration to 4 seconds.

Revitalize_malfurion.name: Revitalize
Revitalize_malfurion.description: Using Innervate also grants Malfurion 50 Mana and causes his Basic Ability cooldowns to refresh 50% faster for 5 seconds.

Rewind_anubarak.name: Rewind
Rewind_anubarak.description: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.

Ricochet_tracer.name: Ricochet
Ricochet_tracer.description: Tracer's Basic Attacks have a 50% chance to hit another nearby enemy, prioritizing Heroes.

RiftShock_probius.name: Rift Shock
RiftShock_probius.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Warp Rift explosion increases Probius's damage against them by 20% for 10 seconds.

RighteousAssault_auriel.name: Righteous Assault
RighteousAssault_auriel.description: Reduces the cooldown of Sacred Sweep by 3 seconds for each enemy Hero hit by its center.

RighteousFlame_whitemane.name: Righteous Flame
RighteousFlame_whitemane.description: Searing Lash deals 75% more damage to enemies who are Stunned, Rooted, Silenced or Slowed.

RighteousMomentum_yrel.name: Righteous Momentum
RighteousMomentum_yrel.description: Yrel is no longer slowed while Channeling Righteous Hammer, and at maximum charge she gains 25% Movement Speed.

RighteousSmash_johanna.name: Righteous Smash
RighteousSmash_johanna.description: Punish restores 10 Mana per enemy hit.

Rime_arthas.name: Rime
Rime_arthas.description: Every 5 seconds, gain 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%. Stores up to 3 charges.

RingofFire_chen.name: Ring of Fire
RingofFire_chen.description: After using Breath of Fire, ignite in a fiery aura, dealing 52 (+4% per level) damage every second to nearby enemies for 3 seconds.

RingofFrost_jaina.name: Ring of Frost
RingofFrost_jaina.description: After a 1.5 second delay, create a Ring of Frost in an area that deals 310 (+4% per level) damage and Roots enemies for 3 seconds. The ring persists for 3 seconds afterward, Chilling any enemies who touch it.

RingofPoison_nazeebo.name: Ring of Poison
RingofPoison_nazeebo.description: Zombie Wall lasts 1 second longer, and the center is filled with poison that deals a total of 319 (+4% per level) damage over 4 seconds. This damage starts small and increases over the duration.

RingoftheLeech_cassia.name: Ring of the Leech
RingoftheLeech_cassia.description: Cassia heals for 25% of the damage she deals to Blinded enemies.

RIPTire_junkrat.name: RIP-Tire
RIPTire_junkrat.description: Create a motorized bomb with 530 (+4% per level) Health that lasts 15 seconds. While active, Junkrat is immobile but gains control of RIP-Tire's movement.  RIP-Tire can be reactivated to detonate immediately, knocking nearby enemies back and dealing 475 (+4% per level), 625 (+4% per level), or 775 (+4% per level) damage to enemies depending on how close they are to the center of the blast (with the highest amount near the center).

RipperAir_junkrat.name: Ripper Air
RipperAir_junkrat.description: Junkrat is knocked back 50% farther by Concussion Mine. Additionally, Concussion Mine's cooldown is reduced by 12 seconds if only Junkrat is hit.

RisingDread_gall.name: Rising Dread
RisingDread_gall.description: Each bounce of Dread Orb increases its radius by 25% and damage by 25%.

RisingStorm_rehgar.name: Rising Storm
RisingStorm_rehgar.description: Every time Lighting Shield damages an enemy Hero, increase that Lightning Shield's damage by 15%. Stacks up to 15 times.

RiteofRakShir_alarak.name: Rite of Rak'Shir
RiteofRakShir_alarak.description:
Activate to mark an enemy Hero for 300 seconds.  Hitting the marked Hero with Discord Strike increases Sadism by 3%. Killing the marked Hero increases Sadism by 5% and lowers the cooldown of Rite of Rak'Shir to 10 seconds. 
Sadism gained from Rite of Rak'Shir is lost on death.

Roar_johanna.name: Roar
Roar_johanna.description: Increase Punish's damage by 25%. This bonus is increased to 150% whenever Punish hits 2 or more Heroes.

RoboGoblin_gazlowe.name: Robo-Goblin
RoboGoblin_gazlowe.description: Activate to gain 40 Armor and 30% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.  Passive: Basic Attacks deal 100% bonus damage.

RockItTurretXL_gazlowe.name: Rock-It! Turret XL
RockItTurretXL_gazlowe.description: Rock-It! Turrets attack up to 2 additional enemies for 60% damage.

RocketRide_junkrat.name: Rocket Ride
RocketRide_junkrat.description: After 1.25 seconds, Junkrat launches into the air. While in the air, he can steer the landing location by moving.  After 3.5 seconds, Junkrat lands, dealing 750 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and activating Total Mayhem. 5 seconds after landing, Junkrat reappears at the Altar and gains 150% additional Movement Speed until dismounted.

Rollback_cho.name: Rollback
Rollback_cho.description: Rune Bomb rolls back to Cho, damaging enemies in its path.

RollingThunder_thrall.name: Rolling Thunder
RollingThunder_thrall.description: For 10 seconds after hitting an enemy with Chain Lightning, Thrall's next Basic Attack against them restores 15 Mana and 2.5% of his maximum Health.  Passive: Increase the number of Chain Lightning bounces by 1.

RoughLanding_garrosh.name: Rough Landing
RoughLanding_garrosh.description: Increase Groundbreaker's Slow amount by 10% and duration by 1 second.

RoyalFocus_leoric.name: Royal Focus
RoyalFocus_leoric.description: Wraith Walk increases the damage of the next Skeletal Swing within 5 seconds by 50%. Each enemy Hero hit by this Skeletal Swing reduces the cooldown of Wraith Walk by 7 seconds.

Ruby_deckard.name: Ruby
Ruby_deckard.description: Activate to make the next Horadric Cube spawn 3 Lesser Healing Potions from each enemy Hero hit, healing allied Heroes for 220 when picked up. Lesser Healing Potions last for 10 seconds.  Only 1 Gem may be active at a time.

RuinousAffliction_guldan.name: Ruinous Affliction
RuinousAffliction_guldan.description: Corruption deals an additional 78 (+4% per level) damage on impact. If the enemy is hit by all three strikes, the third strike deals 233 (+4% per level) damage.

RuneTap_arthas.name: Rune Tap
RuneTap_arthas.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack heals Arthas for 4% of his max Health.

RunedGauntlet_cho.name: Runed Gauntlet
RunedGauntlet_cho.description: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Cho and Gall's Heroic Abilities by 0.75 seconds.

RunicFeedback_cho.name: Runic Feedback
RunicFeedback_cho.description: Gall's Runic Blast reduces Cho's Rune Bomb cooldown by 1 seconds per enemy hit, and 2 seconds for each Hero hit.

RunicPersistence_gall.name: Runic Persistence
RunicPersistence_gall.description: Runic Blast deals an additional 180 (+4% per level) damage over 3 seconds in an area around the detonation point.

RunningWild_greymane.name: Running Wild
RunningWild_greymane.description: Increases Darkflight and Disengage's range by 35%.

Rupture_valeera.name: Rupture
Rupture_valeera.description: Increase Garrote's damage over time by 100%. Valeera's Basic Attacks refresh the duration of Garrote.

Rushdown_dva.name: Rush-down
Rushdown_dva.description: If D.Va neither takes nor deals damage during Boosters, its cooldown is lowered by 7 seconds.

Ruthless_sonya.name: Ruthless
Ruthless_sonya.description: Whirlwind deals an additional 50% damage per second to Heroes below 33% Health. Does not generate additional healing.

RuthlessMomentum_alarak.name: Ruthless Momentum
RuthlessMomentum_alarak.description: Basic Abilities recharge 20% faster while above 75% Health.

RuthlessSpirit_maiev.name: Ruthless Spirit
RuthlessSpirit_maiev.description: Spirit of Vengeance's damage is increased by 3% per Minion, Mercenary, or enemy Summon hit, and 24% per enemy Hero hit.

SacredGround_yrel.name: Sacred Ground
SacredGround_yrel.description: Yrel sanctifies the ground around her, gaining 40 Armor until she leaves the area.

SacrificialSoul_diablo.name: Sacrificial Soul
SacrificialSoul_diablo.description: Stunning a Hero with Shadow Charge grants 5 Souls and 25 Armor for 4 seconds. While at 100 Souls, increase this Armor to 50.

SafeZone_ltmorales.name: Safe Zone
SafeZone_ltmorales.description: After exiting the Medivac, allies are Protected from all damage for 2 seconds.

SafetyDust_brightwing.name: Safety Dust
SafetyDust_brightwing.description: Increase Pixie Dust's duration by 1 second. Brightwing heals allies with an active Pixie Dust for 25% more.

SafetyinNumbers_deckard.name: Safety in Numbers
SafetyinNumbers_deckard.description: If at least 3 allied Heroes are nearby, Fortitude of the Faithful grants an additional 15 Armor and causes Deckard's Basic Abilities to recharge an additional 50% faster.

SafetySprint_lili.name: Safety Sprint
SafetySprint_lili.description: Activate to gain Fast Feet for 3 seconds and increase its Movement Speed bonus to 30% while active.  Passive: Increase the movement speed bonus of Fast Feet by 15%.

Salvation_tyrael.name: Salvation
Salvation_tyrael.description: Increase the Shield amount Tyrael gains from Righteousness by 25% and heal Tyrael for 140 Health if his Shield is destroyed. Does not increase the Shield amount gained by allies.

SamaarasLight_yrel.name: Samaara's Light
SamaarasLight_yrel.description: While above 50% Health, gain 15% Movement Speed.

Sanctification_tyrael.name: Sanctification
Sanctification_tyrael.description: After 0.5 seconds create a field of holy energy that makes allied Heroes Invulnerable. Lasts 3 seconds.

Sapphire_deckard.name: Sapphire
Sapphire_deckard.description: Activate to increase the Slow of the next Horadric Cube by 30%.  Only 1 Gem may be active at a time.

SavageCharge_thebutcher.name: Savage Charge
SavageCharge_thebutcher.description: Ruthless Onslaught deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 10% of their maximum Health.

SavortheFlavor_stitches.name: Savor the Flavor
SavortheFlavor_stitches.description: When Devour hits a Hero, Stitches heals for an additional 8% of his maximum Health and Mana over 4 seconds. Quest: Hitting enemy Heroes with Devour increases Stitches' Health Regeneration by 1.5.

ScarletAegis_whitemane.name: Scarlet Aegis
ScarletAegis_whitemane.description: Bolster the spirits of nearby allied Heroes, healing them for 250 and granting them 40 Armor for 4 seconds.

ScarletCrusade_whitemane.name: Scarlet Crusade
ScarletCrusade_whitemane.description: Scarlet Aegis heals for 50% more and makes affected allies Unstoppable for 1.

ScrapoMaticSmelter_gazlowe.name: Scrap-o-Matic Smelter
ScrapoMaticSmelter_gazlowe.description: Increases the Mana restored from Scrap by 100%.

ScrollofIdentify_deckard.name: Scroll of Identify
ScrollofIdentify_deckard.description: Quest: Hitting an enemy Hero with Scroll of Sealing reveals them for 8 seconds. Reward: After hitting 16 Heroes, Scroll of Sealing also reduces Armor by 15 for 4 seconds and the reveal duration is doubled.

ScrollofStoneCurse_deckard.name: Scroll of Stone Curse
ScrollofStoneCurse_deckard.description: Scroll of Sealing does 200% more damage when hitting at least 2 Heroes.

SealFate_valeera.name: Seal Fate
SealFate_valeera.description: Sinister Strike deals 50% additional damage and generates an additional Combo Point when used against silenced, rooted, or stunned enemy Heroes.

SealofElDruin_tyrael.name: Seal of El'Druin
SealofElDruin_tyrael.description: Using a Basic Ability grants 50% Attack Speed for 3 seconds.

SearedFlesh_cho.name: Seared Flesh
SearedFlesh_cho.description: Each consecutive Basic Attack to an enemy Hero deals 20% more damage, to a maximum of 60% damage. This bonus lasts 5 seconds or until a different enemy is attacked.

SearingLight_auriel.name: Searing Light
SearingLight_auriel.description: Ray of Heaven also deals damage to enemies in the area equal to 30% of the energy consumed.

SearingShadows_gall.name: Searing Shadows
SearingShadows_gall.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Shadowflame take an additional 2% of their maximum Health as damage.

SeasonedMarksman_artanis.name: Seasoned Marksman
SeasonedMarksman_artanis.description: Quest: Every Minion killed near you grants 0.2 Attack Damage, and Takedowns grant 0.5 Attack Damage. Reward: Upon gaining 40 bonus Attack Damage, you can also activate Seasoned Marksman to increase your Attack Speed by 40% for 3 seconds. 60 second cooldown.

SecondHelping_stitches.name: Second Helping
SecondHelping_stitches.description: Devour gains 1 additional charge. Enemy Heroes hit by Devour reduce the cooldown of Stitches's Heroic Ability by 5 seconds.

SecondOpinion_ltmorales.name: Second Opinion
SecondOpinion_ltmorales.description: Hitting 2 or more Heroes with Displacement Grenade reduces its cooldown to 2 seconds.

SecondWind_varian.name: Second Wind
SecondWind_varian.description: Basic Attacks heal Varian for 1% of his maximum Health. While below 50% Health, they also heal him for 50% of the damage dealt.

SecondaryFire_fenix.name: Secondary Fire
SecondaryFire_fenix.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Plasma Cutter fires a Purification Salvo missile at them after 0.5 seconds, dealing 86 damage. Deals 50% increased damage to Slowed targets.

SecretWeapon_falstad.name: Secret Weapon
SecretWeapon_falstad.description: Increases Hammerang's range by 30% and Basic Attacks deal 60% bonus damage while Hammerang is in flight.

Seeker_liming.name: Seeker
Seeker_liming.description: If three Magic Missiles hit the same target, the third one deals an additional 125 (+4% per level) damage.

SeekerintheDark_zeratul.name: Seeker in the Dark
SeekerintheDark_zeratul.description: Singularity Spike takes 50% longer to explode. It can be reactivated to teleport to the target, granting 30% increased Move Speed for 3 seconds.

SeekerSwarm_malganis.name: Seeker Swarm
SeekerSwarm_malganis.description: Upon expiring, Carrion Swarm's bats seek nearby enemy Heroes, dealing 132 damage and Sleeping them for 2.5 seconds.

SeethingHatred_valla.name: Seething Hatred
SeethingHatred_valla.description: Basic Attacks now grant 2 stacks of Hatred and the time it takes before Hatred expires is increased by 2 seconds.

SelfRighteous_whitemane.name: Self-Righteous
SelfRighteous_whitemane.description: Casting Desperate Plea on an ally heals Whitemane for 125. Does not grant Zeal.

SentencedtoDeath_zeratul.name: Sentenced to Death
SentencedtoDeath_zeratul.description: Deal 30% increased damage to enemies while they have a Singularity Spike attached to them.

SentinelWisp_lunara.name: Sentinel Wisp
SentinelWisp_lunara.description: After remaining in a bush for 5 seconds, Wisp's vision radius is increased by 200% and reveals the surrounding area.

SeraphsHymn_cassia.name: Seraph's Hymn
SeraphsHymn_cassia.description: Reduce the cooldown and Mana cost of Blinding Light by 33%. Basic Attacks against Blinded enemies deal 100% more damage.

Seraphim_yrel.name: Seraphim
Seraphim_yrel.description: Activate to become Unstoppable for 2 seconds.

Serenity_malfurion.name: Serenity
Serenity_malfurion.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Moonfire reduces the cooldown of Tranquility by 3 seconds. Increase Tranquility's healing by 10% per ally affected by Regrowth.

SerpentSidekick_lili.name: Serpent Sidekick
SerpentSidekick_lili.description: Cloud Serpent's duration is increased by 0.6 seconds every time it attacks an Hero.

SerratedArrows_hanzo.name: Serrated Arrows
SerratedArrows_hanzo.description: Scatter Arrow deals 100% more damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

SerratedEdge_stitches.name: Serrated Edge
SerratedEdge_stitches.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Hook deals bonus damage equal to 5% of their maximum Health and reduces Hook's cooldown by 3 seconds.

SerratedSpines_zagara.name: Serrated Spines
SerratedSpines_zagara.description: Quest: Each Basic Attack against a Hero increases Zagara's Attack Damage by 0.3.

SevenSidedStrike_kharazim.name: Seven-Sided Strike
SevenSidedStrike_kharazim.description: Become Invulnerable and strike 7 times over 2 seconds. Each strike hits the highest Health nearby Hero for 7% of their maximum Health.

Shackler_xul.name: Shackler
Shackler_xul.description: While Bone Armor is active, nearby enemies are Slowed by 35% for 1 second. Basic Attacks against Heroes that are Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed reduce the cooldown of Bone Armor by 2 seconds.

Shade_xul.name: Shade
Shade_xul.description: While Bone Armor is active, Xul evades all Basic Attacks, but increases the cooldown of Bone Armor by 20 seconds.

ShadeLord_mephisto.name: Shade Lord
ShadeLord_mephisto.description: Activate to swap locations with Shade of Mephisto and refresh its duration.  Passive: Shade of Mephisto benefits from all of Mephisto's level 7 Talents

ShadowArmor_maiev.name: Shadow Armor
ShadowArmor_maiev.description: Blink grants 20 Armor for 3.5 seconds. Maiev's Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes refresh this duration.

ShadowAssault_zeratul.name: Shadow Assault
ShadowAssault_zeratul.description: Basic Attacks cause Zeratul to charge at enemies and have 20% increased Attack Speed. Lasts for 4 seconds.

ShadowBoltVolley_gall.name: Shadow Bolt Volley
ShadowBoltVolley_gall.description: After 1 second, unleash 20 Shadow Bolts over 4 seconds, each dealing 87 (+4% per level) damage to the first target hit. The bolts fire towards your mouse.

ShadowFissure_kelthuzad.name: Shadow Fissure
ShadowFissure_kelthuzad.description: Create a fissure anywhere on the Battleground that explodes after 1.5 seconds, dealing 360 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemy Heroes in its area.

ShadowHunter_zeratul.name: Shadow Hunter
ShadowHunter_zeratul.description: Quest: Gather Regeneration Globes to lower the Mana cost of Blink by 3. Reward: Upon gathering 15 Regeneration Globes, Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Blink by 1 second.

ShadowMending_zeratul.name: Shadow Mending
ShadowMending_zeratul.description: Heal for 60% of Spell Damage dealt to Heroes.

ShadowOrbHuntress_maiev.name: Shadow Orb: Huntress
ShadowOrbHuntress_maiev.description: Activate to increase Movement Speed and Attack Speed by 40% for 5 seconds.  Recharge Shadow Orb by dealing Physical Damage to enemy Heroes 10 times.

ShadowOrbShadowStrike_maiev.name: Shadow Orb: Shadow Strike
ShadowOrbShadowStrike_maiev.description: Activate to deal 75 damage to an enemy Hero, Slowing them by 30% and reducing their Armor by 20 for 4 seconds.  Recharge Shadow Orb by dealing Spell Damage to enemy Heroes 10 times.

ShadowOrbVengeance_maiev.name: Shadow Orb: Vengeance
ShadowOrbVengeance_maiev.description: Activate to reset the cooldown of Spirit of Vengeance.  Recharge Shadow Orb by damaging enemy Heroes with Spirit of Vengeance 5 times.

Shadowfury_gall.name: Shadowfury
Shadowfury_gall.description: Shadow Bolt Volley hits all enemies in its path.

Shadowsnare_gall.name: Shadowsnare
Shadowsnare_gall.description: Shadowflame slows enemy Heroes by 10% for 4 seconds. This effect can stack up to 3 times.

Shadowstalk_tyrande.name: Shadowstalk
Shadowstalk_tyrande.description: Grant all allied Heroes Stealth for 10 seconds and heal them for 380 Health over 10  seconds. Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.

ShakeItOff_lili.name: Shake It Off
ShakeItOff_lili.description: Gain 8 Armor per second while Fast Feet is active, up to 30 Armor.

ShamblingHorror_stitches.name: Shambling Horror
ShamblingHorror_stitches.description: Activate to gain 50 Armor for 4 seconds.  Passive: Stitches cannot have his Movement Speed reduced below 100%.

ShandosClarity_malfurion.name: Shan'do's Clarity
ShandosClarity_malfurion.description: Innervate's cooldown recharges 25% faster per ally affected by Regrowth.

ShardofHate_mephisto.name: Shard of Hate
ShardofHate_mephisto.description: Basic Attacks hit enemies near the primary target.

SharedPunishment_whitemane.name: Shared Punishment
SharedPunishment_whitemane.description: Upon casting, Inquisition can chain to an additional enemy Hero near its target, dealing 35 damage every 0.5 seconds.

SharpenedArrowheads_hanzo.name: Sharpened Arrowheads
SharpenedArrowheads_hanzo.description: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow or Basic Attacks reduces their Armor by 2 for 3 seconds, up to a maximum reduction of 20 Armor.

SharpenedBlades_kerrigan.name: Sharpened Blades
SharpenedBlades_kerrigan.description:
Quest: Minions and Heroes that die within 1.5 seconds of being hit by Ravage increase its damage up to a maximum of 75.  Minions grant 1 increased damage and Heroes grant 5 increased damage. 
Reward: After reaching a 50 damage increase, Ravage gains 50 additional damage.

SharpenedStars_genji.name: Sharpened Stars
SharpenedStars_genji.description: Shuriken now pierce all enemies hit.

Sharpshooter_ana.name: Sharpshooter
Sharpshooter_ana.description: Healing Dart's healing is increased by 5% each time it heals a Hero, up to 50%. This bonus is reset if Healing Dart fails to hit a Hero.

ShatteredArmor_arthas.name: Shattered Armor
ShatteredArmor_arthas.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Howling Blast have their Armor reduced by 15 for 4 seconds.

ShatteredGround_sonya.name: Shattered Ground
ShatteredGround_sonya.description: Increase the length of Seismic Slam's splash by 66% and increase its splash damage to 100% of its base damage.

ShatteringThrow_varian.name: Shattering Throw
ShatteringThrow_varian.description: Activate to throw a sword at a target Hero that deals 50 (+4% per level) damage, and up to 1400 (+4% per level) bonus damage to their Shields.  Passive: Basic Attacks against Heroes deal up to 200% bonus damage to Shields.

ShedExoskeleton_anubarak.name: Shed Exoskeleton
ShedExoskeleton_anubarak.description: Harden Carapace grants 30% increased Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

ShieldBattery_artanis.name: Shield Battery
ShieldBattery_artanis.description: Shield Overload's cooldown recharges 100% faster while its Shield is active, and the Shield duration is increased by 1 second.

ShieldBattery_probius.name: Shield Battery
ShieldBattery_probius.description: Pylon's Power Field grants allied Heroes 29 (+4% per level) Shields per second, up to 116 (+4% per level). Shields persist for 2 seconds after exiting a Pylon Power Field.

ShieldBattery_tassadar.name: Shield Battery
ShieldBattery_tassadar.description: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes an untalented Plasma Shield.

ShieldCapacitor_probius.name: Shield Capacitor
ShieldCapacitor_probius.description: Probius gains permanent Shields equal to 10% of his max Health. Shields regenerate quickly as long as he hasn't taken damage recently.

ShieldofHope_auriel.name: Shield of Hope
ShieldofHope_auriel.description: Activate to grant all nearby allied Heroes a shield for 3 seconds equal to 50% of the amount of Health they are missing.

ShieldSurge_artanis.name: Shield Surge
ShieldSurge_artanis.description: Increases Shield Overload's Shields by 75% while below 25% Health.

ShieldWall_varian.name: Shield Wall
ShieldWall_varian.description: Parry now grants Protected, preventing all incoming damage while active. Additionally, Parry's cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds, but it loses 1 charge.

ShiftingMalice_kelthuzad.name: Shifting Malice
ShiftingMalice_kelthuzad.description: Activate to dash forward, dealing 150 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemies in the path. Takedowns reset the cooldown of Shifting Malice.

ShiftingMeteor_ragnaros.name: Shifting Meteor
ShiftingMeteor_ragnaros.description: Each time an enemy is hit by the same Living Meteor, they take 5% increased damage from it. Quest: Hit 75 Heroes with Living Meteor. Reward: After hitting 75 Heroes with Living Meteor, its duration is increased to 2.25 seconds, and it can be reactivated to change its direction once per use.

ShiftingNether_gall.name: Shifting Nether
ShiftingNether_gall.description: Twisting Nether now teleports Cho to a targeted location before it begins channeling.

ShiftingSands_chromie.name: Shifting Sands
ShiftingSands_chromie.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Sand Blast grants 8% Spell Power for 10 seconds, up to a maximum of 40%. The duration is refreshed whenever an enemy is damaged by Sand Blast.

Shingan_genji.name: Shingan
Shingan_genji.description: Hitting an enemy with all 3 Shuriken deals 115 (+4% per level) bonus damage.

ShootEmUp_probius.name: Shoot 'Em Up
ShootEmUp_probius.description: Hitting a Warp Rift with Disruption Pulse causes 4 additional pulses that deal 50% damage to be fired from the impact location in different directions.  Additional Pulses do not benefit from Echo Pulse or Particle Accelerator.

ShootingStar_tyrande.name: Shooting Star
ShootingStar_tyrande.description: Increase Basic Attack range by 1. Every 8th Basic Attack casts a free Lunar Flare at a random enemy near Tyrande's position. This prefers Heroic targets.

ShotofFury_sonya.name: Shot of Fury
ShotofFury_sonya.description: Activate to gain 50 Fury. Usable while Whirlwinding.  Passive: After casting Seismic Slam, your next Basic Attack deals 40% more damage.

ShowofForce_alarak.name: Show of Force
ShowofForce_alarak.description: Heroes hit with 3 of Alarak's Abilities within 2 seconds take an additional 80 (+4% per level) damage.

ShowStopper_etc.name: Show Stopper
ShowStopper_etc.description: After using Powerslide, gain 35 Armor for 4 seconds, reducing all damage taken by 35%.

ShrapnelMines_sgthammer.name: Shrapnel Mines
ShrapnelMines_sgthammer.description: Upon detonating, Spider Mines reduce the armor of enemy Heroes hit by 10 for 4 seconds.

ShroudofAdun_zeratul.name: Shroud of Adun
ShroudofAdun_zeratul.description: Zeratul gains a shield equal to 15% of his Maximum Health over 5 seconds while under Permanent Cloak.

ShroudoftheDeadKing_leoric.name: Shroud of the Dead King
ShroudoftheDeadKing_leoric.description: Activate to become Protected for 3 seconds, preventing all damage.

ShroudofWisdom_malthael.name: Shroud of Wisdom
ShroudofWisdom_malthael.description: After 2 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor for 4 seconds.

Shukuchi_samuro.name: Shukuchi
Shukuchi_samuro.description: Wind Walk teleports Samuro a short distance in the direction he's currently facing.

ShurikenMastery_genji.name: Shuriken Mastery
ShurikenMastery_genji.description: Quest: Hit enemy Heroes with Shuriken. Reward: After hitting 35 Heroes, Shuriken damage is increased by 25. Reward: After hitting 75 Heroes, Cyber Agility now refunds 2 charges of Shuriken.

SiegeTactics_sgthammer.name: Siege Tactics
SiegeTactics_sgthammer.description: Using Neosteel Plating while in Siege Mode grants Unstoppable for 2 seconds.

Siegebreaker_azmodan.name: Siegebreaker
Siegebreaker_azmodan.description: Azmodan's Demons deal 50% increased damage to Structures.

SilverTouch_uther.name: Silver Touch
SilverTouch_uther.description: Quest: Reduce damage from Heroic sources with Devotion. Reward: After reducing damage 40 times, Holy Light's Mana cost is reduced from 90 to 70. Reward: After reducing damage 80 times, Holy Light's Mana cost is reduced to 50, and its range is increased by 50%.

SimpleGeometry_hanzo.name: Simple Geometry
SimpleGeometry_hanzo.description: Quest: Hit a Hero with multiple arrows from the same Scatter Arrow cast 20 times. Each arrow hit after the second grants additional progress. Reward: Upon hitting terrain for the first time, Scatter Arrow creates 2 additional arrows.

SinsGrasp_azmodan.name: Sin's Grasp
SinsGrasp_azmodan.description: Increases the range of All Shall Burn by 20%. If All Shall Burn Channels for its full duration, its cooldown is reduced by 50%.

SingularityCharge_fenix.name: Singularity Charge
SingularityCharge_fenix.description: Repeater Cannon grants 100% more Attack Speed, and Phase Bomb grants 2.5 more range.

SinsExposed_johanna.name: Sins Exposed
SinsExposed_johanna.description: Shield Glare marks enemies for 4 seconds. The next time any ally damages them, they take 90 (+4% per level) extra damage and the mark is removed.

SiphoningArrow_valla.name: Siphoning Arrow
SiphoningArrow_valla.description: Valla heals for 75% of the damage dealt to Heroes by Hungering Arrow.

SiphoningImpact_kerrigan.name: Siphoning Impact
SiphoningImpact_kerrigan.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Ravage grants 90 points of Assimilation Shields.

SiphoningToxin_lunara.name: Siphoning Toxin
SiphoningToxin_lunara.description: While at least one enemy is afflicted by Nature's Toxin, heal for 9 per second. When an enemy Hero has 3 stacks of Nature's Toxin, increase this healing by 19 per second.

SixthSense_kharazim.name: Sixth Sense
SixthSense_kharazim.description: While Stunned or Rooted, gain 75 Physical Armor against Hero Basic Attacks for 4 seconds, reducing their damage by 75%.

SixthSense_illidan.name: Sixth Sense
SixthSense_illidan.description: Evasion grants Illidan 75 Spell Armor against the next 2 sources of Spell Damage, reducing their damage by 75%.

SizzlinAttacks_tychus.name: Sizzlin' Attacks
SizzlinAttacks_tychus.description: Basic Attacks deal bonus damage to Heroes equal to 1% of their maximum Health. Stacks with Minigun.

SkeletalMages_xul.name: Skeletal Mages
SkeletalMages_xul.description: Vector Targeting Summon 4 Frost Mages in a line that attack nearby enemies for 47 (+4% per level) damage a second and Slow them by 30% for 2 seconds. Last up to 15 seconds.

Skullcracker_muradin.name: Skullcracker
Skullcracker_muradin.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack against the same enemy deals 70% bonus damage and Stuns them for 0.25 seconds.

Slaughterhouse_thebutcher.name: Slaughterhouse
Slaughterhouse_thebutcher.description: Lamb to the Slaughter now chains all enemy Heroes in range.

SleightofHand_tracer.name: Sleight of Hand
SleightofHand_tracer.description: Reduces Reload time by 50%. This equals 20% more damage per second.

SliceandDice_valeera.name: Slice and Dice
SliceandDice_valeera.description: Eviscerating an enemy with 3 Combo Points grants 150% Attack Speed. Lasts 3 seconds or 3 Basic Attacks.  Passive: Basic Attacks restore 2 Energy.

SlimeTime_murky.name: Slime Time
SlimeTime_murky.description: Quest: Slime enemy Heroes that are already Slimed. Reward: After Sliming 15 Heroes, increase Slime's bonus damage by 125. Reward: After Sliming 30 Heroes, increase Slime's slow amount to 30%.

Slip_lucio.name: Slip
Slip_lucio.description: Passing through or near an enemy Hero during Wall Ride's effect increases its Movement Speed bonus to 70% for 1 second.

SlipperyWhenWet_murky.name: Slippery When Wet
SlipperyWhenWet_murky.description: Gain 50% Movement Speed and move through units while in Safety Bubble.

Slipstream_tracer.name: Slipstream
Slipstream_tracer.description: Increases the amount of time Recalled by 1 second.

SlowBurn_ragnaros.name: Slow Burn
SlowBurn_ragnaros.description: Blast Wave slows enemies hit by 40% for 2 seconds.

SlowingSands_chromie.name: Slowing Sands
SlowingSands_chromie.description: Place a sand vortex that greatly Slows enemies inside it. The longer it is active the more it Slows, up to 60% after 3 seconds.

SmellingSalts_ana.name: Smelling Salts
SmellingSalts_ana.description: Healing Dart removes Stuns from the target, and grants them 50 Armor for 2 seconds when doing so.

SmitetheWicked_tyrael.name: Smite the Wicked
SmitetheWicked_tyrael.description: While El'druin's Might is active, and for 2 seconds after teleporting, Smite's cooldown recharges 125% faster.

SmokeBomb_valeera.name: Smoke Bomb
SmokeBomb_valeera.description: Create a cloud of smoke. While in the smoke, Valeera is Unrevealable, can pass through other units, and gains 30 Armor, reducing damage taken by 30%. Valeera can continue to attack and use abilities without being revealed. Lasts 5 seconds.  Using this Ability does not break Stealth.

Snowstorm_jaina.name: Snowstorm
Snowstorm_jaina.description: Increase the radius of Blizzard by 30%.

SolariteReaper_artanis.name: Solarite Reaper
SolariteReaper_artanis.description: Increases the damage of the first dash of Blade Dash by 150%.

SomaTransference_abathur.name: Soma Transference
SomaTransference_abathur.description: Symbiote's Spike Burst heals the host for 64 (+4% per level) Health per enemy Hero hit.

SomnolentDoses_ana.name: Somnolent Doses
SomnolentDoses_ana.description: Upon stacking 5 Doses, Heroes are put to Sleep for 2 seconds.

SonicAmplifier_lucio.name: Sonic Amplifier
SonicAmplifier_lucio.description: If at least 2 Allied Heroes are nearby when Amp It Up is cast, Crossfade's radius is increased by 50% for the duration.

SoulCollector_malthael.name: Soul Collector
SoulCollector_malthael.description: Reduce Soul Rip's cooldown by 0.5 seconds and increase its range by 25%.

SoulHarvest_nazeebo.name: Soul Harvest
SoulHarvest_nazeebo.description: Activate to increase Nazeebo's Health and Spell Power by 7% for each nearby enemy, up to a maximum of 35%. Lasts 15 seconds.

SoulShield_diablo.name: Soul Shield
SoulShield_diablo.description: Activate to gain 25 plus 50% of Diablo's current Souls as Spell Armor for 4 seconds. Every time Diablo damages an enemy Hero, reduce this cooldown by 1 second.

SoulSiphon_malthael.name: Soul Siphon
SoulSiphon_malthael.description: Increase Soul Rip's bonus healing from Heroes to 4.75% of the Hero's maximum Health.

SoulstotheFlame_diablo.name: Souls to the Flame
SoulstotheFlame_diablo.description: Fire Stomp grants 1 Soul every 3 times it damages an enemy Hero, and heals for an additional 1.3% of its damage dealt per Soul.

SoundBarrier_lucio.name: Sound Barrier
SoundBarrier_lucio.description: After 1 second, LÃºcio and nearby Allied Heroes gain a 1296 (+4% per level) point shield that rapidly decays over 6 seconds.

SovereignArmor_imperius.name: Sovereign Armor
SovereignArmor_imperius.description: Molten Armor grants 50 Armor for 2.5 seconds.

SpatialEcho_tracer.name: Spatial Echo
SpatialEcho_tracer.description: Hero Takedowns grant 2 charges of Blink.

SpatialEfficiency_abathur.name: Spatial Efficiency
SpatialEfficiency_abathur.description: Symbiote's Stab gains 1 additional charge and its Cooldown is reduced by .5 seconds.

SpectralLeech_leoric.name: Spectral Leech
SpectralLeech_leoric.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 2.5% of the Hero's maximum Health and heal Leoric for twice that amount.

SpeedBarrier_zarya.name: Speed Barrier
SpeedBarrier_zarya.description: Shield Ally increases the allied Hero's Movement Speed by 50% for the duration.

SpeedMetal_etc.name: Speed Metal
SpeedMetal_etc.description: Using a Basic or Heroic ability also gives nearby allied Heroes 15% Movement Speed for 2 seconds.

SpeedSerum_ana.name: Speed Serum
SpeedSerum_ana.description: Healing Dart grants 25% Movement Speed to affected Heroes for 1.5 seconds.

SpellBarrier_zarya.name: Spell Barrier
SpellBarrier_zarya.description: Upon expiration or breaking, Personal Barrier grants Zarya 75 Spell Armor for 3 Seconds, reducing the damage taken from Abilities by 75%.

SpellShield_kharazim.name: Spell Shield
SpellShield_kharazim.description: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%.  Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

SpiderColony_nazeebo.name: Spider Colony
SpiderColony_nazeebo.description: Every time a Spider attacks an enemy Hero, reduce the cooldown of Wall of Zombies and Plague of Toads by .25 seconds.

SpinToWin_thelostvikings.name: Spin To Win!
SpinToWin_thelostvikings.description: Activate to have each Viking deal 101 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

SpineLauncher_stukov.name: Spine Launcher
SpineLauncher_stukov.description: Basic Attacks become ranged and Slow enemies by 20% for 1.5 seconds, but deal 40% less damage.

SpiritAlly_kharazim.name: Spirit Ally
SpiritAlly_kharazim.description: Place a Spirit Ally that heals allies in a large area around it for 2% of their maximum Health every second. Has 150 (+4% per level) Health and lasts 10 seconds. Kharazim can Radiant Dash to Spirit Allies.

SpiritBond_rexxar.name: Spirit Bond
SpiritBond_rexxar.description: Increases the duration of Bestial Wrath by 50% and Misha's Basic Attacks heal Rexxar for 50% of her damage dealt during Bestial Wrath.

SpiritofArachyr_nazeebo.name: Spirit of Arachyr
SpiritofArachyr_nazeebo.description: If Corpse Spiders hits only one enemy, it creates 2 additional spiders.

SpiritShield_thrall.name: Spirit Shield
SpiritShield_thrall.description: Every 45 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 1.5 seconds. Frostwolf Resilience reduces this cooldown by 10 seconds.  Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

SpiritwalkersGrace_rehgar.name: Spiritwalker's Grace
SpiritwalkersGrace_rehgar.description: Reduces Chain Heal's Mana cost from 55 to 40.

Spite_mephisto.name: Spite
Spite_mephisto.description: Increase Regeneration Globe healing duration by 100%. Every tick of Regeneration Globe healing activates Lord of Hatred, reducing Basic Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds

SplinteredSpear_lunara.name: Splintered Spear
SplinteredSpear_lunara.description: Using Noxious Blossom causes Lunara's next Basic Attack to hit up to 4 enemies. These extra attacks can apply Nature's Toxin.

SpreadVolley_junkrat.name: Spread Volley
SpreadVolley_junkrat.description: Activate to make Frag Launcher fire 2 additional grenades in a spread. Works for up to 4 total charges, or until Frag Launcher runs out of charges.

SpreadingPlague_malganis.name: Spreading Plague
SpreadingPlague_malganis.description: After Night Rush expires, deal 30 damage per second to nearby enemies for 4 seconds. Basic Attacks against Heroes refresh this.  Does not wake Sleeping targets.

SpyGames_thelostvikings.name: Spy Games
SpyGames_thelostvikings.description: After standing still for 3 seconds, Erik gains Stealth and his Sight Radius is increased by 75%. The Stealth persists for 3 seconds after moving.

StablePortal_medivh.name: Stable Portal
StablePortal_medivh.description: Decrease Portal cooldown by 25% and increase Portal duration by 50%.

StageDive_etc.name: Stage Dive
StageDive_etc.description: Leap to target location, landing after 2.75 seconds, dealing 330 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the area, and slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds.

StalwartAngel_tyrael.name: Stalwart Angel
StalwartAngel_tyrael.description: Gain 25 Armor while El'druin's Might is active, and for 2 seconds after teleporting.

StarWoodSpear_lunara.name: Star Wood Spear
StarWoodSpear_lunara.description: Using Crippling Spores increases Lunara's Basic Attack range by 2.75 for 6 seconds.

Starfall_tyrande.name: Starfall
Starfall_tyrande.description: Deal 91 (+4% per level) damage per second and slow enemies by 20% in an area. Lasts 6 seconds.

StaticBarrier_mephisto.name: Static Barrier
StaticBarrier_mephisto.description: At the end of its duration, Lightning Nova grants Mephisto a Shield equal to 40% of the damage it dealt to Heroes. Lasts 5 seconds.

StaticField_mephisto.name: Static Field
StaticField_mephisto.description: When Lightning Nova's damage bonus reaches 40%, enemy Heroes within its radius take damage equal to 10% of their maximum Health.

StaticShield_falstad.name: Static Shield
StaticShield_falstad.description: Gain a Shield equal to 4% of Falstad's maximum Health after every Lightning Rod strike. Lasts 4 seconds and stacks.

StayAwhileandListen_deckard.name: Stay Awhile and Listen
StayAwhileandListen_deckard.description: After 1 second, Channel for 3 seconds, putting enemy Heroes in front of Deckard to Sleep while Channeling, and for 2 seconds after.  Enemies can only be put to Sleep once per cast, and Sleep's effects end instantly if they take damage.

SteadyBlade_genji.name: Steady Blade
SteadyBlade_genji.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Swift Strike increases the damage of the next Swift Strike by 20%. This bonus stacks up to 3 times.

StickyBomb_tracer.name: Sticky Bomb
StickyBomb_tracer.description: Increases Pulse Bomb's radius by 50% and enemies hit are slowed by 70% for 3 seconds.

StickyFlare_brightwing.name: Sticky Flare
StickyFlare_brightwing.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Arcane Flare have their Movement Speed Slowed by 20% for 3 seconds. Increase the Slow to 40% if they are hit by the center portion.

StickyWicket_junkrat.name: Sticky Wicket
StickyWicket_junkrat.description: Steel Trap no longer Roots enemies, and instead Slows them by 90% for 3.5 seconds.

StimDrone_ltmorales.name: Stim Drone
StimDrone_ltmorales.description: Grant an allied Hero 75% Attack Speed and 25% Movement Speed for 10 seconds.

Stoneform_muradin.name: Stoneform
Stoneform_muradin.description: Activate to heal Muradin for 30% of his maximum Health over 10 seconds. Second Wind is disabled during this time.

StopandPop_dva.name: Stop and Pop
StopandPop_dva.description: Bunny Hop deals 200% more damage if D.Va isn't moving at the moment of impact.

StormFront_jaina.name: Storm Front
StormFront_jaina.description: Increase cast range of Blizzard by 100%.

StormofVengeance_valla.name: Storm of Vengeance
StormofVengeance_valla.description: Basic Attacks reduce the charge cooldown of Rain of Vengeance by 5 seconds.

StormShield_etc.name: Storm Shield
StormShield_etc.description: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.

StormEarthFire_chen.name: Storm, Earth, Fire
StormEarthFire_chen.description:
After 1 second, Chen splits into three elemental spirits for 12 seconds, each with 75% of Chen's maximum Health and a unique ability. If all three spirits are killed, Chen will die as well.  Storm can grant the spirits Movement Speed. Earth can leap to an area and slow enemies.
Fire can grant the spirits Attack Speed.

Stormcaller_rehgar.name: Stormcaller
Stormcaller_rehgar.description: When Lightning Shield damages an enemy it restores 4 Mana, up to 100.

StormstoutSecretRecipe_chen.name: Stormstout Secret Recipe
StormstoutSecretRecipe_chen.description: Heal for 1.5% of Chen's maximum Health every time his Basic Abilities hit an enemy Hero.

Strafe_valla.name: Strafe
Strafe_valla.description: Rapidly attack enemies within 10 range for 60 (+4% per level) damage per hit, prioritizing Heroes over Minions. Valla is able to move and use Vault while strafing. Lasts for 4 seconds.

Strangle_valeera.name: Strangle
Strangle_valeera.description: Using Garrote on a Hero reduces their Spell Power by 40% for 6 seconds.

StranglingVines_malfurion.name: Strangling Vines
StranglingVines_malfurion.description: Enemy Heroes Rooted by Entangling Roots receive 40% less healing from all sources for 3 seconds.

StridingGiant_sonya.name: Striding Giant
StridingGiant_sonya.description: Wrath of the Berserker increases maximum Health by 10% and grants Striding Giant, which can be activated to become Unstoppable for 2 seconds. 30 second cooldown.

StrikeAtTheHeart_genji.name: Strike At The Heart
StrikeAtTheHeart_genji.description: Enemies hit by the end of Swift Strike take an additional 138 (+4% per level) damage over 2 seconds.

StripShields_kelthuzad.name: Strip Shields
StripShields_kelthuzad.description: Pulling a Hero with Chains of Kel'Thuzad grants Kel'Thuzad a permanent 128 (+4% per level) Shield, stacking up to 2 times.  Additionally, Chains of Kel'Thuzad deals up to 270 (+2.5% per level) bonus damage to Shields.

StuckinaLoop_chromie.name: Stuck in a Loop
StuckinaLoop_chromie.description: Temporal Loop teleports the target a second time after the first.

Subdue_johanna.name: Subdue
Subdue_johanna.description: Hitting 2 or more Heroes at the same time with Punish increases the Slow to 80% and the Slow amount does not decay. Quest: Hit 4 or more Heroes at the same time with Punish. Reward: Punish always Slows by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">80% and the Slow amount no longer decays.

Subjugation_whitemane.name: Subjugation
Subjugation_whitemane.description: Inquisition reduces all damage the target deals by 75%.

Submerge_ragnaros.name: Submerge
Submerge_ragnaros.description: Ragnaros submerges below, entering Stasis and healing for 600 (+4% per level) Health over 3 seconds.

SubterraneanShield_anubarak.name: Subterranean Shield
SubterraneanShield_anubarak.description: Burrow Charge also grants a 345 (+4% per level) point Shield for 5 seconds.

Subtlety_valeera.name: Subtlety
Subtlety_valeera.description: After teleporting with Ambush, Cheap Shot, or Garrote, regenerate 8 Energy per second for 5 seconds.

Subwoofer_lucio.name: Subwoofer
Subwoofer_lucio.description: Enemies within the first half of Soundwave's range are knocked back 50% farther.

SuddenVengeance_maiev.name: Sudden Vengeance
SuddenVengeance_maiev.description: Using Blink within 0.35 seconds of Spirit of Vengeance hitting an enemy Hero causes the shadow to explode, damaging all nearby enemy Heroes for 5% of their maximum Health.

SulfurasHungers_ragnaros.name: Sulfuras Hungers
SulfurasHungers_ragnaros.description: Quest: Every time Empower Sulfuras kills a Minion, its damage is increased by 1, up to 30. Reward: After killing 30 Minions, increase its damage by an additional 90.

SulfurasSmash_ragnaros.name: Sulfuras Smash
SulfurasSmash_ragnaros.description: Hurl Sulfuras at the target area, landing after 0.75 seconds, dealing 198 (+4% per level) damage. Enemies in the center take 594 (+4% per level) damage instead and are Stunned for 0.5 seconds.

SummonSindragosa_arthas.name: Summon Sindragosa
SummonSindragosa_arthas.description: Deals 230 (+4% per level) damage and slows enemies by 60% for 3.5 seconds.  Also disables non-Heroic enemies and Structures for 20 seconds.

SummonUltralisk_kerrigan.name: Summon Ultralisk
SummonUltralisk_kerrigan.description: After 0.5 seconds, summon an Ultralisk rushes forward upon spawning, dealing 250 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy Hero hit and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.  The Ultralisk's Basic Attacks deal 50% of their damage in an area around their target. Reactivate to retarget the Ultralisk.

SummonWaterElemental_jaina.name: Summon Water Elemental
SummonWaterElemental_jaina.description: Summon a Water Elemental at target location. The Water Elemental's Basic Attacks deal 62 (+4% per level) damage, splash for 25% damage and Chill. The Ability can be reactivated to retarget the Water Elemental. Lasts 20 seconds.

SunKingsFury_kaelthas.name: Sun King's Fury
SunKingsFury_kaelthas.description: Living Bombs that spread to enemy Heroes deal 35% more damage.

Sundering_thrall.name: Sundering
Sundering_thrall.description: After 0.5 seconds, sunder the earth in a long line, dealing 290 (+4% per level) damage and shoving enemies to the side, Stunning them for 1 second.

SunfireEnchantment_kaelthas.name: Sunfire Enchantment
SunfireEnchantment_kaelthas.description: Activating Verdant Spheres causes Kael'thas's next 2 Basic Attacks to instead deal 115 (+4% per level) Spell Damage. If both of these Attacks hit enemy Heroes, gain 15% Spell Power for 10 seconds.

SuperHealingPotion_deckard.name: Super Healing Potion
SuperHealingPotion_deckard.description: If a Healing Potion isn't picked up for at least 2 seconds, it heals for 120% more.

SuperiorSchematics_gazlowe.name: Superior Schematics
SuperiorSchematics_gazlowe.description: Gazlowe's Rock-It! Turrets have 25% increased range while he is within their attack range.

Superstition_nazeebo.name: Superstition
Superstition_nazeebo.description: Gain 40 Spell Armor, taking 40% less damage from Abilities. Basic Attacks from enemy Heroes remove this bonus for 3 seconds.

Superstrain_stukov.name: Superstrain
Superstrain_stukov.description: Whenever an ally with Healing Pathogen is Stunned or Rooted, they are instantly healed for 250 (+4% per level) Health.

SuppressingFire_dva.name: Suppressing Fire
SuppressingFire_dva.description: Pilot Mode Basic Attacks have 20% increased range and Slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

SuppressionPulse_artanis.name: Suppression Pulse
SuppressionPulse_artanis.description: Fire a large area pulse from the Spear of Adun, dealing 114 (+4% per level) damage and Blinding enemies for 4 seconds. Unlimited range.

SuppressiveFire_blaze.name: Suppressive Fire
SuppressiveFire_blaze.description: Each stream of Flame Stream reduces the Spell Power of Heroes hit by 20% for 4 seconds, up to 30%.

SurgeofLight_cassia.name: Surge of Light
SurgeofLight_cassia.description: After taking 500 (+4% per level) damage with Avoidance active, Cassia can activate Avoidance to deal 210 (+4% per level) damage to enemies around her.

SurgeofVitality_alexstrasza.name: Surge of Vitality
SurgeofVitality_alexstrasza.description: Abundance's healing burst grants allied Heroes 30% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

SurgingDash_cho.name: Surging Dash
SurgingDash_cho.description: While channeling Surging Fist, Cho heals for 150 (+4% per level) Health per second.

SurgingWinds_lili.name: Surging Winds
SurgingWinds_lili.description: If Blinding Wind hits 2 Heroes, its cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds and Li Li gains 10% Spell Power for 10 seconds.

SurvivalInstincts_abathur.name: Survival Instincts
SurvivalInstincts_abathur.description: Increases Locust's Health by 40% and duration by 40%.

SustainedCarapace_abathur.name: Sustained Carapace
SustainedCarapace_abathur.description: Increases the Shield amount of Symbiote's Carapace by 40% and allows it to persist after Symbiote ends.

SustainingPower_alarak.name: Sustaining Power
SustainingPower_alarak.description: Increase the healing received from damaging Heroes with Lightning Surge by 40%.

SustainingRounds_raynor.name: Sustaining Rounds
SustainingRounds_raynor.description: Give 'Em Some Pepper heals Raynor for 3% of his maximum Health, increased to 6% if the primary target is a Hero.

SwiftastheWind_genji.name: Swift as the Wind
SwiftastheWind_genji.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Swift Strike increases Genji's Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds.

SwiftRetribution_tyrael.name: Swift Retribution
SwiftRetribution_tyrael.description: Smite grants 20% more Movement Speed and also grants 25% Attack Speed for 2 seconds.

SwiftSweep_auriel.name: Swift Sweep
SwiftSweep_auriel.description: Increases the cast speed of Sacred Sweep by 50%.

SwirlingDeath_zuljin.name: Swirling Death
SwirlingDeath_zuljin.description: Twin Cleave's Axes cycle twice and can hit enemies on each revolution, but its cooldown is increased by 4 seconds.

SwordofJustice_tyrael.name: Sword of Justice
SwordofJustice_tyrael.description: Upon teleporting using El'druin's Might, El'druin swaps places with Tyrael, and El'druin's Might can be reactivated to teleport an additional time.

Symbiosis_dehaka.name: Symbiosis
Symbiosis_dehaka.description: Every time Dark Swarm damages an enemy Hero, reduce its cooldown by 0.4 seconds.

SynaesthesiaAuditiva_lucio.name: Synaesthesia Auditiva
SynaesthesiaAuditiva_lucio.description: The initial cast of Amp It Up removes all Stun, Slow, and Root effects from Allies, and also removes Slow and Root effects on LÃºcio.

SystemShock_ltmorales.name: System Shock
SystemShock_ltmorales.description: Heroes hit by Displacement Grenade deal 30% less damage for 4 seconds.

TacticalMineDeployment_sgthammer.name: Tactical Mine Deployment
TacticalMineDeployment_sgthammer.description: Moving while Thrusters is active leaves a trail of up to 5 Spider Mines. Additionally, increase the Slow of Spider Mines by 15%.

TakingFlight_rexxar.name: Taking Flight
TakingFlight_rexxar.description: Increases Spirit Swoop's range by 20%. If Spirit Swoop hits an enemy Hero, the Mana cost is refunded and its cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.

TalRashasElements_liming.name: Tal Rasha's Elements
TalRashasElements_liming.description: Using Abilities grants 5% Spell Power, to a maximum of 20%.  This bonus is reset when the same Ability is used within a chain.

TargetAcquired_fenix.name: Target Acquired
TargetAcquired_fenix.description: Basic Attacks against Slowed Heroes with Repeater Cannon active grants 10% Movement Speed for 4 seconds, up to 40%.

TargetPractice_hanzo.name: Target Practice
TargetPractice_hanzo.description: Quest: Hit every enemy Hero with Storm Bow. Reward: After hitting every enemy Hero once with Storm Bow, its range is increased by 30%. Reward: After hitting every enemy Hero 3 times with Storm Bow, its damage is increased by 10.

TargetPurified_artanis.name: Target Purified
TargetPurified_artanis.description: Increase the speed of Purifier Beam by 15%. If the target of Purifier Beam dies, it automatically recasts on the next visible enemy Hero.

TargetedExcision_stukov.name: Targeted Excision
TargetedExcision_stukov.description: Detonating exactly 1 Weighted Pustule (but any number of Healing Pathogens) with Bio-Kill Switch reduces the cooldown of Bio-Kill Switch to 5 seconds.

Taskmaster_gall.name: Taskmaster
Taskmaster_gall.description: Every time Cho is hit by a Hero Basic Attack, reduce the Cooldown of Shove by 1 second.

TasteForExplosions_junkrat.name: Taste For Explosions
TasteForExplosions_junkrat.description: Quest: Hitting a Hero with Frag Launcher increases its damage by 0.5, up to 100.

Taunt_varian.name: Taunt
Taunt_varian.description: Force the target Hero to attack Varian for 1.25 seconds.  Passive: Maximum Health increased by 30%.

Tazdingo_zuljin.name: Taz'dingo!
Tazdingo_zuljin.description: For the next 4 seconds, Zul'jin is Unkillable, and cannot be reduced to less than 1 Health. Taz'dingo!

TemperedbyDiscipline_valla.name: Tempered by Discipline
TemperedbyDiscipline_valla.description: While at 10 stacks of Hatred, Basic Attacks heal for 25% of the damage dealt.

TemperedFlame_ragnaros.name: Tempered Flame
TemperedFlame_ragnaros.description: When Blast Wave damages an enemy Hero, gain a Shield equal to 100% of the damage dealt for 3 seconds.

TempestFury_thrall.name: Tempest Fury
TempestFury_thrall.description: The final strike of Windfury hits 3 times for 75% normal damage.

TemplarsVerdict_yrel.name: Templar's Verdict
TemplarsVerdict_yrel.description: Righteous Hammer reduces the Armor of enemy Heroes hit by 20 for 4 seconds and deals bonus damage equal to 4% of their Maximum Health.

TemplarsWill_tassadar.name: Templar's Will
TemplarsWill_tassadar.description: Quest: Attacking enemy Heroes restores 8 mana per second. Reward: After spending 30 seconds attacking Heroes, Distortion Beam's damage is increased by 125%. Reward: After spending 60 seconds attacking Heroes, Distortion Beam's range is increased by an additional 1.

TemplarsZeal_artanis.name: Templar's Zeal
TemplarsZeal_artanis.description: Reduce the Mana cost of Blade Dash from 50 to 25. Each time that Shield Overload activates, reduce the cooldown of Blade Dash by 5 seconds.

TemporalFlux_liming.name: Temporal Flux
TemporalFlux_liming.description: Disintegrate gradually slows enemies caught in its beam, to a maximum of 60%.

TemporalFlux_medivh.name: Temporal Flux
TemporalFlux_medivh.description: Basic Attacks reduce Medivh's Heroic Ability cooldown by 1 second. Each enemy Hero hit by Arcane Rift reduces Medivh's Heroic Ability cooldown by 3 seconds.

TemporalLoop_chromie.name: Temporal Loop
TemporalLoop_chromie.description: Choose an enemy Hero. After 3 seconds, they will teleport back to the location where Temporal Loop was cast on them.

TemporaryBlindness_ana.name: Temporary Blindness
TemporaryBlindness_ana.description: After Sleep Dart's effects wear off, targets are Blinded for 2 seconds.

TenaciousRoots_malfurion.name: Tenacious Roots
TenaciousRoots_malfurion.description: Increase the Root duration of Entangling Roots by 0.3 seconds. When Malfurion is Stunned, the cooldown of Entangling Roots instantly resets. This can only occur every 10 seconds.

Tenderizer_stitches.name: Tenderizer
Tenderizer_stitches.description: Basic Attacks Slow enemies 25% for 2.5 seconds and refresh the duration of Slam's inner impact area Slow.

ThatstheStuff_tychus.name: That's the Stuff!
ThatstheStuff_tychus.description: Minigun heals Tychus for 100% of the bonus damage dealt after it expires.

TheBiggerTheyAre_tychus.name: The Bigger They Are...
TheBiggerTheyAre_tychus.description: Lowers the cooldown of Minigun by 2 seconds and increase the damage bonus to 4% while enemy Heroes are above 35% Health, but Minigun no longer has any effect on targets below 35%.

TheCrusadeMarchesOn_johanna.name: The Crusade Marches On
TheCrusadeMarchesOn_johanna.description: Basic and Heroic Abilities lower the cooldown of Iron Skin by 1.5 seconds.

TheDamnedReturn_kelthuzad.name: The Damned Return
TheDamnedReturn_kelthuzad.description: Activate to create a Shade of Naxxramas that lasts 15 seconds and mimics Kel'Thuzad's casts of Death and Decay.

TheDragonAwakens_hanzo.name: The Dragon Awakens
TheDragonAwakens_hanzo.description: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow, Scatter Arrow, or Basic Attacks reduces the cooldown of Dragonstrike by 5 seconds.

TheDragonBecomesMe_genji.name: The Dragon Becomes Me
TheDragonBecomesMe_genji.description: Each time Dragonblade hits an enemy Hero, the duration of Dragonblade is increased by 0.5 seconds. If an Hero is killed within 1.5 seconds of being hit by Dragonblade, Swift Strike's cooldown is reset.

TheDragonHungers_hanzo.name: The Dragon Hungers
TheDragonHungers_hanzo.description: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow grants 5% Spell Power for 10 seconds, stacking up to 20%.

TheGoodStuff_lili.name: The Good Stuff
TheGoodStuff_lili.description: Healing Brew heals for an additional 42 (+4% per level) over 3 seconds. While Fast Feet is active, this heal amount is increased by 100%.

TheHunt_illidan.name: The Hunt
TheHunt_illidan.description: Charge to target unit, dealing 251 (+4% per level) damage on impact and stunning for 1 second.

TheLongPitch_stukov.name: The Long Pitch
TheLongPitch_stukov.description: Increase the range of Weighted Pustule by 50%. Detonating 2 or more Weighted Pustules causes Stukov's Bio-Kill Switch and Basic Ability cooldowns to recharge 100% faster for 3 seconds.

TheNightBeckons_malganis.name: The Night Beckons
TheNightBeckons_malganis.description: After Night Rush's Sleep ends, targets are Slowed by 30% for 2.5 seconds.

ThePlaguelands_kelthuzad.name: The Plaguelands
ThePlaguelands_kelthuzad.description: Increase Death and Decay's duration by 1 second. After gaining 30 Blight, increase the radius of Death and Decay's pool by 30%.

TheSequel_thelostvikings.name: The Sequel!
TheSequel_thelostvikings.description: Reduces the Lost Vikings' death timer by 50%.

TheWillofCho_cho.name: The Will of Cho
TheWillofCho_cho.description: Takedowns permanently increase the Armor granted by Ogre Hide by 2, to a max of 50 extra Armor.

TheWillofGall_gall.name: The Will of Gall
TheWillofGall_gall.description: Takedowns permanently increase the bonus of Ogre Rage by 2%.

ThermalProtection_blaze.name: Thermal Protection
ThermalProtection_blaze.description: Each enemy hit by Jet Propulsion grants 10 Armor for 3% seconds and reduces its cooldown by 1.5 seconds.

ThickSkin_greymane.name: Thick Skin
ThickSkin_greymane.description: Using Darkflight grants 50 Physical Armor against the next 2 Hero Basic Attacks while in Worgen Form, reducing the damage taken by 50%.

ThingoftheDeep_nazeebo.name: Thing of the Deep
ThingoftheDeep_nazeebo.description: Increases the range of Nazeebo's Basic Abilities by 20%.

ThirdWind_muradin.name: Third Wind
ThirdWind_muradin.description: Increases Health Restoration rate to 80 (+4% per level) per second, and raises Health threshold to 60% Health for improved 159 (+4% per level) per second Restoration.

ThirstforBattle_garrosh.name: Thirst for Battle
ThirstforBattle_garrosh.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Bloodthirst by 2 seconds.

ThirstingBlade_illidan.name: Thirsting Blade
ThirstingBlade_illidan.description: Betrayer's Thirst's healing from Basic Attacks is increased from 30% to 50% while Sweeping Strike's damage bonus is active.

ThistleTea_valeera.name: Thistle Tea
ThistleTea_valeera.description: Activate to instantly restore 100 Energy.  Activating Thistle Tea does not break Vanish.

ThornwoodVine_lunara.name: Thornwood Vine
ThornwoodVine_lunara.description: Send forth vines that deal 164 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in a line.  Stores up to 3 charges.

ThreeBladeStyle_samuro.name: Three Blade Style
ThreeBladeStyle_samuro.description: Samuro's Images gain an additional 50% of his Health and last up to 36 seconds.

ThrilloftheHunt_rexxar.name: Thrill of the Hunt
ThrilloftheHunt_rexxar.description: Rexxar's Basic Attacks increase both his and Misha's Movement Speed by 25% for 2 seconds.

ThrowingShade_malthael.name: Throwing Shade
ThrowingShade_malthael.description: Quest: Hit 15 Heroes with Death Shroud. Reward: Permanently increase Death Shroud's range by 33%, reduce its cooldown by 4 seconds, and reduce its Mana cost from 50 to 25.

ThunderBurn_muradin.name: Thunder Burn
ThunderBurn_muradin.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Thunder Clap triggers a second explosion 2 seconds later in the same location that deals 50% (+4% per level) damage.

ThunderStrike_muradin.name: Thunder Strike
ThunderStrike_muradin.description: Thunder Clap deals 300% damage if only one target is hit.

ThundergodsVigor_cassia.name: Thundergod's Vigor
ThundergodsVigor_cassia.description: Enemy Heroes hit by the primary missile of Lightning Fury reduce its cooldown by 1 second.

Thunderstorm_thrall.name: Thunderstorm
Thunderstorm_thrall.description: Casting Chain Lightning on a Hero other than the last Hero it was cast on causes it to Slow targets by 8% for 2 seconds. Repeatable Quest: Each consecutive cast against a new Hero increases this bonus by 8%, up to 40%. Bonuses are reset if Thrall dies or casts Chain Lightning on the same Hero twice. Reward: While at a 40% bonus, Chain Lightning's damage is increased by 25%.

Thunderstrikes_falstad.name: Thunderstrikes
Thunderstrikes_falstad.description: Lightning Rod deals 20% more damage each subsequent strike.

Thunderstroke_cassia.name: Thunderstroke
Thunderstroke_cassia.description: Quest: Hit Heroes with Lightning Fury. Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, increase Lightning Fury's damage by 100. Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes, Lightning Fury gains a 2nd charge and its Mana cost is reduced from 30 to 15.

TidalWaves_rehgar.name: Tidal Waves
TidalWaves_rehgar.description: Reduces Chain Heal's cooldown by 0.75 second for each Hero healed.

TideofSin_azmodan.name: Tide of Sin
TideofSin_azmodan.description: Activate to make the next Globe of Annihilation cost no Mana and deal 50% more damage.

TimeOut_chromie.name: Time Out
TimeOut_chromie.description: Activate to place Chromie in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for up to 7 seconds. Can be reactivated to end the effect early.

TimetoFeed_malganis.name: Time to Feed
TimetoFeed_malganis.description: Mal'Ganis heals for 48 when damaging a nearby enemy Hero. This can occur once every 6 seconds against each enemy Hero.

TimetoKrill_murky.name: Time to Krill
TimetoKrill_murky.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes deal an additional 7 (+4% per level) damage a second and slow the target by 7% for 4 seconds. This effect can stack up to 5 times.

TimelySurprise_chromie.name: Timely Surprise
TimelySurprise_chromie.description: Increase Time Trap's cast range by 33%. Additionally, the cooldowns of Sand Blast and Dragon's Breath are reset when Time Trap is triggered.

TimewalkersPursuit_chromie.name: Timewalker's Pursuit
TimewalkersPursuit_chromie.description: Activate to reveal the targeted area for 2 seconds. Enemies seen are revealed for 4 seconds. Quest: Gather 15 Regeneration Globes. Reward: After gathering 15 Globes, Chromie gains 5% Spell Power and her Mana Regeneration is increased by 1.

TissueRegeneration_dehaka.name: Tissue Regeneration
TissueRegeneration_dehaka.description: Regeneration Globes grant 10 Essence. Repeatable Quest: Every 50 Essence collected permanently increases Health Regeneration by 4, up to 40, and maximum Essence by 1, up to 10.

TitanGrenade_tychus.name: Titan Grenade
TitanGrenade_tychus.description: Frag Grenade deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 5% of their maximum Health.

TitanKiller_artanis.name: Titan Killer
TitanKiller_artanis.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes deal an bonus damage equal to 0.5% of the target's maximum Health in damage, increased to 1.5% when empowered by Twin Blades.

TitansRevenge_cassia.name: Titan's Revenge
TitansRevenge_cassia.description: Cassia's Basic Attacks now ignore Armor, and her Basic Attack range is increased by 2.

TitanicMight_garrosh.name: Titanic Might
TitanicMight_garrosh.description: Wrecking Ball now throws the 2 closest enemies.

TotheLimit_zarya.name: To the Limit
TotheLimit_zarya.description: While above 50 Energy, Zarya's Basic Attack size is increased by 35%.

ToadsofHugeness_nazeebo.name: Toads of Hugeness
ToadsofHugeness_nazeebo.description: Increase the damage and explosion radius of Plague of Toads by 25% after each hop, up to a maximum of 100%.

TogetherWeAreStrong_zarya.name: Together We Are Strong
TogetherWeAreStrong_zarya.description: Every 6 (+4% per level) damage done by allies while under Shield Ally contributes 1 Energy, up to 30 Energy per shield.

ToothandClaw_greymane.name: Tooth and Claw
ToothandClaw_greymane.description: Worgen Basic Attacks cleave for 100% damage.

TopOff_stukov.name: Top Off
TopOff_stukov.description: Healing Pathogen's heal over time is increased by 30% while its target is above 60% Health.

TormentedSouls_malthael.name: Tormented Souls
TormentedSouls_malthael.description: Gain 20 Armor and unleash a torrent of souls, continually applying Reaper's Mark to nearby enemies for 4 seconds.
