TorpedoDash_dva.name: Torpedo Dash
TorpedoDash_dva.description: D.Va gains the Torpedo Dash ability, allowing her to dash forward and pass through enemies.  Requires Pilot Mode.

Torrasque_kerrigan.name: Torrasque
Torrasque_kerrigan.description: The Ultralisk morphs into an egg when it dies. If the egg isn't killed within 4 seconds, a new Ultralisk is born.

TotalAnnihilation_azmodan.name: Total Annihilation
TotalAnnihilation_azmodan.description: Globe of Annihilation damages Heroes for an additional 4% of their maximum Health.

TotalRecall_tracer.name: Total Recall
TotalRecall_tracer.description: Recall's cooldown is increased by 8 seconds, but it heals Tracer equal to the amount of Health she lost during that time.

TotemicProjection_rehgar.name: Totemic Projection
TotemicProjection_rehgar.description: Increases Earthbind Totem's duration from 8 to 12 seconds, and it can be reactivated to move an existing totem to a new location once.

TouchofDeath_malthael.name: Touch of Death
TouchofDeath_malthael.description: Activate to reduce healing received by Heroes afflicted by Reaper's Mark by 50% for 4 seconds.

ToughAsNails_sonya.name: Tough As Nails
ToughAsNails_sonya.description: Every 16 seconds, gain 60 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 60%.  Stores up to 3 charges. Charges refresh 200% faster while Fury's Movement Speed bonus is active.

ToughLove_alexstrasza.name: Tough Love
ToughLove_alexstrasza.description: While Alexstrasza is above 75% Health, Gift of Life grants its target 20 Armor for 2 seconds.

TourBus_etc.name: Tour Bus
TourBus_etc.description: Mosh Pit refreshes the cooldown of Powerslide. E.T.C. can Powerslide during Mosh Pit, which also increases its duration by 2 seconds.

TowerDefense_probius.name: Tower Defense
TowerDefense_probius.description: When Photon Cannon damages an enemy Hero, its cooldown is reduced by 1.25 seconds.

ToxicBuildup_murky.name: Toxic Buildup
ToxicBuildup_murky.description: Every 3rd consecutive Basic Attack against an enemy Hero causes a free Slime to be cast upon them.

TracerRounds_tracer.name: Tracer Rounds
TracerRounds_tracer.description: Basic Attacks reveal enemies for 4 seconds.

TragOulsEssence_xul.name: Trag'Oul's Essence
TragOulsEssence_xul.description: Every time a Skeletal Warrior attacks an enemy, restore 0.5% of Xul's maximum Health and 0.2% of his maximum Mana.

Trample_azmodan.name: Trample
Trample_azmodan.description: Activate to charge a short distance, dealing 240 damage and Slowing enemies caught in the path by 60% for 1 second.

Tranquility_malfurion.name: Tranquility
Tranquility_malfurion.description: Heal nearby allied Heroes for 80 (+4% per level) Health per second for 8 seconds. Allies affected by Regrowth within Tranquility's area gain 10 Armor.

Transcendence_kharazim.name: Transcendence
Transcendence_kharazim.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack heals the lowest nearby allied Hero for 103 (+4% per level) and gives 25% increased move speed for 2 seconds.

TraumaTrigger_ltmorales.name: Trauma Trigger
TraumaTrigger_ltmorales.description: Taking damage while below 40% Health grants 40 Armor for 3 seconds.  This effect has a 30 second cooldown.

Trickery_mephisto.name: Trickery
Trickery_mephisto.description: Shade of Mephisto grants 20% Movement Speed while active and for 2.5 seconds after it ends. After Shade of Mephisto expires, all Slows and Roots are removed from Mephisto.

TrickyShuffles_junkrat.name: Tricky Shuffles
TrickyShuffles_junkrat.description: While Frag Launcher has no charges left, gain 15% Movement Speed.

TripleStrike_artanis.name: Triple Strike
TripleStrike_artanis.description: Increases Twin Blades's number of Basic Attacks to 3, but increase its cooldown by 1 second.

TripleTap_nova.name: Triple Tap
TripleTap_nova.description: Locks in on the target Hero, then fires 3 shots that hit the first Hero or Structure they come in contact with for 372 (+4% per level) damage each.

Triumvirate_liming.name: Triumvirate
Triumvirate_liming.description: If Arcane Orb hits an enemy Hero after traveling at least 50% of its base range, the cooldown is reduced by 50%.

TrollsBlood_zuljin.name: Troll's Blood
TrollsBlood_zuljin.description: Increase Regeneration's healing by 25%. If Regeneration fully finishes, restore 10% of Zul'jin's maximum Mana.

TrueshotAura_tyrande.name: Trueshot Aura
TrueshotAura_tyrande.description: Activate to reset the cooldown of Hunter's Mark and grant 15% increased Basic Attack damage to nearby allied Heroes for 5 seconds.  Passive: Basic Attack damage increased by 15%.

Tufferfish_murky.name: Tufferfish
Tufferfish_murky.description: Pufferfish gains 50 Spell Armor and deals 50% more damage to Slimed targets.

TurboCharged_probius.name: Turbo Charged
TurboCharged_probius.description: Worker Rush grants an additional 10% passive Movement Speed while in a Power Field, and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.

TurretStorage_gazlowe.name: Turret Storage
TurretStorage_gazlowe.description: Increases Rock-It! Turret maximum charges from 2 to 3.

TwilightArchon_tassadar.name: Twilight Archon
TwilightArchon_tassadar.description: Basic Attacks while in Archon form increase its duration by 2 seconds.

TwilightDream_malfurion.name: Twilight Dream
TwilightDream_malfurion.description: After 0.5 seconds, deal 310 (+4% per level) damage in a large area around Malfurion, Silencing enemies making them unable to use Abilities for 3 seconds.

TwilightFalls_zeratul.name: Twilight Falls
TwilightFalls_zeratul.description: Might of the Nerazim resets the cooldown of all Basic Abilities.

TwilightNova_gall.name: Twilight Nova
TwilightNova_gall.description: After the first bounce of Dread Orb, 2 extra bombs bounce to the sides once.

TwilightVeil_cho.name: Twilight Veil
TwilightVeil_cho.description: Activate to increase the Armor bonus of Ogre Hide by 300% for 2 seconds. If cast while Ogre Rage is active, it instantly swaps to Ogre Hide.

TwinBladesofFury_varian.name: Twin Blades of Fury
TwinBladesofFury_varian.description: Basic Attacks reduce Heroic Strike's cooldown by 9 seconds, and increase Varian's Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds.  Passive: Attack Speed increased by 100%. Passive: Base Attack Damage reduced by 20%.

TwinSpheres_kaelthas.name: Twin Spheres
TwinSpheres_kaelthas.description: Verdant Spheres gains a second charge.

TwistingNether_gall.name: Twisting Nether
TwistingNether_gall.description: After 1 second, nearby enemies are slowed by 50% while Gall channels, up to 5 seconds. Activate to deal 353 (+5% per level) damage.

TwoForOne_lili.name: Two For One
TwoForOne_lili.description: Increases the number of allies healed by Healing Brew to 2, but increases the cooldown by 1 second.

TyrsDeliverance_uther.name: Tyr's Deliverance
TyrsDeliverance_uther.description: Allies healed by Holy Radiance receive 40% increased healing from all sources for 6 seconds.

TyrantMaw_zagara.name: Tyrant Maw
TyrantMaw_zagara.description: Devouring Maw deals 50% more damage and getting a Takedown reduce its cooldown by 25 seconds.

UltimateEvolution_abathur.name: Ultimate Evolution
UltimateEvolution_abathur.description: Clone target allied Hero and control it for 20 seconds. Abathur has perfected the clone, granting it 20% Spell Power, 20% bonus Attack Damage, and 10% bonus Movement Speed. Cannot use their Heroic Ability.

UltraCapacitors_sgthammer.name: Ultra Capacitors
UltraCapacitors_sgthammer.description: Hitting enemy Heroes with Basic Attacks while in Siege Mode grants 5% Attack Speed for 5 seconds, up to 40%.

Unbound_illidan.name: Unbound
Unbound_illidan.description: Sweeping Strike can go over walls and terrain. Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes with Sweeping Strike, gain a second charge.

UnbridledEnergy_kerrigan.name: Unbridled Energy
UnbridledEnergy_kerrigan.description: Damaging a Hero with a Heroic Ability grants 35% Spell Power for 4 seconds.

UnconqueredSpirit_fenix.name: Unconquered Spirit
UnconqueredSpirit_fenix.description: Upon taking fatal damage, Shield Capacitor regains 800 Shields. This effect has a 120 second cooldown.

Underking_anubarak.name: Underking
Underking_anubarak.description: Increases Burrow Charge range by 20% and damage by 100%.

UnendingHatred_illidan.name: Unending Hatred
UnendingHatred_illidan.description: Quest: Minion kills grant 0.2 Basic Attack Damage. Hero Takedowns grant 1 Basic Attack Damage. Reward: After gaining 20 increased Basic Attack Damage, receive an additional 20 Basic Attack Damage.

UnfairAdvantage_lunara.name: Unfair Advantage
UnfairAdvantage_lunara.description: Nature's Toxin deals 60% more damage to Heroes that are Slowed, Rooted, or Stunned.

UnfetteredAssault_greymane.name: Unfettered Assault
UnfetteredAssault_greymane.description: Increases Razor Swipe's lunge distance by 60%, and Worgen Basic Attacks reduce Razor Swipe's cooldown by 1.5 seconds.

UnfurlingShadows_sylvanas.name: Unfurling Shadows
UnfurlingShadows_sylvanas.description: Quest: Each time an enemy Hero with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse is hit by Shadow Dagger, its damage is permanently increased by 0.5%.

UniversalCarrier_stukov.name: Universal Carrier
UniversalCarrier_stukov.description: Healing Pathogen can continually spread through Stukov, but its healing is reduced by 50%.

UnleashtheBoars_rexxar.name: Unleash the Boars
UnleashtheBoars_rexxar.description: Release a herd of boars that track down all enemy Heroes in a direction, dealing 110 (+4% per level) damage, revealing, and slowing enemies by 40% for 5 seconds.

Unleashed_greymane.name: Unleashed
Unleashed_greymane.description: If the free cast of Go for the Throat kills its target, another free cast is provided that deals 35% more damage, up to 140%.

UnrelentingDescent_imperius.name: Unrelenting Descent
UnrelentingDescent_imperius.description: Consuming a Valorous Brand reduces the cooldown of Wrath of the Angiris by 5 seconds.

UnrelentingPursuit_thebutcher.name: Unrelenting Pursuit
UnrelentingPursuit_thebutcher.description: Reduces the cooldown of Ruthless Onslaught by 33% upon impact.

UnrivaledStrength_garrosh.name: Unrivaled Strength
UnrivaledStrength_garrosh.description: Increase Wrecking Ball's throw range by 25% and its damage by 75%.

UnshakableFaith_imperius.name: Unshakable Faith
UnshakableFaith_imperius.description: Activating Molten Armor removes Roots and Slows. If a disabling effect is removed, heal for 250.

UnspeakableHorror_mephisto.name: Unspeakable Horror
UnspeakableHorror_mephisto.description: Durance of Hate Silences enemies for 3 seconds after its Root expires.

UnstableAnomaly_brightwing.name: Unstable Anomaly
UnstableAnomaly_brightwing.description: Increase Polymorph's Slow by 15%. Upon expiration, Polymorph deals damage to nearby enemy Heroes equal to 2% of their maximum Health.

UnstableCompound_raynor.name: Unstable Compound
UnstableCompound_raynor.description: Increase the area of Give 'Em Some Pepper by 15%, and enemies hit by it are Slowed by 10% for 2.5 seconds.

UnstablePoison_sylvanas.name: Unstable Poison
UnstablePoison_sylvanas.description: Minions that die under the effects of Shadow Dagger or Sylvanas' Traits explode, dealing 130 damage to nearby Minions, Mercenaries, and Summons.

UnstoppableCompetitor_zarya.name: Unstoppable Competitor
UnstoppableCompetitor_zarya.description: Personal Barrier makes Zarya Unstoppable for up to 2 seconds.

UnstoppableForce_muradin.name: Unstoppable Force
UnstoppableForce_muradin.description: While active, Avatar grants 20 Armor and causes Muradin's Basic Attacks to reduce the cooldowns of Thunder Clap and Dwarf Toss by 0.75 seconds.

UntappedPotential_chen.name: Untapped Potential
UntappedPotential_chen.description: Wandering Keg increases Movement Speed by 100% and grants 60 Armor, reducing damage taken by 60%.

Untouchable_tracer.name: Untouchable
Untouchable_tracer.description: Quest: Takedowns increase Tracer's Basic Attack damage by 2%, up to 30%. These bonuses are lost on death.

UnwaveringFaith_whitemane.name: Unwavering Faith
UnwaveringFaith_whitemane.description: Reduce Desperate Plea's Mana cost by 15.  Upon reaching 3 stacks of Desperation, gain a 250 Shield for 5 seconds.

UnyieldingDefender_zarya.name: Unyielding Defender
UnyieldingDefender_zarya.description: Activate to reset the cooldown of Personal Barrier and Shield Ally.

UnyieldingDespair_leoric.name: Unyielding Despair
UnyieldingDespair_leoric.description: Drain Hope's cooldown is reduced by 0.5 seconds for every 1 second it is active. If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, its cooldown is reduced by an additional 2 seconds.

UnyieldingPower_mephisto.name: Unyielding Power
UnyieldingPower_mephisto.description: Quest: Hit Heroes with Skull Missile. Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, increase Skull Missile's damage by 100. Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes, Skull Missile's cooldown is permanently reduced to 5 seconds.

UptheFrequency_lucio.name: Up the Frequency
UptheFrequency_lucio.description: Amp It Up's mana cost is reduced from 100 to 80 and dealing Basic Attack damage to enemy Heroes also reduces the cooldown of Amp It Up by 0.45 seconds.

Updraft_falstad.name: Updraft
Updraft_falstad.description: Increases Barrel Roll's range and Shield amount by 40%.

Upheaval_cho.name: Upheaval
Upheaval_cho.description: After 1 second, pull enemies towards Cho'gall, slowing them by 25% for 3 seconds and dealing 175 (+4% per level) damage.

Uppercut_cho.name: Uppercut
Uppercut_cho.description: Surging Fist deals additional damage to Heroes equal to 7% of their max Health.

UrticatingSpines_anubarak.name: Urticating Spines
UrticatingSpines_anubarak.description: Casting Harden Carapace will also deal 80 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies. Deals double damage against Heroes.

Valkyrie_cassia.name: Valkyrie
Valkyrie_cassia.description: Summon a Valkyrie that rushes to Cassia after 0.75 seconds, pulling the first enemy Hero hit, dealing 225 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds at the end of her path. The Valkyrie knocks back all other enemy Heroes in her way.

ValorousPursuit_imperius.name: Valorous Pursuit
ValorousPursuit_imperius.description: Activate to teleport to an enemy that has been marked by Valorous Brand and gain 25 Armor for 3 seconds.

VampiricAura_malganis.name: Vampiric Aura
VampiricAura_malganis.description: Mal'Ganis and nearby allied Heroes heal for 10% of Physical Damage dealt.

VanadiumPlating_ltmorales.name: Vanadium Plating
VanadiumPlating_ltmorales.description: While an ally affected by Safeguard is Stunned or Rooted, Safeguard grants an additional 25 Armor and its duration is paused.

VanquishtheWeak_malganis.name: Vanquish the Weak
VanquishtheWeak_malganis.description: Damage from Fel Claws and Basic Attacks Slows enemy by 15% for 1.5 seconds, and Vampiric Touch converts 10% more damage into healing versus Slowed Heroes.

VelensChosen_yrel.name: Velen's Chosen
VelensChosen_yrel.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with a Basic Ability at maximum charge grants 10% Spell Power for 10 seconds, up to 30%.

VengefulKnives_maiev.name: Vengeful Knives
VengefulKnives_maiev.description: For each enemy Hero Spirit of Vengeance hits, Maiev's next Fan of Knives deals 1.5% maximum Health as bonus damage to enemy Heroes.

VengefulRoots_malfurion.name: Vengeful Roots
VengefulRoots_malfurion.description: Entangling Roots spawns a Treant that deals 58 damage per second and lasts 10 seconds. Repeatable Quest: Hitting enemy Heroes with Entangling Roots permanently increases the Treant's damage per second by 7.

VerdantFlourish_alexstrasza.name: Verdant Flourish
VerdantFlourish_alexstrasza.description: Alexstrasza receives 30% more healing from Abundance and 100% more healing from Regeneration Globes.

VeteranMarksman_raynor.name: Veteran Marksman
VeteranMarksman_raynor.description: Quest: Every time the primary target of Give 'Em Some Pepper is a Hero, permanently increase its damage bonus by 0.75%.

ViciousAssault_zuljin.name: Vicious Assault
ViciousAssault_zuljin.description: Increase Grievous Throw's damage bonus by 35% and duration by 3 seconds.

Viciousness_greymane.name: Viciousness
Viciousness_greymane.description: Increases Inner Beast's duration to 4 seconds, and causes Ability damage to also refresh its duration.

VictoryRush_varian.name: Victory Rush
VictoryRush_varian.description: Every 30 seconds, Varian's next Basic Attack will heal him for 350 (+4% per level) Health. When a nearby enemy Minion or Monster dies, the cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.

Victuals_thebutcher.name: Victuals
Victuals_thebutcher.description: Every time a nearby enemy minion dies, The Butcher heals 5% of his maximum health.

Vigilance_varian.name: Vigilance
Vigilance_varian.description: Being hit by a Hero Basic Attack reduces the cooldown of Taunt by 1 seconds.

Vigor_valeera.name: Vigor
Vigor_valeera.description: Valeera regenerates an additional 2.5 Energy per second. Reward: After Gathering 20 Regen Globes, increase Valeera's maximum Energy to 120.

VigorousReuptake_stukov.name: Vigorous Reuptake
VigorousReuptake_stukov.description: Bio-Kill Switch heals for 30% more when detonating 3 or more Healing Pathogens.

VikingBribery_thelostvikings.name: Viking Bribery
VikingBribery_thelostvikings.description: Enemy Minions or captured Mercenaries killed near The Lost Vikings grant stacks of Bribe. Use 40 stacks to bribe target Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Bosses. Maximum stacks available: 200. If a camp is defeated entirely with Bribe, the camp respawns 50% faster.

VikingFuryoftheStorm_thelostvikings.name: Viking Fury of the Storm
VikingFuryoftheStorm_thelostvikings.description: Every 5 seconds, the next Basic Attack will deal an additional 41 (+4% per level) damage to the target, and 105 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby Minions, Mercenaries and Monsters.  Each Viking has their own cooldown.

VileInfection_nazeebo.name: Vile Infection
VileInfection_nazeebo.description: Quest: Reach 175 stacks of Voodoo Ritual. Reward: After reaching 175 stacks of Voodoo Ritual, it can also be applied to Heroes and its damage is increased by 150%.

VileNest_abathur.name: Vile Nest
VileNest_abathur.description: Toxic Nests slow enemy Movement Speed by 40% for 2.5 seconds.

VirulentReaction_stukov.name: Virulent Reaction
VirulentReaction_stukov.description: Detonating a Weighted Pustule on an enemy who is inside of Lurking Arm Roots them for 2 seconds.

ViscousAcid_zagara.name: Viscous Acid
ViscousAcid_zagara.description: Banelings slow enemies by 20% for 1.5 seconds.

VoidPrison_zeratul.name: Void Prison
VoidPrison_zeratul.description: Slows time in an area to a near standstill, placing allies and enemies in Time Stop for 5 seconds. Zeratul is not affected.

VoidSlash_zeratul.name: Void Slash
VoidSlash_zeratul.description: If Cleave hits more than one enemy Hero, it deals 40% increased damage and its cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds.

VolatileAcid_zagara.name: Volatile Acid
VolatileAcid_zagara.description: Banelings can travel 50% further before exploding and their damage to non-Heroes is increased by 50%.

VolatileMutation_abathur.name: Volatile Mutation
VolatileMutation_abathur.description: Ultimate Evolution clones and Monstrosities deal 137 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies every 3 seconds and when they die.

VolatilePower_kerrigan.name: Volatile Power
VolatilePower_kerrigan.description: Increase the amount of Assimilation Shields granted from damage dealt by 10%, but reduce duration of Assimilation by 3 seconds.

VoodooShuffle_zuljin.name: Voodoo Shuffle
VoodooShuffle_zuljin.description: Activate to remove Roots and Slows.  Passive: Lower the cooldown and Mana cost of Regeneration by 40%.

VorpalBlade_zeratul.name: Vorpal Blade
VorpalBlade_zeratul.description: Activate to teleport to Zeratul's last non-structure Basic Attack target within 3 seconds. The target is revealed during these 3 seconds.

WailingArrow_sylvanas.name: Wailing Arrow
WailingArrow_sylvanas.description: Shoot an arrow that can be reactivated to deal 228 (+4% per level) damage and silence enemies in an area making them unable to use Abilities for 2.5 seconds. The arrow detonates automatically if it reaches maximum range.

WanderingKeg_chen.name: Wandering Keg
WanderingKeg_chen.description: Roll around inside an Unstoppable barrel with 60% increased Movement Speed, dealing 59 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the way and knocking them back. Lasts for 5 seconds.

WarPaint_sonya.name: War Paint
WarPaint_sonya.description: Basic Attacks heal Sonya for 30% of the damage dealt.

WarTraveler_cassia.name: War Traveler
WarTraveler_cassia.description: Cassia gains 4% Movement Speed every 0.5 seconds while Avoidance is active, up to 20%.  This bonus is reset when Cassia stops moving or uses an Ability.

Warbreaker_garrosh.name: Warbreaker
Warbreaker_garrosh.description: Quest: Stun Heroes with Groundbreaker. Reward: After stunning 5 Heroes, Groundbreaker deals an additional 165 (+4% per level) damage over 3 seconds to Heroes. Reward: After stunning 15 Heroes, reduce Groundbreaker's cooldown by 2 seconds.

Warbringer_varian.name: Warbringer
Warbringer_varian.description: Reduces Charge's cooldown by 8 seconds and Mana cost from 45 to 22. Additionally, Charge can be cast on allied Heroes.

WardensCage_maiev.name: Warden's Cage
WardensCage_maiev.description: Summon 8 Warden Avatars as a cage around Maiev. After 1.5 seconds, enemy Heroes that come in contact with an Avatar consume it and are knocked to the center of the cage. Warden Avatars last 5 seconds.

WarlordsChallenge_garrosh.name: Warlord's Challenge
WarlordsChallenge_garrosh.description: Silence nearby Heroes and force them to attack Garrosh for 2 seconds.

WarpResonance_probius.name: Warp Resonance
WarpResonance_probius.description: Quest: Hit Heroes with Warp Rift explosions. Reward: After hitting 10 Heroes with Warp Rift explosions, increase the explosion damage by 100. Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes with Warp Rift explosions, Warp Rift gains 1 additional charge.

WarpSickness_artanis.name: Warp Sickness
WarpSickness_artanis.description: Phase Prism also slows the enemy's Movement Speed by 35% for 4 seconds.

WarpSkirmisher_zeratul.name: Warp Skirmisher
WarpSkirmisher_zeratul.description: Vorpal Blade gains a 2nd charge. Teleporting to an enemy with Vorpal Blade causes Zeratul's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds to deal 40% more damage.

WarpWarfare_fenix.name: Warp Warfare
WarpWarfare_fenix.description: After arriving with Warp, gain 175% Attack Speed for 4 seconds while in Repeater Cannon mode. Hero Takedowns reset Warp's cooldown.

WaterDragon_lili.name: Water Dragon
WaterDragon_lili.description: Li Li channels for 2 seconds, summoning a Water Dragon that hits the nearest enemy Hero within 12 range and all enemies near them, dealing 318 (+4% per level) damage and slowing their Movement Speed by 70% for 4 seconds.

WaveOfForce_liming.name: Wave Of Force
WaveOfForce_liming.description: Knock away all enemies from an area and deal 160 (+5% per level) damage.

WaveofLight_uther.name: Wave of Light
WaveofLight_uther.description: Quest: Damage or heal Heroes 60 times with Holy Radiance. Reward: Increase the duration of Devotion by 0.5 second.  Passive: Damaging or healing Heroes with Holy Radiance refunds 5 Mana and reduces its cooldown by 1 second.

WayofIllusion_samuro.name: Way of Illusion
WayofIllusion_samuro.description: Quest: Every time a Mirror Image Critically Strikes a Hero, Samuro gains 0.25 Attack Damage, up to 10. Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes, Samuro gains an additional 20 Attack Damage.

WayoftheBlade_samuro.name: Way of the Blade
WayoftheBlade_samuro.description: Critical Strike now happens for Samuro and his Mirror Images every 3rd Basic Attack.

WayoftheHundredFists_kharazim.name: Way of the Hundred Fists
WayoftheHundredFists_kharazim.description: Radiant Dashing to an enemy launches a rapid volley of 6 Basic Attacks dealing 45% damage each.

WayoftheWind_samuro.name: Way of the Wind
WayoftheWind_samuro.description: Gain 40% Movement Speed for 3 seconds after entering or exiting Wind Walk.

WeSeeYou_gall.name: We See You!
WeSeeYou_gall.description: Eye of Kilrogg's cooldown is decreased by 15 seconds and its range is increased by 33%.

WeakSpotAcquired_raynor.name: Weak Spot Acquired
WeakSpotAcquired_raynor.description: Enemy Heroes that are the primary target of Give 'Em Some Pepper have their Armor reduced by 25 for 2 seconds.

Weaken_xul.name: Weaken
Weaken_xul.description: Increase the Attack Speed reduction of Cursed Strikes by 35% and the duration by 1 second.

WellMet_uther.name: Well Met
WellMet_uther.description: When used against Heroes, Hammer of Justice reduces the target's Movement Speed and damage dealt by 25% for 3 seconds.

Widowmakers_nazeebo.name: Widowmakers
Widowmakers_nazeebo.description: Reward: After Corpse Spiders attack Heroes 100 times, their attack damage is increased by 30%.

WildGrowth_malfurion.name: Wild Growth
WildGrowth_malfurion.description: Each enemy hit by Moonfire extends the duration of currently active Regrowths by 1 second.

WildVigor_lunara.name: Wild Vigor
WildVigor_lunara.description: Using Crippling Spores increases the damage of Lunara's next 4 Basic Attacks by 50%.

WildfireBear_rexxar.name: Wildfire Bear
WildfireBear_rexxar.description: Misha deals 28 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.

WillofHeaven_auriel.name: Will of Heaven
WillofHeaven_auriel.description: Allies with Bestow Hope gain 20% Attack Speed.

WilloftheForsaken_sylvanas.name: Will of the Forsaken
WilloftheForsaken_sylvanas.description: Activate to become Unstoppable and gain 40% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

WillofTichondrius_malganis.name: Will of Tichondrius
WillofTichondrius_malganis.description: The third slash of Fel Claws steals 4% of maximum Health from enemy Heroes.

WillingVessel_leoric.name: Willing Vessel
WillingVessel_leoric.description: Increase the healing from Drain Hope to 25% of Leoric's maximum Health. If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, Leoric instantly heals for an additional 5% of his maximum Health.

WindRush_thrall.name: Wind Rush
WindRush_thrall.description: Activate to immediately teleport to a target location and gain Windfury.

WindSerpent_lili.name: Wind Serpent
WindSerpent_lili.description: Casting Cloud Serpent also launches a Blinding Wind at the nearest enemy to the target (prioritizing Heroes).

WindStrider_samuro.name: Wind Strider
WindStrider_samuro.description: Wind Walk's cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds.

WindTunnel_falstad.name: Wind Tunnel
WindTunnel_falstad.description: Mighty Gust creates a wind tunnel for 4 seconds. Enemies caught in the tunnel will periodically be pushed back.

Windrunner_sylvanas.name: Windrunner
Windrunner_sylvanas.description: Haunting Wave can be cast a second time for free within 5 seconds after teleporting. Teleporting with Haunting Wave resets the cooldown of Withering Fire.

WindsofCelerity_medivh.name: Winds of Celerity
WindsofCelerity_medivh.description: Increases Raven Form's Movement Speed bonus by 50%.

WingedGuardian_malganis.name: Winged Guardian
WingedGuardian_malganis.description: Each time Necrotic Embrace hits an enemy Hero, gain 50 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack.  If Winged Guard has no charges, Mal'Ganis will gain 1 charge after 6 seconds.

Wingman_falstad.name: Wingman
Wingman_falstad.description: Lowers the cooldown of Lightning Rod by 3 seconds. Enemy Minions killed near Falstad grant a stack of Bribe. Falstad can use 20 stacks to bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them and permanently increasing the damage of Lightning Rod by 5%. Does not work on Bosses. Maximum of 80 stacks.

WintersReach_jaina.name: Winter's Reach
WintersReach_jaina.description: Increase the range of Frostbolt by 30%.

Wintermute_jaina.name: Wintermute
Wintermute_jaina.description: Increases the cast range of Water Elemental by 50%, and the Water Elemental will now mimic Jaina's Basic Abilities for 50% damage.

WitheringBarrage_sylvanas.name: Withering Barrage
WitheringBarrage_sylvanas.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Withering Fire reduce its cooldown by 0.75 seconds.

WitheringFlames_chen.name: Withering Flames
WitheringFlames_chen.description: Setting an enemy Hero on fire reduces their Spell Power by 30% for 3 seconds.

WizenedDuelist_greymane.name: Wizened Duelist
WizenedDuelist_greymane.description: Quest: Every 6 Human Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes increase Basic Attack damage by 1%, up to 30%. Worgen Basic Attacks grant credit for 3 Basic Attacks. Half of this bonus is lost upon death.

WolfRun_rehgar.name: Wolf Run
WolfRun_rehgar.description: Increases the Movement Speed of Ghost Wolf from 20% to 30%.

Wolfheart_greymane.name: Wolfheart
Wolfheart_greymane.description: Increase the cooldown reduction from Basic Attacks during Inner Beast from 0.5 to 1 second.

WordofGlory_yrel.name: Word of Glory
WordofGlory_yrel.description: Ardent Defender heals nearby allied Heroes for 100% of the healing received by Yrel.

Worldbreaker_thrall.name: Worldbreaker
Worldbreaker_thrall.description: Lower the cooldown of Sundering by 20 seconds. After Sundering impacts, it leaves behind an impassable rift, blocking unit movement for 3 seconds.

Wormhole_zeratul.name: Wormhole
Wormhole_zeratul.description: For 3 seconds, reactivate Blink to return to the point where it was cast from.

WoundPoison_valeera.name: Wound Poison
WoundPoison_valeera.description: Activate to make Valeera's next damaging Ability and subsequent Abilities within 4 seconds reduce enemy healing received by 50% for 4 seconds.  Activating Wound Poison does not break Stealth.

Wrath_azmodan.name: Wrath
Wrath_azmodan.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes under 75% Health grant 1 Annihilation. Quest: After gaining 200 Annihilation, hitting a Hero with Globe of Annihilation increases the damage of Azmodan's next Basic Attack against them within 3 seconds by 75% the amount of Annihilation he has.

WrathofCod_murky.name: Wrath of Cod
WrathofCod_murky.description: Heroes hit by Pufferfish take additional damage equal to 15% of their maximum Health over 5 seconds.

WrathofHeaven_auriel.name: Wrath of Heaven
WrathofHeaven_auriel.description: Allies with Bestow Hope gain 10% Spell Power.

WrathofNathreza_malganis.name: Wrath of Nathreza
WrathofNathreza_malganis.description: Enemy Heroes near the target suffer 75% of the transferred Health as damage over 3 seconds.  Does not benefit from Vampiric Touch.

WrathoftheAngiris_imperius.name: Wrath of the Angiris
WrathoftheAngiris_imperius.description: After 0.75 seconds, charge in the target direction, lifting the first enemy Hero hit into the Heavens. While in the air, Imperius can steer the landing location by moving.  After 2 seconds, slam the target into the ground, dealing 375 damage and Stunning them for 1 second.

WrathoftheBerserker_sonya.name: Wrath of the Berserker
WrathoftheBerserker_sonya.description: Increase damage dealt by 40%. Reduce the duration of stuns, slows, and roots against Sonya by 50%. Lasts 15 seconds, and extends by 1 second for every 10 Fury gained.

WrongPlaceWrongTime_zuljin.name: Wrong Place Wrong Time
WrongPlaceWrongTime_zuljin.description: If an enemy is hit by both Twin Cleave axes at the same time, they take an additional 100 (+4% per level) damage and count as 5 Hero hits for You Want Axe?.

XStrike_genji.name: X-Strike
XStrike_genji.description: Perform two slashes dealing 135 (+4% per level) damage. The slashes detonate after 1.25 seconds causing an additional 270 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in their area.

XTraLargeBombs_gazlowe.name: X-Tra Large Bombs
XTraLargeBombs_gazlowe.description: Increases Xplodium Charge radius by 30%. Being stunned or rooted causes an Xplodium Charge to drop at Gazlowe's feet.  This effect has a 10 second cooldown.

YouWantAxe_zuljin.name: You Want Axe?
YouWantAxe_zuljin.description: Quest: Every 5 Basic Attacks against Heroes increases Zul'jin's Basic Attack damage by 1.25. Reward: After attacking Heroes 120 times, his Attack Range is increased by 1.1.

YserasGift_malfurion.name: Ysera's Gift
YserasGift_malfurion.description: While Malfurion is above 75% Health, Regrowth's healing-over-time is increased by 60%.

Zanshin_genji.name: Zanshin
Zanshin_genji.description: Quest: Block 6500 damage with Deflect, including damage blocked so far. Reward: Deflect hits all nearby enemy Heroes.

ZealotCharge_artanis.name: Zealot Charge
ZealotCharge_artanis.description: Increase Twin Blades' charge distance by 100%.

ZealousGlare_johanna.name: Zealous Glare
ZealousGlare_johanna.description: Increase the Blind duration of Shield Glare by 0.75 seconds. Johanna's Basic Attacks against Heroes with Shield Glare extend its duration by 1 second, up to a maximum of 3 seconds.

ZealousSpirit_whitemane.name: Zealous Spirit
ZealousSpirit_whitemane.description: Upon reaching 2 stacks of Desperation, Whitemane gains Zeal.

ZeisVengeance_liming.name: Zei's Vengeance
ZeisVengeance_liming.description: Arcane Orb does up to 25% more damage to enemies based on distance. Additionally, its cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.
